title: Data Analyst
description:
Esta função será baseada no Brasil e flexível para trabalho híbrido/remoto também. Com um escopo global, essa pessoa precisará colaborar com colegas de equipe em nossos escritórios na América do Norte, São Paulo, Dublin e Cingapura.

Nossa organização de Operações de Vendas é responsável por construir o melhor mecanismo de entrada no mercado para conectar nossas soluções com as necessidades do cliente em escala. Como Analista de Estratégia e Operações de Vendas, você fará parceria com seus colegas para decifrar os tópicos estratégicos mais importantes na organização de vendas, impulsionando o crescimento da receita e melhorando a produtividade das vendas e o valor do cliente.

O analista deve ser muito adaptável, ter fortes habilidades de comunicação e ter um histórico comprovado de entrega de análise de zero defeito em suas funções anteriores. O candidato também deve ser capaz de lidar com informações sensíveis, confidenciais e não rotineiras, ter a mente aberta para desafiar o status quo e trabalhar em uma organização em rápida mudança, ao mesmo tempo em que inspira excelência de si mesmo e de parceiros de negócios.

Responsabilidades

Faça parte de um programa global de transformação de operações Contribua e comunique processos de negócios de estado atual e futuro, fluxos de dados e diagramas de processos, jornadas e fluxos de trabalho do usuário Crie e mantenha rastreadores de projeto, bem como canais de comunicação para gerenciar ações de forma eficaz para cumprir prazos enquanto constrói em alta velocidade Avalie e comunique regularmente as restrições e riscos do projeto globalmente; identificar dependências de projeto, compensações de decisão, planos de mitigação Recomendar soluções para melhorar a produtividade, diminuir a complexidade geral, minimizar a dívida técnica e permitir melhor integridade de dados, dar suporte à Pesquisa do Usuário para melhorar a UX geral do produto, atuando como defensor do usuário para Operações de Vendas/Vendas Estabelecer relacionamentos de trabalho sólidos com colegas em outras equipes de Operações de Vendas e parceiros multifuncionais para atingir objetivos

Qualificações Básicas

Experiência em consultoria de gestão, finanças, operações de vendas, operações comerciais ou uma função analítica/operacional Experiência com SFDC e D365, fluência em SQL, PowerBI/Tableau e Excel

Qualificações Preferenciais

Atenção excepcional aos detalhes: aprendiz hábil com atenção meticulosa aos detalhes e experiência comprovada no diagnóstico de pontos de ruptura em um processo Construção de experiência para escala: confortável com dados e ambiguidade; cria conexões rapidamente e avalia a causa raiz; aprofunda-se nos detalhes e táticas operacionais, envolve-se significativamente no panorama geral e resolve problemas operacionais Experiência com processos e ferramentas de vendas: especialista no assunto em fluxos de trabalho e processos de vendas (por exemplo, planejamento de contagem de funcionários, construção de território, definição de cotas, previsão), operações e ferramentas (por exemplo, Salesforce, Dynamics 365); experiência na implementação de sistemas de terceiros e utilização de metodologias Agile Comunicação clara e eficaz: destila pensamentos e estratégias complexas em recomendações escritas e verbais simples e acionáveis ​em um ambiente rápido e focado em dados, incluindo apresentações a um conjunto diversificado de partes interessadasR esponsabilidade e priorização: experiência em atuar com supervisão limitada no dia a dia, equilibrando múltiplas prioridades e experiência comprovada em cumprir prazosP roatividade e positividade: busca informações de forma independente, resolve problemas conceituais, reúne recursos e entrega resultados em situações desafiadoras e multifacetadas; ansioso e motivado para trabalhar de forma colaborativa em um ambiente dinâmico e em constante mudança

title: AI Business Applications Associate – Brazil
description:
AI Business Applications Associate – Brazil About Dayos

At the heart of the world’s largest and most complex enterprises are

business applications —sophisticated systems that power

financial operations, supply chains, human resources, and IT services . Companies like

Nike, Reddit, Walmart, and Disney

rely on these platforms daily to

streamline processes, scale operations, and stay competitive .

While these systems are essential, they often require

automation and enhancements

to maximize efficiency. That’s where

Dayos

comes in. As a

trusted partner of Oracle Cloud, Workday, SAP, and ServiceNow , we build

AI-native support solutions

that seamlessly integrate with these platforms. Our technology

automates workflows, enhances decision-making, and optimizes enterprise efficiency

across

Finance, HR, Procurement, and IT Service Management (ITSM) .

With a

global presence

spanning the

United States, Singapore, Brazil, Hungary, and Australia , Dayos is built to support customers worldwide, operating in a

follow-the-sun model —just like the enterprises we serve. This ensures that businesses leveraging

Dayos AI

can access

continuous support, real-time AI-driven insights, and seamless automation

across their critical business functions, no matter where they operate.

Why Join Us? We are launching a global initiative to

train the next generation of AI-driven business technology professionals . This is an opportunity to build expertise in enterprise AI, automation, and SaaS platforms—all while getting paid to learn. What You Will Gain: ✅

Hands-on AI Training

– Work alongside AI engineers to understand how AI is transforming business applications. ✅

Industry Certifications

– Earn recognized credentials in

Oracle Cloud and Workday , learning how global companies manage Finance, HR, and Procurement. ✅

Real-World Experience

– Support

AI-driven automation and workflow solutions

that integrate with major enterprise platforms. ✅

A Global Career Path

– Collaborate with teams across

São Paulo, Sydney, Budapest, and the U.S. , supporting customers worldwide in a

24/7 follow-the-sun model .

What You Will Do As an

AI Business Applications Associate , you will: Learn & Master Enterprise SaaS Platforms

– Gain expertise in

ERP, HCM, and ITSM platforms , understanding how businesses run financial, HR, and operational processes. Work on AI-Powered Business Solutions

– Support AI automation that improves decision-making and optimizes enterprise workflows. Assist in Implementations & Support

– Configure, test, and optimize AI-driven business applications. Develop Problem-Solving Skills

– Work on cross-functional projects that impact real-world businesses, from large retailers to financial institutions.

This role is

ideal for those who want to build a career in AI, automation, and enterprise technology .

Who You Are We are looking for motivated, early-career professionals who are excited about the intersection of

AI and business technology . Minimum Qualifications: ✔

Recent graduate (0-2 years of experience)

in Computer Science, Business, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field. ✔ Strong

interest in AI, automation, and enterprise technology

with a desire to develop expertise in this industry. ✔ Eager to learn

Oracle Cloud, Workday, and AI-driven business applications . ✔ Strong

analytical and problem-solving skills . ✔ Ability to

multi-task

and work in a

fast-paced, global environment . ✔ Comfortable working with

cross-functional teams

(engineering, product, and sales). Bonus Points if You Have: ➕ Some exposure to

Python, SQL, APIs, or cloud computing . ➕ Knowledge of

ERP, HR, or financial systems . ➕ Relevant coursework or certifications in

AI, automation, or enterprise software . ➕ Experience in

data analysis and business process improvement .

What We Offer $5,000 investment in your training

– We cover the cost of

industry certifications

in Oracle Cloud and Workday to launch your career. Non-Billable Training Time

– The first

five weeks

are focused on learning, not client work. Clear Career Growth

– Fast-track promotion to

Analyst

within

12 months . Global, Fully Remote Opportunities

– Work from anywhere with support from our teams in

Brazil, the U.S., Singapore, Hungary, and Australia . Co-Working Stipend

– Access a budget for

co-working spaces

to collaborate in a professional setting when needed. Competitive Salary & Long-Term Career Growth

– Join a

high-growth industry

where demand for AI-driven enterprise talent is rising. Work on Cutting-Edge AI Solutions

– Be part of a team shaping the future of

enterprise automation .

Why This Role? This is

a career path that didn’t exist before—until now . If you're looking for a

high-growth opportunity

in an industry that

guidance counselors never mentioned , this is your chance to get ahead. At

Dayos , we are committed to creating an

inclusive workplace

that values

diverse perspectives —because

different perspectives = better products . If you want to work in an environment

where your ideas matter more than your identity , join us.

Interested? Apply Today! Know someone who would be a great fit? Share this opportunity with them!

Follow our company page for more job openings this week.

title: Analista de Segurança da Informação - PL
description:
Vamos falar sobre a Koin?

A Koin é uma empresa onde acreditamos que novas opções de pagamento e acesso ao crédito devem atender às reais necessidades de consumidores e empresas, com um processo totalmente digital e toda segurança possível. Desenvolver nossas soluções é realizar nosso propósito: melhorar a vida das pessoas, democratizando o acesso a bens e serviços.

Como é ser maker?

Na Koin acreditamos no jeito simples e transparente de fazer coisas complexas, contamos com espírito de time e senso de dono dos nossos makers para criar soluções disruptivas. Fazemos questão de comemorar as pequenas e grandes vitórias do dia a dia… Afinal, energia contagia.

Nosso formato de contratação é CLT, com possibilidade de trabalho híbrido no escritório em São Paulo, ou 100% r emoto.

Queremos pessoas que nos ajudem a:

Garantir a segurança dos ambientes Cloud da Koin com definições e recomendações dos padrões de segurança a serem seguidos; Padronizar, monitorar e criar alertas no SIEM adotando as melhores práticas de segurança; Analisar vulnerabilidades e desenvolver planos de ação e recomendações de mitigação dos riscos identificados para apoiar os times de tecnologia nas resoluções; Colaborar com os times de tecnologia e negócios em novas demandas e novos produtos para garantir a segurança desdeo início; Testar e participar da implantação e aplicação de novas ferramentas e serviços relacionados à cibersegurança; Participar na resposta a incidentes de segurança.

Requisito:

Experiência em AWS Cloud Security (Ex. IAM, SSO, VPN, WAF, GuardDuty, Inspector, CloudTrail, Config, Secrets Manager, KMS, Backup, etc.); Conhecimento em ferramentas de Segurança Cloud (CNAPPe/ou CSPM); Experiência em ferramentas de Segurança (WAF, Firewall, Antimalware, EDR e DLP); Conhecimento em configuração e análise de alertas em SIEM; Experiência em gestão e análise de vulnerabilidades; Conhecimento em Linux, Docker e Kubernetes para configurações de segurança e Hardening; Conhecimento em protocolos e camadas de rede; Conhecimento em frameworks e normas de segurança da informação (Ex. PCI-DSS, AWS Well-Architected Framework, AWS Security Maturity Model, CIS Controls, NIST, ISO27001, Mitre ATT&CK, OWASP, etc.).

Requisitos desejáveis:

Inglês ou espanhol intermediário; Conhecimento em DevSecOps e Infraestrutura como Código (IaC) com Terraform; Conhecimento das normas e leis SOX.

Benefícios :

Atualmente melhoramos sua vida com:

Vale refeição e/ou alimentação

- você usa como quiser, simples assim! Plano médico e odontológico

- queremos você cheio de saúde e sorridente! Convênio Farmácia

- sabe aquela gripe quando a coisa aperta no fim do mês? Aqui você compra remédios e desconta na folha! Horário Flexível

- confiamos em sua organização e bom senso com suas responsabilidades. Seguro de vida

- garantindo mais segurança e tranquilidade para você e sua família. Auxílio Creche

- Até seu filho completar 3 anos de idade e é válido para o papai também! MyHolidays

- Queremos que você conheça o mundo ! mas com um preço camarada em parceria com a Decolar Creditas Consignado

- Precisa de uma força? A gente ajuda! *Crédito sujeito àaprovação* No Dress Code

- Queremos que você seja livre para ser quem você realmente é. Vale transporte

- Seja no busão, trem ou no metrô, Seja no busão, trem ou no metrô, estamos sempre contigo.

title: Analista de Modelagem Hidráulica Pleno
description:
A Aegea Criada em 2010, a Aegea é líder no setor privado de saneamento básico no Brasil. Em cada município onde atua, leva mais saúde e qualidade de vida para a população, respeitando sempre o meio ambiente e a cultura local.

Programa Respeito dá o Tom O programa nasceu com a meta de espelhar a demografia da população brasileira no quadro de funcionários da empresa. Em 2022 a Aegea emitiu um título sustentável atrelado a metas que incluem alcançar 45% de mulheres e 27% de negros em cargos de liderança até 2030, sendo pioneira em se comprometer com meta de diversidade racial em cargos de liderança.

A Aegea tem o compromisso com a promoção de um ambiente de trabalho mais igualitário, diverso e inclusivo, e estimula o respeito e a valorização das diferenças. Aqui, todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados no processo seletivo, independentemente de raça, gênero, orientação sexual, religião, naturalidade, nacionalidade, deficiência, idade ou outras características. Responsabilidades e atribuições

Apoiar na análise e modelagem hidráulica de sistemas de abastecimento de água e esgotamento sanitário Realizar a análise crítica de dados, como medições de vazão e pressão, propondo melhorias nos processos e avaliando riscos Participar de estudos de viabilidade técnica e econômica em projetos de infraestrutura para saneamento básico Colaborar na elaboração de documentação técnica e validar estudos realizados por terceiros Apoiar a implementação de sistemas de monitoramento e controle para otimização do desempenho de redes de água e esgoto Interpretar normas e regulamentações, assegurando conformidade em projetos e operações Contribuir em reuniões técnicas, interagindo com equipes diversas e participando de discussões para a solução de problemas

Requisitos e qualificações

Superior completo em Engenharia Civil, Sanitária, Ambiental, Tecnólogo em Hidráulica e Saneamento, Gestão Ambiental ou áreas correlatas Vivência em modelagem hidráulica, utilizando softwares como Watercad, Sewercad, Bentley ou Epanet, entre outros Conhecimento intermediário/avançado em Excel, com foco em construção e análise de dados Conhecimento básico em GIS Disponibilidade para viagens pontuais em todas as unidades da Aegea

Informações adicionais

Assistência médica; Assistência odontológica; Zenklub (atendimento direcionado à saúde mental e nutricional); Serviço de assistência gratuito (social, jurídico e financeiro); Seguro de vida; Vale transporte; Gympass; Vale alimentação e/ou refeição; Participação nos Lucros e Resultados; Kit office.

title: UX/Product Design Lead
description:
Capgemini is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented UX/Product Design Lead for a top 10 US Insurance Carrier.

This role is responsible for designing engaging, intuitive, and effective digital experience. Provides a leadership role on projects to ensure project and user success by taking a broad view of the problem space that identifies root causes and actively works with business groups to resolve them. Collaborates with product owners, user research, and developers to problem solve through design exploration, ideation, and user validation

Our Client is one of the United States’ largest insurers, providing a wide range of insurance and financial services products with gross written premium well over US$25 Billion (P&C). They proudly serve more than 10 million U.S. households with more than 19 million individual policies across all 50 states through the efforts of over 48,000 exclusive and independent agents and nearly 18,500 employees. Finally, our Client is part of one the largest Insurance Groups in the world.

Responsibilities Understand desires of client and create attractive product Work closely with product managers and other teams (sales and marketing) to establish plan for product release Acknowledge budget and make plans in order to follow financial guidelines Create product prototypes prior to creating final product Adjust approach towards designs based on feedback provided

Requirements Work Experience in This Field: 7-9 years Experience with complex digital product design required Online portfolio showcasing recent work demonstrating a strong sense of design clarity is required in order to be considered English Proficiency: Fluent Required Education: Bachelor's degree preferred Online portfolio showcasing recent work required in order to be considered Required Branches of Study Design Human-Computer Interaction, or related Additional Preferred Branches of Study Cognitive Psychology Computer Science Other Critical Skills Product Design - Advanced User Research - Advanced Product Management - Advanced Software / Tool Skills Figma - Advanced UI/UX - Advanced Skills: Human Centered Design Problem-solving Proactive in seeking out problems Curiosity Collaboration Humility Encouraging team participation and contribution Focus on user outcomes Super communication Attention to detail

Benefits:

This position comes with competitive compensation and benefits package: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses Comprehensive benefits package Career development and training opportunities Flexible work arrangements (remote and/or office-based) Dynamic and inclusive work culture within a globally reknowned group Private Health Insurance Pension Plan Paid Time Off Training & Development

About Capgemini Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group €22.5 billion in revenues in 2023.

title: Quality Assurance Lead
description:
About Wipro Wipro Limited (NYSE: WIT, BSE: 507685, NSE: WIPRO) is a leading technology services and consulting company focused on building innovative solutions that address clients’ most complex digital transformation needs. We leverage our holistic portfolio of capabilities in consulting, design, engineering, operations, and emerging technologies to help clients realize their boldest ambitions and build future-ready, sustainable businesses. A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, strong commitment to sustainability and good corporate citizenship, we have over 250,000 dedicated employees serving clients across 66 countries. We deliver on the promise of helping our customers, colleagues, and communities thrive in an ever-changing world. · A PROUD HISTORY OF OVER 75 YEARS · FY22 REVENUE 10.4 BN USD · WE’RE PRESENT IN 66 COUNTRIES · OVER 1,400 ACTIVE GLOBAL CLIENTS

QA Lead: In projects, leading the test assessment, the creation of the test plan, test schedule, test case development, execution, and fixing for both functional and non-functional requirements. Can also be responsible for partner application, interfaces, rewrites and retirements that will take the work into cutover. Project execution is for both traditional/waterfall and agile. Agile requires early test engagement and automation using one of several tools, including HP ALM & Test Rail. Responsible for project intake and facilitating intake, team metrics, and process improvement and implementation for the test team(s) Actively participate in agile release/sprint planning, user story creation, and acceptance criteria, leading to test case development Work with automation specialist for test automation development Determine non-functional testing requirements (i.e. performance, usability, penetration testing, etc.) Assist with test environment and data management Define and track Quality Assurance metrics including defects, defect counts, test results, and test status Frequently communicate test progress, test results, and other relevant information to team members and management Facilitate test execution status and defect meetings Liaison for the business during UAT Responsible for test planning and leading execution of formal test plan Coordinate individual testers daily activities and assign work

Wipro is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and makes all employment and employment-related decisions without regard to a person's race, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability, sexual orientation, or any other status protected by applicable law. Any complaints or concerns regarding unethical/unfair hiring practices should be directed to our Ombuds Group.

title: Customer Success Client (100% Home Office)
description:
Customer Success Client (100% Home Office)

Descrição da Vaga: Estamos em busca de um(a)

Customer Success Client

para integrar nosso time e ser a ponte entre nossa empresa, os leads captados e os clientes da empresa. Você será responsável por qualificar leads, converter em agendamentos e garantir a melhor experiência para os clientes atuais, ajudando-os a alcançar resultados concretos. Principais Responsabilidades: Realizar interações estratégicas no Instagram, engajando e qualificando leads. Garantir contato rápido com leads recém-chegados (dentro de 2 horas) e conduzi-los ao agendamento. Prestar suporte e atendimento aos clientes da empresa, entendendo suas necessidades e propondo soluções para atingir melhores resultados. Organizar e manter atualizado o CRM com as informações de leads e clientes. Participar de reuniões semanais para alinhamento e planejamento estratégico. O que esperamos de você: Boa comunicação escrita, com habilidade para engajar leads e resolver dúvidas de clientes. Experiência em atendimento ao cliente ou social selling será um diferencial. Organização e atenção aos detalhes para gerenciar múltiplos processos com eficiência. Conhecimento em ferramentas de CRM ou disposição para aprender. Ter notebook próprio, internet estável e um ambiente adequado para trabalho remoto e reuniões. O que oferecemos: Salário fixo: R$ 1.547,60. Benefícios: Gift cards para Spotify, Netflix e iFood. Contrato PJ, com suporte para abertura do MEI, se necessário. Possibilidade de bônus por performance e aumento salarial conforme crescimento da empresa. Trabalho 100% remoto, com horário comercial flexível. Por que trabalhar conosco? Flexibilidade total para adaptar sua rotina diária. Ambiente colaborativo e inovador, com oportunidades de crescimento. Impacto direto nos resultados dos clientes e no sucesso da empresa. Como se candidatar: Candidata-se pelo .

title: Senior System Engineer
description:
T-Systems, a German multinational company and part of the Deutsche Telekom Group, is seeking a

Senior System Engineer DevOps

with a good command of English to work 100% remotely.

You will:

Be part of a DevOps team working on SaaS/PaaS platforms and/or services; Work with Azure, OpenAI , Terraform/OpenTofu and whatever you deem necessary to get the job done; Perform and define operational tasks related to best practices for service operations in our Azure or OTC environments; Automate and manage GIT pipelines and templates for the deployment and configuration of our Azure product packages; Having customer contact for enabling the product packages is part of your job.

Your qualifications:

Strong understanding of routing and firewall strategies; Strong practical knowledge of working with Azure or OTC; Strong understanding of ITIL processes like incident and problem management; Extensive experience in system administration (various Linux distributions); Experience with scripting, automation, test procedures, certificate handling; Know-how in DevOps, or interest in familiarization with Continuous Integration (CI), Continuous Delivery (CD); Experienced in using GitLab, Terraform/OpenTofu, Ansible, Shell scripts and Python; Willingness to familiarize yourself with sharepoint, confluence and Jira; Previous experience with operational support through troubleshooting and error analysis; Ensure efficient logging and monitoring (with tools like Graylog, Icinga or similar) and reliable troubleshooting.

Activities:

We are looking for an experienced Senior System Engineer (DevOps) to take ownership of the management and optimization of platforms running critical products and services in cloud environments such as Microsoft Azure or Open Telekom Cloud (OTC). In this role, you will play a key part in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our infrastructure, while working closely with the system architects to translate architectural designs into operational platforms. You will be responsible for automating, deploying, and maintaining infrastructure, while proactively monitoring systems for performance, security, and reliability. As a Senior System Engineer, your experience with cloud platforms, automation tools, and DevOps best practices will be essential to ensuring the successful and seamless operation of our services. You will also collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, providing technical guidance, resolving platform issues, and contributing to continuous improvements in our infrastructure and deployment processes.

Come be Magenta!

title: Desenvolvedor de back end
description:
Vaga: Desenvolvedor Back end

Responsabilidades: · Realizar análise técnica das soluções em cooperação à análise de negócio; · Projetar e implementar soluções back-end para web utilizando NodeJS; · Modelar e consumir API’s REST e GraphQL; · Modelar e consumir banco de dados relacional; · Ter experiência e/ou conhecimento profissional nas competências da vaga; · Praticar métodos ágeis; · Implementar melhorias técnicas e no processo de trabalho; · Compartilhar conhecimentos e experiências com demais colegas.

Requisitos: · Domínio em linguagem Typescript e/ou Javascript; · Conhecimentos essenciais de NodeJS; · Conhecimentos essenciais de VUE.js · Conhecimento em banco de dados relacional; · Conhecimento em padrões e boas práticas para web REST e GraphQL; · Conhecimento em versionamento com Git; · Conhecimento em métodos e técnicas de desenvolvimento ágil; · Boas habilidades de comunicação e escrita.

Benefícios: · Horário flexível · Banco de horas · Home office · Plano de saúde · Seguro de vida · Vale alimentação · Recruta xpert · Plano de cargos · Auxílio especialização · Folga no aniversário

Se você preenche os requisitos e também tem paixão por tecnologia e inovação, envie seu currículo para o RH da xpert e venha fazer parte do nosso time!

title: Ux Designer Pleno
description:
O Magalu é uma das maiores empresas de varejo do Brasil, reconhecida por sua inovação e presença digital. O time de tecnologia do Magalu é formado por profissionais inovadores e apaixonados por transformar o varejo digital. Com foco em soluções ágeis e escaláveis, desenvolvem projetos que impactam milhões de clientes. Em um ambiente colaborativo, buscam constantemente a excelência em tecnologia e inovação.

Responsabilidades

Trabalhar em parceria com o time de produto, fazendo ponte entre tecnologia e negócio, tendo clareza sobre a estratégia de negócio da empresa, mantendo o produto alinhado a ela; Ter como base para o trabalho métricas de sucesso de negócio (KPIs); Liderar projetos de design de interfaces de alta qualidade para plataformas Web e Mobile, desde a concepção até a implementação; Realizar pesquisas de usuário, análise de jornada e testes de usabilidade para compreender as necessidades dos usuários e garantir uma experiência excepcional, além de realizar análises de mercado para identificar necessidades, comportamentos e oportunidades de melhoria; Fomentar a inovação por meio da experimentação com novas tecnologias, metodologias e práticas de design para melhorar continuamente nossos produtos e serviços, bem como propor melhorias para nosso Design System; Criar wireframes, protótipos e designs visuais intuitivos e eficazes que atendam às necessidades dos usuários e aos objetivos de negócios; Identificar problemas legados de design e definir soluções para eles.

Conhecimentos Técnicos:

Habilidade de comunicação em todos os níveis, em ambiente remoto, com os times de produto, desenvolvimento, dados, usuários finais e stakeholders, com capacidade para apresentar e justificar decisões de design de forma clara e com argumentação convincente; Manter-se atualizado com relação a tendências e técnicas de UX/UI e disseminar isso dentro do time. Proficiência em ferramentas de design como Figma e outras ferramentas relevantes; Conhecimento em design de interface e experiência do usuário, com uma forte compreensão dos princípios de usabilidade e design centrado no usuário; Formação acadêmica em Design, Design de Interface, Design de Interação ou áreas relacionadas; Experiência prévia comprovada UX/UI Designer ou em um papel semelhante, com um portfólio que demonstra suas habilidades em design de produtos e soluções criativas; Experiência em arquitetura da informação e design de interfaces para plataformas Web (desktop e mobile e Apps (iOS e Android); Diferencial: Experiência de com produtos digitais relacionados ao ecommerce/varejo;

Benefícios que oferecemos:

VR/VA ,

Vale Transporte ,

Assistência Médica

e

Odontológica e Auxílio Creche . Gympass

para bem-estar e saúde. Bolsa de estudo

com até

50% de desconto . Descontos especiais

nas empresas do

Grupo Magalu

(Magalu, Netshoes, Época Cosméticos, Estante Virtual, Kabum entre outras). Auxílio Creche

Modelo de Trabalho

title: Desenvolvimento IOS Pleno - Híbrido/SP - 122198
description:

Com mais de 35 anos de mercado e localizada em 16 países, a GFT emprega mais de 10.000 pessoas ao redor do mundo sendo 3.000 pessoas no Brasil. Aqui, a diversidade, a igualdade e a inclusão estão no centro e garantir um ambiente de trabalho seguro para todas as pessoas faz parte de quem somos. O que estamos buscando?

Desenvolvimento IOS Pleno - Hibrido/SP - 122198

Trata-se de atuação hibrida, 3 vezes presencial por semana na região de Interlagos - SP.

inovadoras

title: Especialista de Automação, Controle e Sensoriamento
description:
A Aegea

Criada em 2010, a Aegea é líder no setor privado de saneamento básico no Brasil. Em cada município onde atua, leva mais saúde e qualidade de vida para a população, respeitando sempre o meio ambiente e a cultura local.

Programa Respeito dá o Tom O programa nasceu com a meta de espelhar a demografia da população brasileira no quadro de funcionários da empresa. Em 2022 a Aegea emitiu um título sustentável atrelado a metas que incluem alcançar 45% de mulheres e 27% de negros em cargos de liderança até 2030, sendo pioneira em se comprometer com meta de diversidade racial em cargos de liderança.

A Aegea tem o compromisso com a promoção de um ambiente de trabalho mais igualitário, diverso e inclusivo, e estimula o respeito e a valorização das diferenças. Aqui, todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados no processo seletivo, independentemente de raça, gênero, orientação sexual, religião, naturalidade, nacionalidade, deficiência, idade ou outras características.

Responsabilidades: Desenvolver e implementar padrões técnicos para automação e sensoriamento, garantindo uniformidade e eficiência nos processos. Revisar e aprovar projetos de automação das unidades operacionais, assegurando conformidade com diretrizes técnicas. Programar e desenvolver lógicas de controle para CLPs Siemens e Schneider, incluindo a criação e revisão de diagramas elétricos. Prestar suporte técnico e consultoria às unidades operacionais, auxiliando na implementação de soluções avançadas de automação. Especificar sensores e instrumentos, garantindo a correta seleção e aplicação nos projetos. Realizar treinamentos e workshops para equipes operacionais, promovendo a padronização e disseminação de boas práticas.

Requisitos: Superior completo em Engenharia de Controle e Automação ou Engenharia Elétrica. Experiência sólida com CLPs Siemens e/ou Schneider, incluindo programação e lógica de controle. Conhecimento em redes de comunicação industrial e interpretação de diagramas elétricos. Experiência com gestão de projetos de automação. Inglês intermediário. Disponibilidade para atuar no modelo presencial em Porto Alegre/RS.

Benefícios: Assistência médica; Assistência odontológica; Zenklub (atendimento direcionado à saúde mental e nutricional); Serviço de assistência gratuito (social, jurídico e financeiro); Seguro de vida; Vale transporte; Gympass; Vale alimentação e/ou refeição; Participação nos Lucros e Resultados; Kit office.

Somos um time de Profissionais Além da Conta!

A Aegea é a empresa líder no setor privado de saneamento básico no Brasil. Trabalhamos por um futuro sustentável, colocando nossa paixão na prática fazendo a diferença nos +760 municípios em que atuamos. Levamos saúde, qualidade de vida e dignidade para mais de aproximadamente 33 milhões de pessoas de norte a sul do Brasil. Empenhamos todos os esforços para contribuir com a sociedade por meio de inovações e serviços que vão além do tratamento e da distribuição de água e esgotamento sanitário. Nossa paixão é tornar cada dia melhor tanto o ambiente que oferecemos aos nossos colaboradores, bem como nos serviços que entregamos. Somos uma marca que pede licença para melhorar a vida da população de centenas de cidades, levando bem estar e prosperidade.

Nossos talentos são o que a Aegea Saneamento e suas concessionárias tem de único. Somos formados por mais de 21.000 colaboradores espalhados por diversos cantos do Brasil, levando soluções de saneamento eficiente e sob medida, respeitando as peculiaridades dos locais onde estamos presentes. Trabalhamos diariamente na construção de uma empresa eficiente, diversa, ética e sólida, buscando aprender e evoluir constantemente.

title: Accounting Specialist
description:
We’re looking for a

Accounts Payable Specialist

to join our team in

São Paulo

and help shape the future of contextual advertising as we continue to expand globally.Who We AreAt Seedtag, we lead the way in contextual advertising with our machine learning-powered platform. Our technology provides superior brand safety, human-like content understanding, and advanced cookieless targeting, making ads more engaging and respectful. Founded by two ex-Googlers in 2014, we’ve grown to over 600 Seedtaggers across 18 countries, raising €250M to revolutionize digital advertising.Your ChallengeYou will be responsible for handling vendor invoicing on a daily/weekly basis.You will be responsible for Purchase order reconciliations (Invoice vs PO).You will consider accruals/provisions booking at the month-end.You will be part of the monthly AP closing accounting process.You will actively collaborate in the Payment run process.You will support and cooperate in Front Office inquiries: Email and phone support.You will perform and engage following the department's KPIs and SLAs.You will actively support the team in projects related to new market integrations and internal corporate projects.You will be part of the automation and harmonisation of tasks within the team.What You’ll Need to SucceedHave a business management or finance-related degree.Have between 1-3 years of a strong accounting background.Are fluent in English and Spanish. Other languages would be an advantage.Have thorough experience with spreadsheets and Excel.Are attentive to detail and well-organized.Possess strong prioritisation skills; flexibility and the ability to multitask daily.Are not afraid to speak up, make mistakes, learn from them and propose improvements.Have an international and multicultural mindset.Why Join Seedtag?Growth & Opportunity: A key moment to join with vast career development prospects.Flexibility: At Seedtag, we trust you to balance work and life effortlessly with the option to work from home, the office, or even the beach in our hybrid mode.Learning & Development: Online courses in ODILO, and optional English or Spanish group classes.Inclusive Culture: We foster a supportive environment that values personal growth.Fun & Connection: Participate in team activities, company offsites, and more!Additional PerksFlexible benefits plan: Restaurant, transportation, and kindergarten vouchers.Health insurance: Comprehensive coverage included.Gympass: Access to wellness programs and fitness classes.Seedsave Program: Exclusive discounts to help you save for the future.Ready to join the Seedtag adventure?

Send us your CV and let’s grow together!At Seedtag, we’re committed to creating an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive. We welcome diverse perspectives as they fuel our innovation and growth. Please let us know if you require accommodations during the hiring process and we’ll ensure a positive and accessible experience.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Graphic Designer or Creative Lead, Creative Designer, Senior Designer, and Digital Designer are all alternative job titles that match our client's requirements. This flexible role can be offered either part-time or full-time with the opportunity to work for a 100% and permanently remote Digital Marketing Agency. You can be based anywhere with strong/reliable internet connectivity. A full job description with company info will be provided upon application . The role manages 12-15 social media content calendars for clients across B2B sectors per month. Collaborating with the Lead Strategist (former graphic designer) to develop brand identities by executing new concepts, designs of various content types, graphics, social media, email campaigns, website design, and more. It's

100% digital design

for social media posts, website design, posters, etc. Requirements:

Minimum five years of marketing agency or startup experience in a graphic design role is required. Must have experience designing for senior-level accounts. The team is entirely remote -- experience working remotely is necessary. Photoshop, Illustrator, and all graphic design tools expertise are required. Must have video skills, motion graphics, and basic knowledge of UX/web design. Experience working with AI tools to create graphic design and design output. Strategic mindset - the ability to strategically direct what a graphic should look like whenever needed. Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to present well to clients and internally. Extremely high level of written and oral English communication.

You'll thrive in the environment if you know how to wear multiple hats and love generating ideas and executing them independently. Knowledge of what it means to design within the B2B sector and be creative even within conservative design limits. Resourcefulness is essential—you aren't afraid when you don't know how to do something because you usually figure it out on your own.

CV/Resume and online portfolio applications are welcomed. A complete job description with the agency name (website) will be shared before the first interview.

title: Chief Scientist (Polyurethane Foam）
description:
Midea is a leading Global Fortune 500 high technology company. Committed to bring innovation to life, Midea Group aims to develop solutions for our international customers that not only meet the requirements of the present, but also the challenges of tomorrow and the day after tomorrow. Midea develops, produces, and sells innovative products in five competence areas: Smart Home, Industrial Technologies, Building Technologies, Robotics & Automation, and Digital Innovation. We operate in more than 195 countries with over 150,000 employees. Midea embraces talents of characters of aiming high, customer first, transformation and innovation, inclusion and partnership to join the mission together to integrate with the world, and to inspire your future! To lead this effort, Midea has created this new position of Chief Scientist (Thermal Management & Refrigeration Technology. This position is preferred to be located in China.

Essential Job Duties: Lead the planning and development of insulation and thermal management technology platforms, working closely with R&D engineers specializing in foam materials, vacuum insulation materials, and system design to establish next-generation thermal insulation roadmaps and implementation plans. Drive cutting-edge research in insulation and thermal management technologies, with a strong focus on polyurethane foam insulation materials. Oversee the formulation development of polyurethane functional materials and pilot testing of new formulations to facilitate technology transfer from R&D to product applications. Improve and optimize polyurethane foam production processes to enhance product quality and manufacturing efficiency, collaborating with the R&D team to solve technical challenges in production. Promote technical collaboration with universities, research institutes, and leading upstream enterprises in the field of insulation and thermal management materials. Stay up to date with the latest advancements in insulation and thermal technologies, providing technical guidance and training to R&D engineers to enhance overall team expertise.

Qualifications: Ph.D. in Polymer Materials Processing, Polymer Chemistry & Physics, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, or Mechanical Engineering, with 10+ years of experience in relevant fields. Strong foundation in material formulation and applied research, with expertise in polyurethane foam processing and optimization. Familiarity with mold design and the ability to enhance material flowability and overall performance through process improvements. 5+ years of experience in polyurethane foam material R&D, with a deep understanding of insulation materials for refrigerators. Extensive knowledge of polyurethane foam production processes and equipment, with a proven ability to independently resolve technical challenges. Strong innovation skills and a collaborative team mindset. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and project management abilities.

This role could be based in China, with the possibility of a hybrid arrangement. Candidates should be open to either relocating to China or spending approximately half of their time working there while partially working remotely.

title: Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist
description:
About this Role

Location: Remote (Brazil)

United World Telecom (est. 1996) offers cloud communication solutions to help businesses around the world communicate with their customers. We have a global and diverse team and over 8,000 customers worldwide.

We’re growing our marketing team and are looking for a Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist with strong technical analytics skills to manage, run, and monitor ad campaigns. An ideal candidate must have proven experience in tracking and managing paid advertisement budgets, ensuring the best returns on the campaigns. They must reside in

Brazil

and work alongside the digital marketing team to create strategic PPC campaigns that drive performance and deliver results.

PPC Responsibilities

Manage and Optimize Campaigns

Manage, monitor, optimize, plan, and create PPC campaigns across channels such as Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media. Research and analyze data to identify the most effective keywords (add relevant keywords and negative keywords) and strategies for our PPC campaigns. Conduct competitors analysis to identify new opportunities and improve our PPC campaigns. Optimize bidding at keyword, placement, device, geographic, demographic, and other levels. With the help of our in-house content team, write engaging and concise copy to modify ads to boost click-through rates and landing pages to boost conversion rates.

Conversion Tracking Implementation and Troubleshooting

Audit, implement, and maintain accurate conversion tracking across all paid campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, , etc.). Set up custom conversion events and parameters to align with account goals and ensure accurate reporting.

Google Tag Manager Expertise

Build and manage GTM containers to deploy tags, triggers, and variables for tracking user interactions (e.g., form submissions, button clicks, scroll depth). Debug and troubleshoot tag firing issues using tools like Google Tag Assistant and GTM preview/debug mode. Optimize GTM setup for scalability and ensure proper data layer implementation.

GA4 Setup and Optimization

Configure GA4 properties, events, and goals in line with campaign KPIs. Troubleshoot discrepancies between GA4, Google Ads, and other platforms to ensure consistent data reporting. Implement enhanced measurement events and custom dimensions/metrics as needed.

Data Accuracy and Reporting

Conduct regular audits of conversion tracking, tags, and analytics accounts to ensure data integrity. Resolve tracking issues (e.g., broken tags, missing events, attribution gaps) swiftly and effectively.

Collaboration and Communication

Work closely with developers to ensure accurate data layer implementation and troubleshoot complex tracking issues. Provide actionable recommendations to improve the quality of conversion data and its alignment with business goals.

Monitoring & Reporting

Perform daily account monitoring and management of PPC campaigns: Review expensive under-performing keywords, ensure PPC campaign does not exceed weekly and monthly ad spend budget, and maintain Quality Score, impression share, and other important metrics. Document and update processes and changes in the internal document server. Send daily & weekly reports to the marketing team.

Requirements / Skills

:

Proven experience as a PPC Specialist or similar role, with a solid understanding of PPC advertising principles and best practices across various platforms. 5-10 years PPC experience in SaaS and telecom industries with B2B emphasis is preferred but not required. Proven experience with Google Ads and Bing Ads; Facebook ads and

ads experience would be an added bonus. Advanced Proficiency in Google Tag Manager: Experience setting up and managing complex GTM implementations, including custom HTML/JavaScript tags and data layer dependencies. Expertise in Google Analytics 4 (GA4): Proven track record of configuring GA4 properties, events, and reports for detailed campaign tracking and attribution analysis. Strong Knowledge of Conversion Tracking: Hands-on experience implementing and troubleshooting tracking setups for platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and

Ads. Debugging and Problem-Solving: Familiarity with debugging tools such as Google Tag Assistant, GTM Debug Mode, Chrome DevTools, and server-side tracking setups. Ability to integrate tracking systems with CRM platforms, marketing automation tools, or custom APIs is preferred but not required. Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and website architecture to collaborate effectively with developers and resolve tracking issues. Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with other team members. Google Ads and Bing Ads certifications within the last 6 to 12 months are a plus. Must be located in

Brazi .

Schedule

: 40 hours a week

Benefits

:

Paid time off Growth opportunities Work with a global team

Compensation

: Will be based on the candidate's experience, earnings in previous jobs, and the local job market.

To apply, email your resume and cover letter to

: Meryl D’Sa-Wilson, Digital Marketing Manager:

title: Manager, Corporate Development
description:
Manager, Corporate Development

Easy Payroll Global Limited Ireland and their local affiliate ITOS Brasil LTDA is looking to hire a Manager, Corporate Development, to provide services to companies within the Perseus Group (“Perseus”).

Perseus is an Operating Group of Constellation Software Inc. (csisoftware.com | TSX:CSU), a Canadian-based publicly held company. Perseus has over 6,000 employees, across 70+ software business units, operating in 12+ software industry verticals, and located in over 40 offices.

Location:

Brazil

The Role: The services to be provided by the Manager, Corporate Development, encompasses building strong strategic business relationships that lead to the sourcing of current and future M&A opportunities for Perseus. These relationships will be formed with software company decision makers (e.g. CEOs, VPs of Corporate Development, founders, and/or owners) of software companies, M&A advisors, and private equity/ venture capital professionals. Success in this role is defined by building and maintaining meaningful relationships that ultimately lead to Perseus’ acquisition of software companies.

The process of initiating relationships, maintaining relationships, and ultimately making an acquisition typically takes multiple years. Measurable outcomes, continuous value-add through many M&A conversations/ relationships, and high-quality market research are what ultimately generate successful acquisitions through time.

Outcomes: Develop and manage an M&A pipeline through Salesforce CRM and create market maps to build strong relationships in assigned software industry vertical(s). Meet and exceed monthly M&A targets, such as meaningful contacts and other measurable M&A sourcing KPIs. Work both autonomously and with M&A leadership to qualify M&A opportunities with efficiency. Ensure the lead database is allocated accurately within portfolio verticals. Effectively qualify opportunities at the top-end of the acquisition funnel to maintain focus for the Portfolio Managers of the business units.

Relevant Experience & Competencies: At least 3+ years of experience in a Business Development/Sales position at a software company or client-facing M&A/finance role within business development, sales, and/or account management. Preference for experience in outbound-focused origination roles. A clear interest in developing a long-term pipeline of meaningful relationships with prospects as a career trajectory within software investing. Previous high-performance in Business Development, winning in an autonomous role, or prior success in other walks of life outside professional BD experience, such as entrepreneurship, will be considered. Advanced verbal and written communication skills, with the confidence and executive presence to speak with CEOs, M&A advisors, corporate development, private equity and venture capital professionals. Organized, detail-oriented, and able to work variable hours. Extraordinary work ethic, proactive with a sense of urgency.

Other Requirements: This role will require occasional in-person travel, which may include Canada, the U.S., Mexico, Colombia, Chile, and/or Peru, and can be primarily performed remotely.

title: ANALISTA PLANEJAMENTO COMERCIAL SR
description:
QUEM SOMOS? Prazer, somos a Suzano! Aqui a gente acredita que inovação e sustentabilidade caminham juntas. Dessa união, nasce uma atitude plena de significado: a inovabilidade. Pautados por ela, pensamos fora da caixa e enxergamos longe para lidar com os desafios do século 21. Nós plantamos e cultivamos árvores para transformar essa matéria-prima renovável em Bioprodutos para o dia a dia de mais de 2 bilhões de pessoas. Cultivamos a vida na folha do caderno que alfabetiza as crianças, na fralda que protege os bebês, no copo de café que não prejudica o meio ambiente, em papéis absorventes e na comodidade do uso de uma embalagem sustentável.

PLURAL Iguais e diferentes. Singulares e plurais. Acreditamos que a diversidade nos fortalece, por isso, não fazemos distinção entre candidatos seja por deficiência, gênero, orientação sexual, raça/etnia, idade, origem, constituição familiar ou estética. Aqui você pode descobrir novos desafios, novos horizontes, novos objetivos e até mais sobre si mesmo!

Responsabilidades e atribuições: DADOS: GS 15 Local: São Paulo - SP Inscrições até: 12/03/25.

O QUE VOCÊ VAI FAZER? Responsável pelo Shipping Plan (Planejamento de Embarque) do mercado asiático para embarques de celulose carga solta (break-bulk); Realizar o planejamento de embarque a partir do porto de embarque e acompanhamento até sua chegada no destino, visando garantir o suprimento de acordo com a necessidade planejada; Garantir o atendimento do plano de vendas e reposicionamento de estoques; Balancear o plano de embarques considerando as previsões de produção, estoques na cadeia Brasil, atualização da chegada dos navios e necessidade comercial; Realizar análises de otimização da operação e tratamento de desvios do plano; Atuar nas rotinas de Rolling Forecast da unidade de negócios, bem como nos processos de declaração e nomeação.

Requisitos e qualificações: QUEM NOS INSPIRA? Alguém que acredite em nossos valores; Com iniciativa; Perfil analítico; Que proponha ideias e soluções.

O QUE A SUZANO ESPERA DE VOCÊ? Ensino Superior Completo; Domínio do Pacote Office; Capacidade analítica, autonomia e

hands-on; Inglês avançado (oral e escrito) - mandatório.

Informações adicionais: NÓS TEMOS MUITO MAIS QUE UM PAPEL NA SUA VIDA! Cuidados da sua saúde: Plano Médico, Odonto e Seguro de Vida; VR ou Refeitório, VA para ajudar nas compras do mercado e, no final do ano, VA adicional; Sabemos que a renda fixa é importante, mas, além disso, oferecemos uma renda extra por meio do nosso Programa de Remuneração Variável (Anual); Para você se preparar para o futuro temos a Previdência privada; Praticamos o home office em áreas corporativas, a flexibilidade de horários, além do dress code casual; Para gerar e compartilhar valor disponibilizamos cursos e treinamentos E-learning em nossa plataforma digital, o UniverSuzano; Na Suzano, só é bom para nós se for bom para o mundo! Por isso, durante o ano realizamos muitas ações legais e você poderá se tornar um voluntário do nosso programa Voluntariar; Também contamos com um Clube de Descontos, com diversos parceiros, para você aproveitar!

PARA A FAMÍLIA Como empresa cidadã, entendemos a importância da chegada de uma criança. Por isso, oferecemos extensão da licença paternidade para 20 dias e maternidade para 180 dias. O benefício também vale para papais e mamães que adotarem ou obtiverem a guarda judicial da criança e para casais homo afetivos; Para as mamães retornarem tranquilas ao trabalho, oferecemos um auxílio creche bem bacana. Pensando em oferecer sempre as melhores condições para nosso time e suas família, disponibilizamos um auxílio mensal em dinheiro que se aplica ao pai ou mãe que tiver sob sua guarda filho ou filha com alguma necessidade especial; Aqui seus filhos e filhos não ficam de fora, oferecemos um vale brinquedo e um kit material escolar recheado! E, se no final do ano os filhos mandarem bem na escola, reconheceremos o seu esforço por meio do nosso programa Estudar é Crescer, com um prêmio em dinheiro que poderão usar como preferir.

SUZANO FAZ BEM

O

Faz Bem

tem um cuidado especial para você, colaborador(a) e sua família, confira baixo:

Tele Faz Bem: Atendimento gratuito e confidencial ao colaborador(a) Suzano e seus(as) dependentes(as) nas seguintes frentes: Apoio psicológico e de assistência social, orientação jurídica, financeira, de atividade física e nutricional; Plataforma de saúde mental – A Wellz, oferece sessões de terapia online subsidiadas pela Suzano de forma confidencial, além de várias oportunidades de auto cuidado como jornadas, diário de humor, terapia em grupo, entre outros; Plataforma de saúde física – A Wellhub é uma plataforma completa de bem estar com acesso a academias, aplicativos e aulas on-line com liberdade de escolha de atividades. Programa de gestantes – O programa “Bebê Saudável” realiza o acompanhamento gestacional através de contato telefônico e abordagens, além do recebimento de um kit personalizado.

#VemSerSuzano #PlantamosOCuidado #OrgulhoEmPertencer

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Lessons.com is a platform that connects students with the best local instructors for lessons in everything from music and sports to academics and hobbies. We’re passionate about empowering learners and helping instructors grow their businesses. Join our dynamic team to shape the future of personalized learning experiences.

Role Overview We are a small but powerful team that’s improving millions of people’s lives. We are looking for a talented

Full Stack Engineer

to join our team. In this role, you will build scalable, user-friendly applications that deliver an exceptional experience for both students and instructors. You will work closely with designers, product managers, and other developers to enhance our platform and bring new features to life.

Why Work for Lessons?

100% remote. Excellent compensation in US Dollars. Work with global teams and prominent brands. Endless opportunities for personal growth. Vast engineering challenges and responsibilities. Building features that are used by millions of people. Ability to make a huge impact quickly and excel professionally.

Responsibilities

Design and develop scalable and responsive full-stack applications. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code for both front-end and back-end components. Integrate applications with databases and third-party APIs. Participate in the planning and execution of development projects. Stay updated on emerging technologies, frameworks, and best practices.

Qualifications

5+ years experience as a Full Stack Developer. Fluent English . Strong understanding of front-end and back-end development principles. Proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and modern frameworks/libraries. Experience with server-side languages (e.g., Node.js, Python, Java, C#). Knowledge of database systems. Self-directed and capable of working effectively in a highly innovative and fast-paced environment.

Preferred Skills

Node.js React MongoDB GraphQL AWS Server-side Rendering

description:

Nice to have Experience with a CICD development environment

title: Supply Chain - Administrative
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented

Supply Chain Administrator

to support warehousing, logistics, fleet management, and data auditing operations. This role will serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers, manage invoice tracking, and ensure data accuracy across multiple platforms. The ideal candidate must be able to work in

Central Time

and have access to

VoIP, Slack, and Gmail

for communication. This position reports directly to the

Supply Chain Manager . Key Responsibilities: Serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers. Respond to emails regarding system support, shipment tracking, and general inquiries. Schedule and coordinate dock appointments for warehouses. Audit receipts, incomplete shipments, and warehouse records to ensure accuracy. Track and categorize invoices (e.g., handling, storage) for proper cost allocation. Review and audit

Warehouse Glove (WG) invoices

for accuracy. Manage freight quotes and coordinate shipments to optimize costs and efficiency. Audit fleet management platforms ( WEX, Geotab, Samba ) to ensure records are up to date and driver information is synchronized. Process and file fleet-related invoices, ensuring correct breakdown of umbrella invoices. Assist in accident claim processing and related administrative tasks. Analyze unit

exit inspection data

to identify high cost items requiring attention. Recommend maintenance strategies and cost-effective solutions to the

Operations Associate

based on

maintenance guideline decks

to minimize unnecessary replacements. Requirements: Experience in supply chain administration, logistics, or related fields. Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail. Fluent English Proficiency in data auditing, invoice tracking, and logistics coordination. Ability to work in 8- 5pm

BRT Time zone Proficiency in

VoIP (3cx), Slack, and Gmail

for communication. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

title: Senior Devops Engineer (South America)
description:
Fully Remote Contract Position for Devops Engineers in Europe or South America.

Saturn Cloud is building an AI engineering platform for the next 100 million developers and data scientists. We enable everyone from hobbyists to Fortune 1000 to launch easily-configurable cloud notebooks with GPUs, jobs, deployments and a lot more. We are an early startup with significant funding from top venture capital firms and corporate partners like AWS, Microsoft, NVIDIA, and AMD.

This position is for a Senior Devops Engineer. This role spends a significant amount of time working with Kubernetes.

Devops engineers at Saturn Cloud do a variety of tasks. Here are some projects we have worked on: Created an authentication server for our Traefik forward-auth middleware. Building support for GCP, Azure, and Oracle Cloud.

For this position candidates should have: Experience working with Python and Go

. Experience working with Kubernetes. Experience working with Terraform and Helm Experience with Engineering best practices.

Code quality, maintainability, and test-ability are very important to us.

title: Sr. Football Trader
description:
We’re Entain. Our vision is to be the world leader in sports betting and gaming entertainment by creating the most exciting and trusted experience for our customers, revolutionizing the gambling space as we go.

We're home to a global family of more than 25 well-known brands, and with a focus on sustainability and growth, we will transform our sector for our players, for ourselves and for the good of entertainment.

Senior Football Trader Summary of role; To support and maximise the growth and profitability of Entain’s South American labels, by leading on the effective day to day trading and management of positions and liabilities underpinned by local knowledge. Prioritisation of work within the South American Trading team, mentoring and developing Traders. The role has a critical impact on Entain Trading results. Combining both global and local betting/football knowledge Senior Trader will be a point of contact for the wider business/Trading managers whilst maintaining the Football product in accordance with risk guidelines and group strategy.

Key Responsibilities: ● Work closely with Group Trading and Commercial team to understand and bring to life daily and long-term strategy. ● Delivery of product, specifically the production and trading of prices for S. American events. ● Point of contact for the wider business when on shift, always conversing professionally in person and via email/teams. ● Prioritise work and areas of focus for Traders on shift. ● Take ownership of issues as they arise and escalate accordingly. ● Monitor Pre-Match & In-Play betting on key LATAM football leagues, controlling liabilities and always adhering with compliance and regulatory guidelines. ● Trade key events using automated odds models and manage market risk in accordance with liability management protocols and market conditions ● Create specials and boosted bets (Pre and Live) in alignment with commercial team. ● Supplement automation by trading manual In-Play markets on key events. ● Monitor local and global betting markets and customer betting activity in real time. ● Identify translation and content issues across the S. American product. ●Track expected line-ups and fixture news on social media to ensure a relevant offer and generate unique markets for the S. American customer base. ● Ensure the Entain Football product is maintained in line with strategy ● Identify betting trends supported by statistical data and pass information to Senior members of the team / management. ● Maintain internal relationships with Marketing, PR and the Content teams to maximize publicity opportunities and engagement with the media and social media. ● Monitor and identify customer behaviour annotating where appropriate and liaise with Sportsbook, profiling, responsible gambling and compliance teams in line with trading strategy. ● Resolve technical and operational incidents in real time and escalate where appropriate. ● Ensure flexibility within the role - remain adaptable to pricing, trading and market driver awareness.

Key Accountabilities: ● Ensure accuracy of pricing and event management in line with group strategy. ● Develop and maintain key relationships with other Traders, Senior Traders, Operational managers and Heads of Trading functions. ● Adhere to risk management guidelines. ● Identify and/or report technical deficiencies to Operational Manager / Head of Football. ● Communicate any issues encountered in-real time to management and Trading Support. ● Ensure active and effective communication with internal Marketing, PR and Retail teams for maximum exposure of Entain prices. ● Identify improvements to trading applications and capabilities. ● Implement new ideas around all product markets and technology to improve performance, profitability, competitive advantage and customer experience ● Monitor down-streams ensuring optimal product presentation, escalating where required.

Qualifications and Educational Requirements: ● GCSE Maths at grade A or equivalent

Specialist Skills and Experience Required: ● In depth knowledge of South American football. ● 5+ years trading experience. ● Ability to adapt skill set to ensure success of top line strategy. ● Use of algorithm-based trading applications. ● Demonstrate understanding of key time awareness, league code profiles, compiling, market drivers and Asian awareness. ● Highly numerate with a solid grasp on numbers, odds and their significance. ● Analytical or statistical background. ● Ability to overcome technological difficulties calmly whilst demonstrating a positive outcome mentality. ● Flexibility around working times (including unsociable hours/weekends) ● Strong time keeping. ● High attention to detail. ● Strong communications skills. ● Team player that encourages and supports all other members of the team. ● Critical thinker.

Additional Information: ● Full training on Entain systems to be provided.

Diversity and equal opportunities

As a global employer, Entain is committed to providing a safe, fun, and inclusive culture where our people feel like they truly belong.

We are a multicultural business that values, celebrates and respects individual differences, so whatever your sexuality, gender, gender identity, ability, age, race, religion or belief, you will have a voice here, and the space to do your best work.

Our diverse internal networks provide the support for you to express your views and make a positive difference, all for the good of entertainment.

#LI-Hybrid

title: Auditor externo
description:
O grupo líder mundial em Teste, Inspeção e Certificação, está com vagas de emprego abertas para o Projeto 2025 em Pelotas e região.

A vaga é para autuar como auditor agrícola em um dos maiores projetos da empresa à nível nacional, uma oportunidade para contribuir com o desenvolvimento da qualidade no agronegócio nacional.

Não é necessário experiência prévia.

Os selecionados passarão por imersão no Projeto, recebendo treinamento sobre as atividades e uso dos sistemas de inspeção, a primeira fase de seleção é realizada integralmente online.

Buscamos profissionais que incorporem nossos valores, não têm medo de desafios, busquem inovar, experimentar e se aprimorar rapidamente. Nosso objetivo é contratar e reter os indivíduos mais brilhantes, oferecendo crescimento profissional e oportunidades de desenvolvimento em toda a carreira. Sobre a oportunidade: Estamos buscando Auditores Agrícolas que contribuirão com atividades de coleta de dados através do acompanhamento de testes transgênicos em pontos de recebimento de soja (PDR's) em silos, armazéns e cooperativas.

Atividades: Visitar PDRs (armazéns); Garantir execução das metodologias; Revisão das informações coletadas em campo; Comunicação tempestiva com os líderes alinhamento das divergências encontradas; Verificação de formulários e validação dos dados coletados em campo.

O que buscamos: Disponibilidade total de horários (inclusive aos finais de semana); Disponibilidade para viagens pelo estado do Rio Grande do Sul durante até 60 dias; CNH B ativa; Ensino médio completo; Facilidade em manuseio de tecnologias (tablets e smartphone); Ética, responsabilidade, comprometimento, organização

Remuneração: valor R$ 1.750,00 + ajuda de custo de R$ 1.780,00 + bonificação mensal de R$ 200,00 -

Contratação CLT (temporário de até 60 dias).

Candidatos contratados que se destacarem em suas funções poderão ser efetivados em diferentes cargos e setores dentro da empresa, além de terem prioridade de contratação em outros projetos pontuais da divisão de Agronegócios.

Em caso de viagens a empresa custeia todas as despesas: deslocamento entre as cidades de origem e de atuação, hospedagem, transporte, aluguel de veículo, alimentação, lavanderia, internet.

A empresa desempenha papel fundamental para o fortalecimento do setor, inspecionando anualmente, mais de 30% dos grãos produzidos no país e mais de 50% do volume exportado nos principais portos brasileiros.

for more information on our projects.

48 months Project budget : 20M EUR

Qualifications and skills: · At least 10 years professional experience in the field of Transport, including the following sub-sectors: roads, rail, urban transport, air transport, waterborne transport, logistic platforms, transport electrification and transport digitalization. · Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects. · A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic

Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors:

title: Python AI Developer
description:
ob Title: Python AI Developer Location:

Remote (open to candidates worldwide) Type:

Full-Time Compensation:

Competitive Salary Company:

Confidential Client (AI Talent Development Software Company)

What if your expertise in AI and Python development could help create innovative solutions that shape the future of personal and professional development? If you're ready to step into a role where your skills can directly impact our AI-driven talent development platform, this is your opportunity!

About Us: Our confidential client is an innovative Artificial Intelligence (AI) company, focused on revolutionizing personal and professional development through advanced AI-driven coaching, simulation, and habit development technology. Utilizing their proprietary technology they empower individuals, teams, and organizations of any size, worldwide, to enhance leadership, optimize performance, and foster a culture of continuous learning. Join a pioneering team dedicated to transforming how people learn, grow, and thrive.

Role Overview As an AI Python Developer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing AI components that drive our platform's capabilities. This role focuses on building agent architectures and Python-based backends, ensuring that innovative AI features are seamlessly integrated into our applications. You will work closely with the development team to ensure that the AI functionalities align with production-ready environments and meet user needs effectively.

About the Founder / CEO Fueled by a relentless passion for service, the company's founder, a seasoned entrepreneur with a track record in launching and revitalizing businesses, aims to revolutionize professional coaching by making it accessible to all. With deep expertise in AI and human behavior, the founder envisions transformative solutions powered by advanced technology. Your role as an AI Python Developer will be integral to realizing this vision, as you contribute to the development of intelligent systems that empower users across the globe.

About PHYSXX: Our Core Values Our organization operates under the guiding principles of PHYSXX, which stands for: Passion:

A commitment to our mission of empowering individuals and teams to achieve their best. Humble:

A willingness to accept feedback and learn from experiences, demonstrating ongoing growth. Hungry:

An eagerness to continuously improve skills and contributions, pushing past limitations. Smart (People Smart):

The capacity to understand and manage our emotions and those of others. X-Factor:

Commitment to executing projects with excellence and without excuses.

SCCKEPPP Framework: Ensuring Functional Fit The SCCKEPPP framework ensures that we align the right talent with the right roles effectively. It includes the following components: Skills:

Core technical and soft skills required for success in the role. Circumstances:

Personal and external life circumstances that could influence work success. Conditions:

Formal prerequisites and qualities necessary for the job. Knowledge:

Required knowledge areas critical for performance in the role. Experience:

Type and depth of experience needed for the position. Past Performance:

Achievements or performance metrics indicating excellence in similar roles. Potential:

Traits indicating future growth and adaptability.

The “What” Pillar: Ensure a Functional Match (“Be SCCKEPPP-tical”) Skills (S) : Proficient in Python programming with a strong focus on AI and machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). Familiarity with agent architecture design and implementation. Experience building backend services and APIs to support AI-driven applications. Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles. Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented, collaborative environment. Excellent problem-solving skills and the capacity to break down complex technical challenges.

Circumstances (C) : A stable home environment conducive to remote work. Eagerness to learn and grow in a fast-paced, dynamic tech environment. Ability to communicate clearly with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Conditions (C) : Holds a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Data Science, or a related field. 2+ years of experience in Python development, with a focus on AI or machine learning. Comfort working independently in a remote setting with effective time management.

Knowledge (K) : Understanding of best practices in AI development and deployment. Familiarity with cloud services and their integration with AI applications. Awareness of software deployment and monitoring to align AI features with production-ready environments. Experience (E) : Proven experience in developing and deploying AI solutions in production environments. Portfolio showcasing relevant projects and contributions in AI development. Evidence of collaboration with cross-functional teams to integrate AI functionalities. Past Performance (PP) : Examples of successful AI projects developed that resulted in meaningful user engagement and business impact. Feedback from team members and stakeholders highlighting your contributions to team projects.

Potential (P) : Demonstrated ambition and a passion for AI technologies and their application. Willingness to seek guidance from senior developers to enhance backend integration and production readiness.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in computer science, Data Science, AI, or a related field, or equivalent experience. 3+ years of experience in Python development, with a focus on AI and machine learning. Proficiency in machine learning libraries and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch). Solid understanding of algorithms, data structures, and software design principles. Experience with data manipulation and analysis tools (e.g., Pandas, NumPy). Familiarity with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) is a plus. Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment.

Preferred Skills:

Knowledge of Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques. Experience with front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus. Familiarity with Agile development methodologies. Understanding of data visualization techniques and tools.

Why Join Us:

Innovative Impact:

Be part of a team that is shaping the future of AI-driven coaching, making a meaningful impact on personal and professional growth worldwide. Career Growth:

Join a fast-growing startup with plenty of opportunities for personal development and career advancement. Creative Freedom:

Enjoy the autonomy to experiment, innovate, and push the boundaries of mobile app design and development. Collaborative Culture:

Work in a dynamic environment that values creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning. Competitive Compensation:

We offer a competitive salary, benefits, and opportunities for professional growth.

How to Apply

If you are a passionate Python AI Developer eager to make a difference and be part of an innovative AI startup, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume, portfolio (if applicable), and a cover letter to with "Python AI Developer Application" in the subject line.
