title: Desenvolvedor(a) Backend Java Sênior
description:
Sobre nós

O Magalu é uma das maiores empresas de varejo do Brasil, reconhecida por sua inovação e presença digital. O time de tecnologia do Magalu é formado por profissionais inovadores e apaixonados por transformar o varejo digital. Com foco em soluções ágeis e escaláveis, desenvolvem projetos que impactam milhões de clientes. Em um ambiente colaborativo, buscam constantemente a excelência em tecnologia e inovação.

#vemserfeliz #OrgulhodeSerMagalu

Descrição do Cargo:

Trabalhar em time ágil participando das cerimônias, contribuindo para manter o ambiente saudável entre os membros da equipe e promover entregas constantes com qualidade e segurança; Desenvolver o produto com qualidade por meio da criação de testes e revisão de código, prover melhorias e corrigir eventuais problemas nos produtos por meio de priorização do Product Owner a fim de garantir a satisfação do cliente com a empresa; Atualizar o produto em ambiente de produção por meio de integração contínua, garantindo sua estabilidade;

Para atuar nessa função é essencial que você tenha experiência com:

- Desenvolvimento Orientado a objetos; - Desenvolvimento de testes unitários; - Programação na linguagem Java, preferencialmente a partir da versão 8; - Conhecimento em Spring Framework, trabalhamos bastante com Spring-Boot; - Criação de APIs HTTP seguindo o padrão REST; - Versionamento usando Git; - Arquiteturas baseadas em micro serviços; - Modelagem e uso de Banco de Dados NoSQL como MongoDB; Se você conhece a respeito do Cassandra, excelente! - Uso de cache, com Redis, por exemplo; - Mensagerias com Kafka; - Desenvolvimento baseado em TDD e BDD.

Se você conhecer ou tiver experiência com algum dos itens abaixo é melhor ainda:

- Métodos ágeis; - Criação de testes de integração e testes de carga; - Uso de containers com Docker; - Kubernetes; - Experiência em alguma ferramenta de observability (NewRelic, DataDog, Elastic APM, etc) e/ou agregador de logs (Graylog, Logstash, etc) - Quarkus - PostgreSQL

Benefícios que oferecemos:

VR/VA, Vale Transporte, Assistência Médica e Odontológica e Auxílio Creche. Gympass para bem-estar e saúde. Bolsa de estudo com até 50% de desconto. Descontos especiais nas empresas do Grupo Magalu (Magalu, Netshoes, Época Cosméticos, Estante Virtual, Kabum entre outras). Auxílio Creche

Modelo de Trabalho

Adotamos o modelo 100% remoto, proporcionando flexibilidade, enquanto mantém a interação virtual com a equipe para garantir uma colaboração eficaz e um ambiente de crescimento contínuo. ‘’Se você busca um ambiente de crescimento e desafios,

Vem ser feliz’’! Nossos valores nos unem e nossas diferenças nos potencializam como um grupo. Mais do que igualdade, buscamos equidade: Aqui, temos espaço para sermos autênticos, independentemente de gênero, etnia, raça, orientação sexual, clero ou deficiência.

title: Head of Sales - LATAM
description:
At

Rasayel

( we are building the next-generation platform to help businesses grow over WhatsApp.

We closed our seed round with some ambitious investors in the US & EU.

We dream big and have lots of exciting plans ahead.

We are hiring a

Head of Sales - LATAM -

to lead our sales efforts in Brazil , Mexico

and beyond!

You will lead and develop a world class sales organisation in LATAM. This role is for you if you have previously excelled as a salesperson

and

as a sales manager in a high-growth B2B SaaS company. The role is for you if you are ready to take your next step on your ambitious journey towards becoming a VP of Sales / CRO within the next 3-5 years.

Please note: this is a

Pessoa Jurídica (PJ)

position.

Essentials - experience You were a top-performing salesperson in a high-growth, B2B SaaS / software product company. You have 2+ years experience as a Sales Lead, Sales Manager (or similar) in a high-growth, ventured-backed B2B SaaS company. Your team is/was one of the top performing teams in the company.

Essentials - skills You regularly join sales calls with your team, co-sell with them, and do whatever it takes to help get deals closed. You lead from the front. You can develop a well-honed sales process and sales playbook. Your deal reviews are rigorous. You ask probing question of your team to ensure that deals are properly qualified and pipeline value is real. You run weekly 1-on-1s with all your direct reports. You know when and how to intervene when things are not on track. You genuinely love coaching and developing your team. You are fully invested in the career development of your team. You can think strategically about product, market positioning, pricing and packaging. You are opinionated on the CRM, tools and tech stack that a modern B2B SaaS sales team needs in order to succeed. You have a clear wishlist in mind You are active on

and you engage in social selling. You thrive at hosting webinars and speaking at conferences / large events as part of your role to spread the word about the product your are selling.

Essentials - personality traits You are excited and motivated to own the revenue target for LATAM. You are obsessed about reaching your full potential. You are aiming for a VP of Sales or CRO role in the next 3-5 years. You want to make a lot of money. You believe in hitting the ground running. You have a bias for action over analysis. You deliver measurable impact in your first 100 days. You are extremely ambitious and results focused, but you are also a decent human being. You give feedback honestly and calmly. You never shirk hard conversations. But you never use aggression as part of your management tactics. You have an owner mindset. You are a hustler by default. You think from first principles and you have excellent judgement.

Essentials - other You are fluent in English, Portuguese and Spanish. You are based in or near São Paulo.

Core responsibilities Fully own the LATAM Revenue target. Fully own Pipeline creation in Year 1, via sales team outbound. For Year 2 onwards, you will jointly own Pipeline creation with marketing. Regularly join calls with the sales team and co-sell with them. Fully own the sales process and sales playbook. You will make major adjustments to our current process / playbook or tear them up and start from scratch if needed. Run 1-on-1s with each team member every week. Manage, motivate and coach the sales team. Implement career development plans for each team member.

What do we offer? Competitive base salary. Generous and uncapped commission structure. Meaningful equity. Remote, in Brazil. Super smart colleagues, world class product, and an environment for folks with big ambitions. You'll play a critical role in scaling a high-growth B2B SaaS company. You'll have a world class product backing you up – it sells itself. You’ll get to work with a team of talented and high performing folks, in a company that values decency and kindness ( After succeeding in this role, you will be perfectly positioned for a VP of Sales or CRO role (either with Rasayel, or with another company!).

Please note: this is a

Pessoa Jurídica (PJ)

position.

No recruitment agencies, and no middleman of any kind. We never go through an agency to talk to people who want to work with us.

title: Lead Data Architect
description:
Building a risk applications and tools for innovative international top-tier hedge fund from the ground up, comprising the systems for traders, pre-trade checks and analysis, risks and limits management, reports of trading activities, FIX connectivity, market data providers connectivity (e.g. Bloomberg B-pipe), etc The Team is focused on the development and maintenance of various database applications supporting Risk Management. The successful candidate will have considerable and proven experience in database design, PL/SQL development, a good working knowledge of end-user and server-side data processing techniques, a good understanding of SDLC and agile development methodologies.

title: SAP MDG Senior Consultant
description:
About Us Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth. Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.

Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.

As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators . Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.

THE ROLE Master Data Governance consultant, responsible for functional and technical support/maintenance of master data objects in SAP MDG, ECC, S4H, FIORI.

What You Will Do Planning and execution of activities related to the implementation of the SAP-MDG solution. Key Responsibilities : Evaluation of the current information management of Architecture-Data (AS IS) and future model profiling (TO BE). SAP MDG Implementation: management of design and implementation phases( technical and functional ). Design and execution master data configurations for main catalogs governed by MDG: clients – vendors (BP figure), products, materials and finances, including data harmonization that involves de-duplication and massive changes. Generation of technical requirements to ensure that the technological environment allows the replication of data in different instances-related modules. Generate SAP product and solution roadmaps around the defined data strategy. Communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders to understand specific business data needs and to translate those requirements into a comprehensive solution. Workplan follow-up and progress reports.

What It Takes +3 years’ experience MDG implementation projects: initial, roll out and upgrades +5 year experience in SAP technologies related Understanding the SAP MDG technical framework: BADI, BAPI / RFC / FM, workflows, BRF +, business services, IDOC, Floorplan Manager, WebDynPro, Fiori y API de MDG. Conducted previous SAP MDG Implementations, technical and functional phases. Knowledge of SAP data dictionary tables, views, relationships and correspondence of data architecture for ECC and S4HANA for various SAP master and transactional data entities, including a great depth of functional and knowledge of central master data objects such as customers, vendors, materials and finance specific data. Ability to transform business and operational needs into technical solutions. Extensive knowledge of SAP best practices and ASAP methodology (SAP certifications a plus Effective communication and development of work teams, as well as relationship with client teams related to the project. Goal Oriented Fluent English (Advance-Native Level, oral-written)

Be fully aligned to the our core values: Think Big - Be courageous and bold. Aspire to greatness. Relentlessly pursue market innovation. Set the standard by which others follow. Create solutions that have a meaningful impact. Solve the challenges our customers don’t know they have. Be Curious - Be a lifelong learner. Seek out new ideas to serve customers. Understand our competition and the world. Be permanently dissatisfied with the status quo. Challenge preconceptions. Focus on the future rather than yesterday. Take Action - Be the first. Don’t wait. Take accountability. Inspire others by doing. Fail fast and learn from mistakes. Make a difference every day. Stronger Together - Respect, trust and look out for each other. Celebrate diverse perspectives. Listen. Build connections and belonging. Act with integrity. Give back. One Syniti family.

What We Offer Trust that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing. Growth. We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story. Support. We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone. Curiosity and genuine interest in you. We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all. Recognition. We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them. An open organisation. Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Job Summary We are seeking a highly skilled Staff Engineer or AWS Devops to join our team. This role is Fully Infrastructure focused***** As part of this role, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing infrastructure, pipelines, and processes in AWS to enable efficient development and deployment workflows. You will work closely with nearshore DevOps engineers and the broader engineering team to support our rapidly scaling FinTech-focused systems. This is a senior-level role requiring in-depth knowledge of AWS infrastructure, networking, and modern DevOps practices. Location : Mexico or Brazil Contract : 12 months Remote

from Mexico or Brazil

Key Responsibilities AWS Infrastructure Management: Architect, deploy, and maintain AWS services including VPCs, EC2 instances, RDS, DynamoDB, S3, and EKS. Networking & Security: Configure and secure VPCs, manage API gateways using service mesh technologies (e.g., Istio), and implement Cloudflare for API security. Infrastructure as Code: Use Terraform and Helm charts to manage infrastructure at scale. Kubernetes Operations: Deploy, maintain, and scale Kubernetes clusters (EKS) and integrate with supporting services like AWS ECR. Observability: Implement and maintain monitoring solutions with Datadog to ensure optimal system performance and uptime. Messaging Systems: Work with SQS, Kafka, and other AWS-based or third-party messaging solutions. Containerization & CI/CD: Leverage GitHub for CI pipelines and utilize ArgoCD for robust deployment workflows. Database Scaling: Support and scale RDS or MySQL systems and implement application-level or database-level sharding strategies. Software Support: Collaborate with engineering teams using Go for service-level development.

Preferred Qualifications Education & Experience: Minimum of 5+ years in a senior or staff-level DevOps or infrastructure role. Technical Expertise: Proficiency in AWS, Linux environments, Kubernetes, Terraform, and service meshes. Programming Skills: Experience with one or more development languages (Go preferred). FinTech: Previous experience in the FinTech domain is a plus but not required.

Nice-to-Have Skills Strong experience scaling RDS or MySQL for growing systems. Experience with API gateways, Istio service mesh, and scaling Kubernetes environments. Hands-on experience with ARGOCD for continuous delivery.

Why Join Us? Opportunity to work on cutting-edge FinTech systems. Collaborate with a high-caliber engineering team driving rapid growth. Play a critical role in scaling the company's infrastructure and database systems. Long-term project with a 12-month contract and potential extensions.

title: Desenvolvedor(a) FullStack Sênior
description:

title: Chief Scientist (Polyurethane Foam）
description:
Midea is a leading Global Fortune 500 high technology company. Committed to bring innovation to life, Midea Group aims to develop solutions for our international customers that not only meet the requirements of the present, but also the challenges of tomorrow and the day after tomorrow. Midea develops, produces, and sells innovative products in five competence areas: Smart Home, Industrial Technologies, Building Technologies, Robotics & Automation, and Digital Innovation. We operate in more than 195 countries with over 150,000 employees. Midea embraces talents of characters of aiming high, customer first, transformation and innovation, inclusion and partnership to join the mission together to integrate with the world, and to inspire your future! To lead this effort, Midea has created this new position of Chief Scientist (Thermal Management & Refrigeration Technology. This position is preferred to be located in China.

Essential Job Duties: Lead the planning and development of insulation and thermal management technology platforms, working closely with R&D engineers specializing in foam materials, vacuum insulation materials, and system design to establish next-generation thermal insulation roadmaps and implementation plans. Drive cutting-edge research in insulation and thermal management technologies, with a strong focus on polyurethane foam insulation materials. Oversee the formulation development of polyurethane functional materials and pilot testing of new formulations to facilitate technology transfer from R&D to product applications. Improve and optimize polyurethane foam production processes to enhance product quality and manufacturing efficiency, collaborating with the R&D team to solve technical challenges in production. Promote technical collaboration with universities, research institutes, and leading upstream enterprises in the field of insulation and thermal management materials. Stay up to date with the latest advancements in insulation and thermal technologies, providing technical guidance and training to R&D engineers to enhance overall team expertise.

Qualifications: Ph.D. in Polymer Materials Processing, Polymer Chemistry & Physics, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, or Mechanical Engineering, with 10+ years of experience in relevant fields. Strong foundation in material formulation and applied research, with expertise in polyurethane foam processing and optimization. Familiarity with mold design and the ability to enhance material flowability and overall performance through process improvements. 5+ years of experience in polyurethane foam material R&D, with a deep understanding of insulation materials for refrigerators. Extensive knowledge of polyurethane foam production processes and equipment, with a proven ability to independently resolve technical challenges. Strong innovation skills and a collaborative team mindset. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and project management abilities.

This role could be based in China, with the possibility of a hybrid arrangement. Candidates should be open to either relocating to China or spending approximately half of their time working there while partially working remotely.

title: Engineering Leader, Technical Due Diligence (Renewable Energy)
description:
A mission driven Global Leader in independent engineering and technical advisory for the renewable energy industry, is hiring for their Due Diligence Technical Advisory business in Latin America across Solar, Storage and Wind projects.

The Engineering Leader will lead a highly collaborative team, at a point of real growth and opportunity across the region, but based out of Brazil.

This is a high profile, strategic position that offers a technically capable leader exciting scope in a Global business (Reporting to the Global Head of Renewables).

This role is based out of their established Sao Paolo, Brazil office, with business travel and work outside of the office as required. Excellent communication skills are required in Portuguese, plus English and Spanish requirements to manage people in the region and to collaborate internationally.

Core Responsibilities of the successful postholder:

Oversee Engineering Due Diligence reviews and Technical Advisory initiatives for project financing and M&A transactions. Play a pivotal role in reviewing and innovating on cutting edge operational strategies in pursuit of accurate assessments.

Compile comprehensive IE and TA reports, integrating insights from multidisciplinary teams. Ensure top-tier quality and consistency in technical and commercial analyses to exceed client expectations.

Manage and schedule internal resources. Ensure project deliverables stay on time, on target, and on budget.

Mentor and train junior staff and assume responsibility for the internal growth of the team.

Drive financial success with full P&L responsibility, developing and executing revenue and business plans while identifying growth opportunities in the region. Accountable for ensuring financial targets (revenue, profit, enterprise value, etc.) for Due Diligence are met.

Anticipate customer needs by creating strong partnerships with Sales and Business Development. Work with lenders and developers as the main client interface for the business. Attend meetings, lead discussions, and build lasting partnerships.

Qualifications/skills of the successful postholder:

University degree (equivalent to a bachelor’s degree) in Engineering or related field An expectation of 10 years directly related experience in Renewables specifically in Solar, including at least five years of people management and leadership experience. An excellent communicator to technical and commercial decision makers, owners, operators, lenders as well as to investors. Excellent communication skills in English, plus Portuguese and Spanish

title: Business Development and Account Manager
description:
We are looking for an Business Development and Account Manager (Brazil)

Description of work: We are looking for a Sales and Account Manager, responsible for Brazil, to create long-term, trusting relationships with our customers. The role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, develop new business from existing clients and actively seek new sales opportunities. This position may require travel up to 30%.

Position Responsibilities · Serve as the lead point of contact for all customer account management matters, · Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships, · Develop new business opportunities with present and new customers in dedicated region and create new opportunities based on an in-depth understanding of market potential, specific customer requirements and company capabilities, · Generate sales revenue with existing customers in line with the organization objectives and goals, · Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits, · Develop trusted advisor relationships with key accounts, customer stakeholders and partners, · Clearly communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders, · Present the business case for pursuing specific opportunities including profit potential, strategic advantage, competitive analysis and win probability, · Meet commitments within cost, schedule and performance parameters, · Adapt to changing business environment and priorities by complex problem solving and conflict resolution, · Undertake other duties/projects assigned.

Desired Skills and Experience · Relevant Work Experience: 5+ years either in Technical or Account/Sales related position where constant communication with external customers has been required · Business Understanding: Knowledge of the Airport/Ground Handler/Airline Industry · Ability to grasp the technology and product concepts to refer their value to customers · Demonstrable ability to communicate, present and influence key stakeholders at all levels of an organization, including executive and C-level

title: Cientista de Dados
description:
Job Description A Genesis Consulting tem oportunidade imediata para

Cientistas de Dados

experientes com verdadeira paixão por crescimento profissional e entrega de valor através da tecnologia. Nossos clientes são alguns dos principais líderes mundiais em diferentes indústrias e o candidato fará parte de projetos desafiadores para construir e apoiar soluções técnicas para suas necessidades.

Responsabilidades: Pesquisar, desenvolver e implementar metodologias avançadas de Large Language Models (LLMs) para criação de produtos de dados baseados em IA generativa. Desenvolver e aprimorar técnicas de Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), combinando embeddings e bancos de vetores para melhorar precisão e relevância das respostas dos modelos. Aplicar técnicas de segurança e governança para IA generativa, mitigando alucinações, viés e riscos éticos no uso de LLMs. Automatizar e monitorar o desempenho de modelos generativos em produção, utilizando frameworks de MLOps e ferramentas de observabilidade de IA. Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com times de engenharia, produto e negócio para transformar desafios empresariais em soluções escaláveis baseadas em IA generativa.

Experiências e Qualificações: Experiência comprovada no desenvolvimento e aplicação de LLMs e técnicas de NLP avançadas. Forte domínio de Python, frameworks como Hugging Face, LangChain, LlamaIndex, e ferramentas de MLOps para produção de modelos generativos. Proficiência em Vector Databases (FAISS, ChromaDB, Weaviate, Milvus, Pinecone) e pipelines de dados escaláveis. Conhecimento avançado em Machine Learning, Deep Learning e Fine-Tuning de modelos fundacionais. Experiência com deploy e monitoramento de modelos em produção, incluindo técnicas de inferência eficiente, caching e otimização. Familiaridade com conceitos de governança, segurança e alinhamento de modelos generativos.

Minimum Education: Bacharelado em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia, Estatística ou áreas correlatas.

Other: Certificações em OCI são um plus. Inglês fluente é um plus.

title: Manager, Corporate Development
description:
Manager, Corporate Development

Easy Payroll Global Limited Ireland and their local affiliate ITOS Brasil LTDA is looking to hire a Manager, Corporate Development, to provide services to companies within the Perseus Group (“Perseus”).

Perseus is an Operating Group of Constellation Software Inc. (csisoftware.com | TSX:CSU), a Canadian-based publicly held company. Perseus has over 6,000 employees, across 70+ software business units, operating in 12+ software industry verticals, and located in over 40 offices.

Location:

Brazil

The Role: The services to be provided by the Manager, Corporate Development, encompasses building strong strategic business relationships that lead to the sourcing of current and future M&A opportunities for Perseus. These relationships will be formed with software company decision makers (e.g. CEOs, VPs of Corporate Development, founders, and/or owners) of software companies, M&A advisors, and private equity/ venture capital professionals. Success in this role is defined by building and maintaining meaningful relationships that ultimately lead to Perseus’ acquisition of software companies.

The process of initiating relationships, maintaining relationships, and ultimately making an acquisition typically takes multiple years. Measurable outcomes, continuous value-add through many M&A conversations/ relationships, and high-quality market research are what ultimately generate successful acquisitions through time.

Outcomes: Develop and manage an M&A pipeline through Salesforce CRM and create market maps to build strong relationships in assigned software industry vertical(s). Meet and exceed monthly M&A targets, such as meaningful contacts and other measurable M&A sourcing KPIs. Work both autonomously and with M&A leadership to qualify M&A opportunities with efficiency. Ensure the lead database is allocated accurately within portfolio verticals. Effectively qualify opportunities at the top-end of the acquisition funnel to maintain focus for the Portfolio Managers of the business units.

Relevant Experience & Competencies: At least 3+ years of experience in a Business Development/Sales position at a software company or client-facing M&A/finance role within business development, sales, and/or account management. Preference for experience in outbound-focused origination roles. A clear interest in developing a long-term pipeline of meaningful relationships with prospects as a career trajectory within software investing. Previous high-performance in Business Development, winning in an autonomous role, or prior success in other walks of life outside professional BD experience, such as entrepreneurship, will be considered. Advanced verbal and written communication skills, with the confidence and executive presence to speak with CEOs, M&A advisors, corporate development, private equity and venture capital professionals. Organized, detail-oriented, and able to work variable hours. Extraordinary work ethic, proactive with a sense of urgency.

Other Requirements: This role will require occasional in-person travel, which may include Canada, the U.S., Mexico, Colombia, Chile, and/or Peru, and can be primarily performed remotely.

title: Azure Data Engineer (Relocation to Portugal)
description:
Your connection with Aubay starts in the following lines: Aubay Portugal is a multinational French company, in Portugal since 2007. We have offices in Lisbon and Oporto and we are a specialized consultant in Management, Implementation, Development and Maintenance of Information Systems. We have more than 150 active partners and we operate in sectors such as banking, insurance, telecommunications, services, energy and transports.

What are we looking for? +5 years of experience in Data Engineering; Microsoft Azure covering - designing, building, testing, and maintaining cloud applications and related services. Strong understanding of core concepts - Azure data storage, Azure compute, data connections, APIs, Databricks, Data Factory, Data Lake, and Azure Synapse on the cloud. English level B2 or higher; Willingness to move to Portugal (Mandatory).

What do we have to offer you? Health Insurance; Feedback&Coffee – the system that includes Aubay’s Performance Management Cycle, with regular moments of feedback and the Career Progression Model; Hybrid work model; A Training Academy designed to think of you and your needs. You can count on technical and behavioural training sessions (e-Learning and classroom), Meet&Techs, Webinars and Mentoring; Events and Teambuildings.

What makes us different? Our organizational culture is based on values such as transparency, team spirit, regular feedback and continuous learning; Reference prizes and birthday present; We don’t have a dress code; We call you by your name and we all address each other informally; Coffee and snacks at your disposal; You will grow in good company. Isn´t that the best way to improve professionally?

If we got your attention, we now hope to spark your enthusiasm. Ready for the first phase? We are waiting for you!

We will use personal information that you have sent us to consider your application for the relevant function. By giving us your information/documents by email, you consent to Aubay Portugal treating your personal information. Your privacy is important to us. Please check our Privacy Policy, which explains how we will use and store your personal information. It also explains the rights you have regarding your information and how you can contact us for clarification of questions or requests.

title: Profissional Arquiteto Cloud AWS - Sênior
description:
Código da vaga: 43833

Sobre a BRQ Digital Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior. Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia! É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei #fera Arquiteto Cloud, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq

- O que procuramos? Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Apache Kafka, Kubernetes, Amazon SQS & SNS DynamoDB, Amazon S3 e API Gateway

- Responsabilidades:

Definir e evoluir arquiteturas cloud-native, garantindo resiliência e escalabilidade. Liderar iniciativas estratégicas para modernização de sistemas legados e adoção de microsserviços. Colaborar com times multidisciplinares, promovendo boas práticas de engenharia e governança. Garantir eficiência operacional e otimização de custos, aplicando princípios de FinOps e Well-Architected Framework.

- O que temos pra te oferecer? Mais do que um plano de carreira ! A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Manage the infrastructure environment through cross technology administration execution of scripting and monitoring automations; Manage the environment incidents with a focus on service restoration; Act as operations support for all computer, network, storage, security, or automation incidents / requests; Should be having experience in core workflow management system for handling incidents, service requests, problems and changes and Including a tool for a configuration management database. English Advanced

title: SAP MDG Senior Consultant
description:
About Us Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth. Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.

Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.

As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators . Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.

THE ROLE Master Data Governance consultant, responsible for functional and technical support/maintenance of master data objects in SAP MDG, ECC, S4H, FIORI.

What You Will Do Planning and execution of activities related to the implementation of the SAP-MDG solution. Key Responsibilities : Evaluation of the current information management of Architecture-Data (AS IS) and future model profiling (TO BE). SAP MDG Implementation: management of design and implementation phases( technical and functional ). Design and execution master data configurations for main catalogs governed by MDG: clients – vendors (BP figure), products, materials and finances, including data harmonization that involves de-duplication and massive changes. Generation of technical requirements to ensure that the technological environment allows the replication of data in different instances-related modules. Generate SAP product and solution roadmaps around the defined data strategy. Communicate effectively with clients and stakeholders to understand specific business data needs and to translate those requirements into a comprehensive solution. Workplan follow-up and progress reports.

What It Takes +3 years’ experience MDG implementation projects: initial, roll out and upgrades +5 year experience in SAP technologies related Understanding the SAP MDG technical framework: BADI, BAPI / RFC / FM, workflows, BRF +, business services, IDOC, Floorplan Manager, WebDynPro, Fiori y API de MDG. Conducted previous SAP MDG Implementations, technical and functional phases. Knowledge of SAP data dictionary tables, views, relationships and correspondence of data architecture for ECC and S4HANA for various SAP master and transactional data entities, including a great depth of functional and knowledge of central master data objects such as customers, vendors, materials and finance specific data. Ability to transform business and operational needs into technical solutions. Extensive knowledge of SAP best practices and ASAP methodology (SAP certifications a plus Effective communication and development of work teams, as well as relationship with client teams related to the project. Goal Oriented Fluent English (Advance-Native Level, oral-written)

Be fully aligned to the our core values: Think Big - Be courageous and bold. Aspire to greatness. Relentlessly pursue market innovation. Set the standard by which others follow. Create solutions that have a meaningful impact. Solve the challenges our customers don’t know they have. Be Curious - Be a lifelong learner. Seek out new ideas to serve customers. Understand our competition and the world. Be permanently dissatisfied with the status quo. Challenge preconceptions. Focus on the future rather than yesterday. Take Action - Be the first. Don’t wait. Take accountability. Inspire others by doing. Fail fast and learn from mistakes. Make a difference every day. Stronger Together - Respect, trust and look out for each other. Celebrate diverse perspectives. Listen. Build connections and belonging. Act with integrity. Give back. One Syniti family.

What We Offer Trust that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing. Growth. We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story. Support. We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone. Curiosity and genuine interest in you. We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all. Recognition. We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them. An open organisation. Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: Sr Backend Developer - Kotlin
description:
Descrição da vaga Aproxime-se. A Invillia não apenas transformou a forma como as empresas mais revolucionárias do mundo criam e desenvolvem estratégias, negócios e produtos digitais. Inovou também a maneira como pessoas apaixonadas por tecnologia, de qualquer lugar do planeta, podem interagir, evoluir, mais conectados do que nunca. Para a Invillia, não importa onde você está. Se é um país grande. Ou uma cidade pequena. E sim a sua vontade. As suas ideias. O seu potencial. O tamanho do seu talento_

Responsabilidades e atribuições O profissional será responsável em prover soluções técnicas para novas features e dar o suporte necessário as features já existentes, afinal, nem tudo são flores. Esperamos também que essa pessoa auxilie os outros membros do time em questões técnicas não esquecendo de fornecer a melhor solução para o negócio. Algo que prezamos bastante é qualidade, isso inclui um código limpo e legível (clean code). Também é desejável que o mesmo tenha um perfil intra-empreendedor, onde seus objetivos estejam alinhados com os objetivos da empresa, afinal, temos muito orgulho do que fazemos aqui!

Requisitos e qualificações Experiência em desenvolvimento com Kotlin (principalmente) ou Java; Experiência em desenvolvimento com Spring (Boot, Data, Cache, etc); Conhecimento em comunicação async; Conhecimentos em AWS; Conhecimentos em Git e Git-Flow; Experiência com bancos de dados SQL (principalmente) e NoSQL; Padrões de Projetos (Clean Code, SOLID, DRY, KISS); Desenvolvimento com foco em qualidade: testes unitários, testes de integração e Sonar(métricas); Experiência em micro serviços e sistemas concorrentes; Continuous delivery (GitAction); Inglês Avançado

title: Supply Chain - Administrative
description:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented

Supply Chain Administrator

to support warehousing, logistics, fleet management, and data auditing operations. This role will serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers, manage invoice tracking, and ensure data accuracy across multiple platforms. The ideal candidate must be able to work in

Central Time

and have access to

VoIP, Slack, and Gmail

for communication. This position reports directly to the

Supply Chain Manager . Key Responsibilities: Serve as the primary point of contact for third-party logistics (3PL) providers. Respond to emails regarding system support, shipment tracking, and general inquiries. Schedule and coordinate dock appointments for warehouses. Audit receipts, incomplete shipments, and warehouse records to ensure accuracy. Track and categorize invoices (e.g., handling, storage) for proper cost allocation. Review and audit

Warehouse Glove (WG) invoices

for accuracy. Manage freight quotes and coordinate shipments to optimize costs and efficiency. Audit fleet management platforms ( WEX, Geotab, Samba ) to ensure records are up to date and driver information is synchronized. Process and file fleet-related invoices, ensuring correct breakdown of umbrella invoices. Assist in accident claim processing and related administrative tasks. Analyze unit

exit inspection data

to identify high cost items requiring attention. Recommend maintenance strategies and cost-effective solutions to the

Operations Associate

based on

maintenance guideline decks

to minimize unnecessary replacements. Requirements: Experience in supply chain administration, logistics, or related fields. Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail. Fluent English Proficiency in data auditing, invoice tracking, and logistics coordination. Ability to work in 8- 5pm

BRT Time zone Proficiency in

VoIP (3cx), Slack, and Gmail

for communication. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

title: Supervisor (a) de produção
description:
UM POUCO SOBRE NÓS ❤ Somos uma multinacional do segmento de produção de soluções em higiene pessoal para bebês, mulheres e adultos. Distribuímos em mais de 110 países por meio de private label, bem como nossas próprias marcas. No Brasil estamos presentes com marcas adoradas pelos brasileiros, como Pompom, Turma Da Mônica Baby, Cremer,Sapeka e BigFral.

Se tem uma coisa que todo colaborador Ontex tem, é

PAIXÃO , somos apaixonados e nos importamos em tudo pelo que fazemos pela Ontex, pois sabemos que a

CONFIANÇA

que nossos clientes e colaboradores depositam em nós, vem de entregarmos sempre o que prometemos. Aqui, cada um de nós se compromete a assumir a responsabilidade por fazer a coisa certa, e a

INTEGRIDADE

é algo inegociável. Quando falamos em

BUSCA POR RESULTADOS , nosso lema é “apenas o melhor: esse é nosso compromisso”.

Sabe o que nos torna especiais? As pessoas,

TODOS

trabalhamos juntos para atingir nossos objetivos, com as pessoas no centro de tudo o que fazemos. Acreditamos em um ambiente diverso e na força da diversidade para gerar transformações, inovação e vantagem competitiva, por isso, não fazemos distinção para candidatos com deficiência, gênero, condição sexual, raça/etnia, idade, origem, constituição familiar e etc.

Buscamos pessoas para transformarmos e fazermos a diferença no cuidado com as pessoas. #VEMPRAONTEX

description:
A Cushman & Wakefield é uma empresa multinacional que atua no ramo imobiliário. Trabalhamos para sermos o provedor global preferencial de serviços imobiliários, oferecendo as soluções mais criativas e inovadoras de forma consistente, gerando valor significativo aos nossos clientes. Queremos aumentar ainda mais a diversidade das nossas pessoas, pois entendemos que essa é a chave para a inovação. Por isso, incentivamos que mulheres, pessoas da comunidade LGBTQIAP+, indígenas, afrodescendentes, pessoas com deficiência, maiores de 50 anos se candidatem as nossas vagas. Celebramos a diversidade e o nosso compromisso é criar um ambiente inclusivo para todos os colaboradores.

Modelo de trabalho: CLT Atuação: Presencial - São Paulo - Zona Sul Horário de Trabalho: Segunda a sexta-feira das 08h as 17h48.

Um dia na vida de um(a) Concierge:

> Garantir um bom atendimento a todos da empresa. > Atendimento telefônico interno, nacional e internacional. > Suporte às reservas e a sala de reunião. > Recepção aos visitantes, clientes e público interno/externo. > Liberação dos funcionários e dos crachás dos visitantes. > Apoio aos serviços administrativos no escritório. > Controles administrativos diversos, check lists diários. > Responsável pelo fechamento dos chamados (OS). > Interface com fornecedores externos de serviços diversos dentro da area de facilities e gestão de condomínio.

O que fará você obter sucesso neste processo seletivo?

Inglês Avançado/Fluente Excel: Intermediário/Avançado Vivência com atendimento ao público como: secretária, recepcionista ou auxiliar administrativo. Graduação concluída ou cursando em Hotelaria ou Administração de Empresas.

Oferecemos:

Vale refeição

Vale Transporte

• Assistência médica

• Assistência odontológica

• Seguro de vida

• Gympass

• Desconto em cursos e faculdades

• Auxílio-funeral

• Empréstimo Consignado Itaú

• Programa de Apoio Psicológico

• IVI – Plataforma de Cuidado Emocional.

• Auxílio Creche (para mães)

• Auxílio Enxoval

• Calendário Mensal de Saúde e Bem-Estar.

• Comitê de Ações Sociais

• Agenda de Diversidade (Encontro Presenciais, Webinar, grupos de diversidade)

• 3 mil cursos

Learning disponíveis.

• Oportunidade de Carreira

Quer se sentir desafiado, motivado e valorizado todos os dias? Inspirar mudanças e deixar um legado? Faça parte do time Cushman & Wakefield e ajude-nos na construção de um mundo de negócios melhor!

title: Banco de Talentos - Pessoa com Deficiência
description:
A

GP Strategies

é líder na transformação da força de trabalho - com atuação global e verdadeiramente dedicada a fornecer soluções de aprendizado personalizadas. Buscamos sempre as melhores práticas na condução da inovação - integrando tecnologias líderes, desenvolvendo novos paradigmas de aprendizagem e instituindo novos processos de negócios.

Como frente de inclusão estamos abrindo este banco de talentos exclusivo para pessoas com deficiências.

Todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados para a vaga, independentemente de raça, nacionalidade, gênero, idade, religião, deficiência, orientação sexual ou estado civil.

title: Technical Support Engineer
description:
Job Responsibilities : Responsible for the installation, commissioning, or providing guidance for products in the designated region, organizing technical training, maintenance, and upgrade work (including inverters, data collectors, and management systems). Handle and resolve on-site service issues for inverters and management systems in a timely manner. Coordinate the application and recovery of spare parts. Develop technical solutions for photovoltaic inverters and other products; draft and review technical agreements, provide project technical documentation, and draft and review technical tenders. Understand customer needs, identify pain points related to products, and develop targeted strategies and solutions to meet customer demands; collect and study medium- and long-term customer requirements for photovoltaic inverters, provide input for product planning and development, and participate in the product development and iteration review process for inverters. Responsible for market engagement for photovoltaic inverter products, collecting and analyzing market intelligence, and providing technical support and answering queries for customers' market demands.

Job Requirement s :Bachelor's degree or above, with 3+ years of experience in digital energy solutions or technical support; experience in product development is a plus .Proficient in Portuguese and English, with the ability to use these languages in a work environment .Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to actively listen to customer feedback and promptly meet customer requirements .Ability to work in a cross-cultural environment

.

title: Electrical BIM Engineer
description:
Exciting Opportunity for Electrical BIM Engineers, Modelers, and Managers! Join Our Team Today!

Are you looking to take your career to the next level by working on some of the largest projects in the USA? Our dynamic team is seeking a talented individual who is eager to contribute to a rapidly growing business based out of NYC.

Responsibilities: Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to develop BIM models for electrical systems within building projects. Utilize BIM software (such as Revit, AutoCAD MEP, Navisworks) to design and coordinate electrical systems effectively. Conduct clash detection and resolution to ensure seamless integration of electrical components with other building systems. Generate accurate quantity take-offs, schedules, and reports from BIM models. Stay updated on industry standards and best practices related to BIM and electrical engineering. Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering or related field. Proven experience minimum of 4 years working as a BIM Modeler/Engineer. Proficiency in BIM software, including Revit, AutoCAD MEP, and Navisworks. Strong understanding of electrical systems design and installation. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Understanding of Electrical power distribution systems. Experience with large infrastructure including Hospitals, Data Centers, Manufacturing Facilities, Water Treatment Plants, Commercial, and Residential High-Rise Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to be part of a forward-thinking team that is shaping the future of engineering and working on some of the largest projects in the US.

Join us as we pave the way for a brighter, more efficient future in electrical engineering! #ElectricalBIMEngineer #EngineeringJobs #JoinOurTeam.

title: Sports Reporter
description:

We offer you Perfect student or side line job Full and free training 52 euros (around 300 reais) per match covered, and compensation of all travel and ticket costs

States that we urgently need people for data collection at the venue: Alagoas Amazonia Espirito Santo Goias Maranhao Mato Grosso / Mato Grosso do Sul Pará Paraíba Piaui Rondonia Roraima

Take your chance to join our team and apply now!

title: Engenheiro Fullstack Pleno – Remoto – Inglês Fluente
description:
A Getronics é líder global em soluções de tecnologia, com uma equipe de mais de 4.000 colegas em 22 países, fornecendo serviços abrangentes de ponta a ponta em todo o mundo. Temos o compromisso de oferecer um atendimento excepcional ao cliente, para permitir que eles se concentrem em seus principais pontos fortes, enquanto confiam suas necessidades de TI à Getronics.

Engenheiro Fullstack Pleno – Remoto – Inglês Fluente

O que esperamos de você:

--

Se você acha que possui 75% ou até 90% do que estamos procurando e sabe que é capaz das responsabilidades e deveres desta função, encorajamos você a se candidatar! Isso mostrará sua disposição a se desenvolver, curiosidade para aprender e crescer profissional e pessoalmente.

O que fazer em seguida:

title: Salesforce Enterprise Architect
description:
As a Salesforce Solutions/Enterprise Architect, you will work closely with the Portfolio Leader in the US healthcare industry, focusing on presales efforts, enterprise architecture, and technology selection for a large-scale Patient Support Program project. Your expertise in Salesforce, enterprise architecture principles, and industry-specific challenges will be pivotal in driving successful outcomes.

Responsibilities : Collaborate with the Portfolio Leader on presales activities, including developing enterprise-level architectural strategies, defining solution blueprints, and guiding technology selection. Define and maintain enterprise architecture standards, ensuring alignment with client business goals, scalability, and integration requirements. Conduct comprehensive business analysis to identify needs, evaluate vendor capabilities, and design end-to-end Salesforce-based solutions tailored to enterprise-scale operations. Serve as a trusted advisor on Salesforce architecture and its integration within broader IT ecosystems, ensuring alignment with enterprise-wide technology strategies. Lead the development of architectural artifacts such as solution blueprints, data flow diagrams, integration strategies, and implementation roadmaps. Provide guidance on governance, security, and compliance within the Salesforce ecosystem, addressing enterprise-specific challenges. Conduct high-level evaluations of technology stacks, ensuring solutions adhere to enterprise principles such as scalability, performance, and maintainability. Facilitate stakeholder workshops and present architectural designs, balancing technical depth with business priorities to ensure alignment. Engage directly with clients to understand their strategic goals, translating them into actionable enterprise architecture strategies.

Requirements: Proven experience in enterprise architecture roles, with expertise in designing and implementing scalable solutions for large organizations. Extensive knowledge of Salesforce products (e.g., Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud). Strong understanding of enterprise architecture frameworks (e.g., TOGAF, Zachman) and principles, including governance, scalability, and security. Demonstrated experience in leading large-scale Salesforce implementation projects, including system integration and multi-cloud deployments. Ability to design and manage architectural artifacts, such as solution roadmaps, integration patterns, and data architecture. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to translate complex technical concepts into business language for diverse audiences. Experience working in cross-functional enterprise teams, collaborating with technical, business, and executive stakeholders. Strong knowledge of IT governance, compliance, and best practices in large-scale enterprise environments. Familiarity with Salesforce, Mulesoft, data realization, Databricks integration, Five9 Call Center, and SF Service Cloud Voice - telephony. Willingness to travel 15-20% of the time for client engagements.

Preferred Qualifications Salesforce certifications (e.g., Application Architect, System Architect, Technical Architect) or equivalent experience. Familiarity with API-driven architectures, microservices, and middleware platforms for seamless integrations. Experience in enterprise-scale data migration, master data management (MDM), and business intelligence integration within Salesforce projects. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to manage ambiguity in fast-paced, complex projects.

What We Offer: Paid Time Off:

20 days of vacation, 15 paid sick days with a doctor’s note, and 5 paid sick days without a doctor’s note. Health Coverage:

Medical insurance for employees, with options for family coverage at corporate rates (location-dependent). Professional Development:

Support for attending webinars, conferences, and training sessions. Team Engagement:

Regular team-building activities and bi-annual company-wide events. Flexible Work Options:

Choose between in-office, remote, or hybrid arrangements, based on your preference and manager approval.

title: Arquiteto de soluções
description:
SIS Innov & Tech

Há mais de 20 anos no mercado, somos uma consultoria estratégica de Inovação e Transformação Digital. Nossa especialidade é impulsionar as demandas de nossos clientes, integrando processos, pessoas e tecnologia de alta performance. Estamos com uma oportunidade para o nosso time corporativo para atuar como: Arquiteto(a) de Soluções

**Responsabilidades:** - Definir e evoluir a arquitetura de software das aplicações da empresa; - Garantir a escalabilidade, segurança, performance e manutenibilidade das soluções; - Atuar como referência técnica para os times de desenvolvimento; - Apoiar na escolha de tecnologias e frameworks adequados a cada projeto; - Definir padrões de desenvolvimento e promover boas práticas de engenharia de software; - Trabalhar em colaboração com Product Owners, Scrum Masters e demais stakeholders para alinhar requisitos técnicos e de negócio; - Realizar revisões de código e arquitetura, garantindo a qualidade das implementações; - Apoiar na implementação de processos de DevOps e CI/CD; - Garantir a conformidade com normas e regulamentações aplicáveis à área de tecnologia; - Atuar na resolução de problemas técnicos complexos e na mitigação de riscos.

**Requisitos:** - Experiência comprovada como Arquiteto de Software ou função similar; - Sólido conhecimento em padrões de arquitetura (Monolítica, Microsserviços, Event-Driven, Serverless, etc.); - Experiência em desenvolvimento com tecnologias .NET, Java, Node.js, ou equivalentes; - Conhecimento avançado em bancos de dados relacionais (Oracle) e NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis, etc.); - Experiência com Cloud Computing (Azure, AWS ou Google Cloud); - Conhecimento em DevOps, CI/CD, Docker e Kubernetes; - Habilidade na definição de estratégias de segurança e compliance; - Experiência com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban); - Habilidades de comunicação e liderança técnica.

**Diferenciais:** - Certificações em arquitetura de software (TOGAF, AWS Certified Solutions Architect, etc.); - Experiência com mensageria e integração de sistemas (Kafka, RabbitMQ, etc.); - Conhecimento em frameworks de observabilidade e monitoramento (Prometheus, ELK Stack, etc.); - Experiência com engenharia de software para alta disponibilidade e resiliência.

Benefícios CLT: Vale Refeição - Cartão flash Plano de saúde Plano odontológico Auxílio home office Alura Crédito Aniversário – Cartão Flash

Todas as nossas oportunidades de trabalho estão abertas para pessoas com deficiência. #VemPraSIS #SomosSIS

title: UX/Product Design Lead
description:
Capgemini is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented UX/Product Design Lead for a top 10 US Insurance Carrier.

This role is responsible for designing engaging, intuitive, and effective digital experience. Provides a leadership role on projects to ensure project and user success by taking a broad view of the problem space that identifies root causes and actively works with business groups to resolve them. Collaborates with product owners, user research, and developers to problem solve through design exploration, ideation, and user validation

Our Client is one of the United States’ largest insurers, providing a wide range of insurance and financial services products with gross written premium well over US$25 Billion (P&C). They proudly serve more than 10 million U.S. households with more than 19 million individual policies across all 50 states through the efforts of over 48,000 exclusive and independent agents and nearly 18,500 employees. Finally, our Client is part of one the largest Insurance Groups in the world.

Responsibilities Understand desires of client and create attractive product Work closely with product managers and other teams (sales and marketing) to establish plan for product release Acknowledge budget and make plans in order to follow financial guidelines Create product prototypes prior to creating final product Adjust approach towards designs based on feedback provided

Requirements Work Experience in This Field: 7-9 years Experience with complex digital product design required Online portfolio showcasing recent work demonstrating a strong sense of design clarity is required in order to be considered English Proficiency: Fluent Required Education: Bachelor's degree preferred Online portfolio showcasing recent work required in order to be considered Required Branches of Study Design Human-Computer Interaction, or related Additional Preferred Branches of Study Cognitive Psychology Computer Science Other Critical Skills Product Design - Advanced User Research - Advanced Product Management - Advanced Software / Tool Skills Figma - Advanced UI/UX - Advanced Skills: Human Centered Design Problem-solving Proactive in seeking out problems Curiosity Collaboration Humility Encouraging team participation and contribution Focus on user outcomes Super communication Attention to detail

Benefits:

This position comes with competitive compensation and benefits package: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses Comprehensive benefits package Career development and training opportunities Flexible work arrangements (remote and/or office-based) Dynamic and inclusive work culture within a globally reknowned group Private Health Insurance Pension Plan Paid Time Off Training & Development

About Capgemini Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group €22.5 billion in revenues in 2023.

title: Senior Devops Engineer (South America)
description:
Fully Remote Contract Position for Devops Engineers in Europe or South America.

Saturn Cloud is building an AI engineering platform for the next 100 million developers and data scientists. We enable everyone from hobbyists to Fortune 1000 to launch easily-configurable cloud notebooks with GPUs, jobs, deployments and a lot more. We are an early startup with significant funding from top venture capital firms and corporate partners like AWS, Microsoft, NVIDIA, and AMD.

This position is for a Senior Devops Engineer. This role spends a significant amount of time working with Kubernetes.

Devops engineers at Saturn Cloud do a variety of tasks. Here are some projects we have worked on: Created an authentication server for our Traefik forward-auth middleware. Building support for GCP, Azure, and Oracle Cloud.

For this position candidates should have: Experience working with Python and Go

. Experience working with Kubernetes. Experience working with Terraform and Helm Experience with Engineering best practices.

Code quality, maintainability, and test-ability are very important to us.

title: Supervisor de Inside Sales
description:
Somos uma empresa de tecnologia com mais de 30 anos de mercado movida por nossa paixão por animais de estimação! Buscamos democratizar e simplificar o cuidado com o pet, oferecendo a melhor experiência para tutores e empoderando médicos veterinários e empreendedores do segmento. Considerado o maior ecossistema pet do Brasil, o Grupo Petlove conta com mais de 15 mil produtos no site e app, serviços Doghero de hospedagem, pet sitter, creche e outros, plano de saúde para cães e gatos, lojas físicas em São Paulo (e em breve em outros Estados) que oferecem petshop, banho e tosa, atendimento veterinário e espaço pet play.

Na Petlove somos apaixonados por pets e por pessoas. Somos inclusivos e formamos times diversos, inconformados, ágeis e comprometidos com o nosso propósito. Onde tem pet, tem love.

RESPONSABILIDADES Aplicar treinamentos para a equipe, tanto para os novos colaboradores quanto treinamentos de reciclagens (desde a preparação/atualização de materiais até a aplicação prática do conteúdo); Acompanhar os primeiros dias dos novos colaboradores para apoio com relação a dúvidas (sistema, produto, processo de venda, etc), além de monitorias e feedbacks; Realizar escutas de monitoramento constantes para acompanhar o processo de venda e garantir a qualidade dos atendimentos; Ministrar feedbacks das escutas/monitoramentos semanais com foco no desenvolvimento do colaborador através de exemplos e orientações práticas/objetivas; Realizar 1:1 com todos da equipe com foco no desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional de cada colaborador; Conferir a organização do funil de vendas de cada vendedor a fim de otimização; Fazer análises para entender a distribuição dos leads entre o time, visando a igualdade entre todos, bem como analisar o tempo de resposta de cada vendedor após o recebimento do lead; Ser responsável pelo ponto (controle de faltas, atrasos, banco de horas, lançamento de atestados, etc), bem como a distribuição das escalas de folgas, sábados, feriados e férias do time; Fazer ajustes no sistema referente a erros de indicações não convertidas.

REQUISITOS Ensino superior completo; Experiência com liderança de time de vendas B2C; Conhecimento em ferramentas de gestão de indicadores; Gestão de pessoas; Disponibilidade de horário.

Benefícios Bônus PLR:

baseado em metas semestrais. Plano de Saúde

: para titular e dependentes sem mensalidade, com coparticipação. Plano Odontológico:

para titular e dependentes isento de coparticipação. Seguro de Vida:

sem desconto. Concierge de Saúde:

suporte médico via WhatsApp. Convênio Farmácia. Vale Refeição/Alimentação:

cartão iFood Benefícios. Auxílio Home Office New Value Clube:

descontos em mais de 25 mil marcas. Descontos Petlove:

até 30% em produtos e serviços. Licença maternidade de 180 dias. Licença paternidade de 90 dias. Wellhub:

acesso flexível a diversas opções de atividades físicas e academias. ZenKlub:

title: Profissional Frontend React - Sênior
description:
Código da vaga: 43980

Sobre a BRQ Digital Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior. Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia! É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei #fera FrontEnd, chegou o momento de encarar um novo desafio em sua carreira! Venha ser um #ferabrq

- O que procuramos? Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Ensino superior completo em Tecnologia da Informação ou áreas afins. Experiência em desenvolvimento front-end com ReactJS . Conhecimento sólido em HTML5, CSS3 e JavaScript (ES6+). Experiência com ferramentas de versionamento de código como Git. Familiaridade com metodologias ágeis. Boa comunicação e capacidade de trabalho em equipe. Proatividade para exportar ideias e sugestões de melhorias.

- Diferenciais:

title: Cross Border Logistics Specialist – 3PL Management
description:
ABOUT SHEIN SHEIN is a global online fashion and lifestyle retailer, offering SHEIN branded apparel and products from global network of vendors, all at affordable prices. Headquartered in Singapore, SHEIN remains committed to making the beauty of fashion accessible to all, promoting its industry-leading, on demand production methodology, for a smarter, future-ready industry. Founded in 2012, SHEIN has more than 16,000 employees operating from offices around the world, and continues to expand operations globally. Join SHEIN and be the future!

CAREERS AT SHEIN

We Commit to Inclusion At SHEIN, we believe that diversity is the force that drives innovation. We are committed to creating an environment where all voices are heard, valued and respected. All our vacancies are inclusive for people with disabilities, women, black people, LGBTQIAPN+ community and all types of diversity.

We Empower Talents with Diverse Careers At SHEIN, we empower talent to excel with regular opportunities to elevate their career in their respective fields. As a dynamic business, we support internal mobility, diverse career pathways and recognition of success and contribution in a variety of meaningful ways.

We Engage with Global Cultures SHEIN has over 20 offices worldwide , providing talent with many opportunities to collaborate with colleagues around the world. Perspective sharing and leveraging cultural differences, is one of our core strenghts as we work on many exciting projects and draw insights from industry-leading experience.

ABOUT THE ROLE： We are seeking a highly skilled

Cross Border Logistics Specialist

to oversee the performance and operational efficiency of Third-Party Logistics (3PL) providers in Brazil. This role will be responsible for monitoring key logistics partners, ensuring seamless customs clearance, optimizing last-mile operations, and managing reverse logistics. The ideal candidate must have strong analytical skills, problem-solving capabilities, and experience in cross-border logistics.

Location:

São Paulo, SP, Brazil

Key Responsibilities: Monitor and manage the performance of third-party logistics (3PL) providers, ensuring compliance with established Service Level Agreements (SLAs). Track customs clearance deadlines, ensuring timely processing and identifying operational bottlenecks. Conduct root cause analyses for operational issues and implement action plans for resolution, escalating when necessary. Send order delay reports to providers and monitor their feedback to ensure continuous improvement. Oversee order creation processes, ensuring that any failures are resolved within 24 hours to maintain performance standards. Manage and configure channel interfaces, including template validation and manifest tracking, ensuring alignment with new service providers. Maintain and update tracking rules, ensuring all package statuses are correctly mapped and monitored. Support last-mile operations, ensuring deliveries meet SLAs and performance metrics. Monitor metrics such as failure rates and customer feedback, identifying and addressing inefficiencies. Develop and implement corrective action plans for underperforming regions or providers. Collaborate with 3PL partners to reduce return cycle times and enhance customer satisfaction. Conduct monthly verification of unclosed packages in the system, ensuring process completion and settlement of claim amounts

Qualifications & Requirements: Bachelor's degree in

Supply Chain, Logistics, Business Administration, or a related field . Minimum of 2

years of experience in 3PL management, or supply chain operations Cross-border logistics for e-commerce operations is a plus. Strong knowledge of customs clearance procedures, last-mile delivery, and reverse logistics. Experience working with

logistics service providers and warehouse operations . Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with a data-driven mindset. Proficiency in

Excel, SQL, and logistics tracking systems

is a plus. Strong communication skills in

English and Portuguese , Spanish is a plus. Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic international environment.

title: Manager, Corporate Development
description:
Manager, Corporate Development

Easy Payroll Global Limited Ireland and their local affiliate ITOS Brasil LTDA is looking to hire a Manager, Corporate Development, to provide services to companies within the Perseus Group (“Perseus”).

Perseus is an Operating Group of Constellation Software Inc. (csisoftware.com | TSX:CSU), a Canadian-based publicly held company. Perseus has over 6,000 employees, across 70+ software business units, operating in 12+ software industry verticals, and located in over 40 offices.

Location:

Brazil

The Role: The services to be provided by the Manager, Corporate Development, encompasses building strong strategic business relationships that lead to the sourcing of current and future M&A opportunities for Perseus. These relationships will be formed with software company decision makers (e.g. CEOs, VPs of Corporate Development, founders, and/or owners) of software companies, M&A advisors, and private equity/ venture capital professionals. Success in this role is defined by building and maintaining meaningful relationships that ultimately lead to Perseus’ acquisition of software companies.

The process of initiating relationships, maintaining relationships, and ultimately making an acquisition typically takes multiple years. Measurable outcomes, continuous value-add through many M&A conversations/ relationships, and high-quality market research are what ultimately generate successful acquisitions through time.

Outcomes: Develop and manage an M&A pipeline through Salesforce CRM and create market maps to build strong relationships in assigned software industry vertical(s). Meet and exceed monthly M&A targets, such as meaningful contacts and other measurable M&A sourcing KPIs. Work both autonomously and with M&A leadership to qualify M&A opportunities with efficiency. Ensure the lead database is allocated accurately within portfolio verticals. Effectively qualify opportunities at the top-end of the acquisition funnel to maintain focus for the Portfolio Managers of the business units.

Relevant Experience & Competencies: At least 3+ years of experience in a Business Development/Sales position at a software company or client-facing M&A/finance role within business development, sales, and/or account management. Preference for experience in outbound-focused origination roles. A clear interest in developing a long-term pipeline of meaningful relationships with prospects as a career trajectory within software investing. Previous high-performance in Business Development, winning in an autonomous role, or prior success in other walks of life outside professional BD experience, such as entrepreneurship, will be considered. Advanced verbal and written communication skills, with the confidence and executive presence to speak with CEOs, M&A advisors, corporate development, private equity and venture capital professionals. Organized, detail-oriented, and able to work variable hours. Extraordinary work ethic, proactive with a sense of urgency.

Other Requirements: This role will require occasional in-person travel, which may include Canada, the U.S., Mexico, Colombia, Chile, and/or Peru, and can be primarily performed remotely.

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
About Us

Marketing Ninjas is a cutting-edge marketing agency specializing in helping

restoration companies

gain more referral partners and secure exclusive leads. As a

faith-driven

and

ninja-themed

company, we operate with the highest standards, integrity, and a commitment to excellence. Our mission is to empower our clients with the tools and strategies they need to grow their businesses successfully.

Job Overview

We’re looking for a

Client Success Manager (CSM)

who is passionate about building relationships, ensuring client satisfaction, and driving results. The CSM will serve as the

primary point of contact

for our clients, ensuring they see maximum value from our services and continue to grow with us. This role requires

exceptional communication skills, a strong command of English with minimal accent , and a proactive approach to client engagement.

Key Responsibilities

Client Onboarding & Relationship Management:

Guide new clients through the onboarding process, ensuring a smooth and positive experience. Ongoing Support & Strategy:

Regularly check in with clients to review performance, provide strategic insights, and optimize their marketing campaigns. Retention & Growth:

Identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling additional services to help clients scale their businesses. Issue Resolution:

Address client concerns promptly and professionally, working with internal teams to resolve any challenges. Training & Education:

Educate clients on best practices for using our

Marketing Ninjas Lead Engine , powered by

GoHighLevel . Performance Monitoring:

Track client success metrics and proactively reach out to offer guidance and improvements. Collaboration:

Work closely with our sales, marketing, and fulfillment teams using

Slack, ClickUp, and GoHighLevel

to ensure a seamless client experience.
