title: Infrastructure Engineer, Cloud
description:
We’re looking for someone to join our Engineering team at Ferrum. Are you interested in building services to help hospitals detect and eliminate the millions of medical errors that occur every year? If so, read on.

What You Will Do Ferrum is a distributed, fast-growing company where you will be wearing many hats and pitch in on different components and projects across the organization. That said, here are some examples of what you’ll do:

Working with application developers to design infrastructure and deploy services into multiple cloud environments Taking ownership of our build and deployment pipeline for application code and container images Implementing Infrastructure as Code best practices in order to maintain reliable systems Applying your Linux knowledge to maintain, extend, and scale our hybrid cloud platform

You Have Experience With:

At least 4 years of relevant DevOps experience At least 2 years of cost-effective infrastructure system design experience At least 3 years of maintaining production environments using Terraform and other IaC tools Writing binaries, libraries, and microservices in Go or Python Cost management with GCP or other cloud service providers Release management and deployment methodologies Bare metal and lower level infrastructure

Preferred Experience, But Not Required:

Google Cloud certification With Linux operating system internals, filesystems, disk/storage technologies and storage protocols A working knowledge of modern security practices (ex: remediation plans, CVEs, firewalls, intrusion detection systems, vulnerability scanners) Linux and physical networking (ex: routing, switching, Wireshark) as well as networking constructs in cloud environments

You love efficiency and automation.

Your work at Ferrum will have a huge impact on the business. You take pride in developing scripts, tools, and services to help the team perform at a high level and scale to new challenges. You should be proficient with BASH and familiar with Python--but Go is even better.

You ensure the security of our systems and the privacy of our customers' data.

You keep up to date with security bulletins and CVEs. You’ve been a part of or even led remediation plans to swiftly implement fixes. You can provide architecture guidance for hybrid cloud solutions and implement them when necessary. You have experience and opinions on vulnerability scanners, firewalls, and intrusion detection systems.

You strive to take ownership of a project from ideation to delivery and maintenance.

Your experience provides a framework for you to work independently on several initiatives which will provide significant and measurable value to our customers. Seek opportunities to develop horizontal technologies that benefit multiple teams. Build developer tools to increase efficiency of all teams at Ferrum.

You communicate and document everything.

At Ferrum, we are a distributed team. A culture of sharing and documentation allows everyone to work together. We are looking for a practitioner of clear documentation that is well-maintained.

And most importantly, you want to make a positive and lasting impact on the world.

You understand that technology has the power to improve people’s lives and enrich our society.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Job Summary We are seeking a highly skilled Staff Engineer or AWS Devops to join our team. This role is Fully Infrastructure focused***** As part of this role, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing infrastructure, pipelines, and processes in AWS to enable efficient development and deployment workflows. You will work closely with nearshore DevOps engineers and the broader engineering team to support our rapidly scaling FinTech-focused systems. This is a senior-level role requiring in-depth knowledge of AWS infrastructure, networking, and modern DevOps practices. Location : Mexico or Brazil Contract : 12 months Remote

from Mexico or Brazil

Key Responsibilities AWS Infrastructure Management: Architect, deploy, and maintain AWS services including VPCs, EC2 instances, RDS, DynamoDB, S3, and EKS. Networking & Security: Configure and secure VPCs, manage API gateways using service mesh technologies (e.g., Istio), and implement Cloudflare for API security. Infrastructure as Code: Use Terraform and Helm charts to manage infrastructure at scale. Kubernetes Operations: Deploy, maintain, and scale Kubernetes clusters (EKS) and integrate with supporting services like AWS ECR. Observability: Implement and maintain monitoring solutions with Datadog to ensure optimal system performance and uptime. Messaging Systems: Work with SQS, Kafka, and other AWS-based or third-party messaging solutions. Containerization & CI/CD: Leverage GitHub for CI pipelines and utilize ArgoCD for robust deployment workflows. Database Scaling: Support and scale RDS or MySQL systems and implement application-level or database-level sharding strategies. Software Support: Collaborate with engineering teams using Go for service-level development.

Preferred Qualifications Education & Experience: Minimum of 5+ years in a senior or staff-level DevOps or infrastructure role. Technical Expertise: Proficiency in AWS, Linux environments, Kubernetes, Terraform, and service meshes. Programming Skills: Experience with one or more development languages (Go preferred). FinTech: Previous experience in the FinTech domain is a plus but not required.

Nice-to-Have Skills Strong experience scaling RDS or MySQL for growing systems. Experience with API gateways, Istio service mesh, and scaling Kubernetes environments. Hands-on experience with ARGOCD for continuous delivery.

Why Join Us? Opportunity to work on cutting-edge FinTech systems. Collaborate with a high-caliber engineering team driving rapid growth. Play a critical role in scaling the company's infrastructure and database systems. Long-term project with a 12-month contract and potential extensions.

title: Especialista de Desenvolvimento II - Devops
description:
Descrição da vaga Buscamos um especialista de desenvolvimento DevOps um profissional híbrido que atue na ponte entre o desenvolvimento de software e as operações de infraestrutura. Sua principal missão será a criação de novas arquiteturas digitais, principalmente na cloud Azure, baseada nas conversas com o cliente. Automatizar e otimizar os processos de desenvolvimento, entrega e operação de aplicações, garantindo agilidade, qualidade, estabilidade e escalabilidade. Responsabilidades e atribuições - DevOps, CI/CD, automação, infraestrutura, cloud Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform. - Ferramentas: Experiência com ferramentas como Git, Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, e sistemas de configuração como Puppet ou Chef. - Linguagens de Programação: Conhecimento em linguagens como Python, Bash, PowerShell, e outras utilizadas para automação. - Cloud Computing: Experiência comprovada em uma das principais plataformas de cloud computing: Azure - Sistemas Operacionais: Conhecimento em Linux e Windows. - DevOps: Conhecimento dos princípios e práticas do DevOps. - Automação: Criar e manter scripts e ferramentas para automatizar tarefas repetitivas, como provisionamento de servidores, configuração de ambientes, deployment de aplicações e testes. - Infraestrutura: Gerenciar e configurar ambientes de desenvolvimento, testes e produção, utilizando tecnologias como cloud computing (Azure), containers (Docker, Kubernetes), e sistemas de virtualização. - Integração Contínua (CI): Implementar e manter pipelines de CI/CD para automatizar a construção, teste e deploy de software. - Entrega Contínua (CD): Garantir a entrega rápida e confiável de software para produção. Requisitos e qualificações - Mentalidade de resolução de problemas: Capacidade de identificar e resolver problemas de forma rápida e eficiente. - Foco em resultados: Comprometimento em entregar resultados de alta qualidade e superar expectativas. - Proatividade: Busca contínua por melhorias e otimização dos processos. - Colaboração: Habilidade para trabalhar em equipe, boa comunicação e construir relacionamentos fortes. - Aprendizado contínuo: Disposição para aprender novas tecnologias e ferramentas.

Certificação Obrigatória:

Microsoft Certified: Azure Developer Associate Certificação desejável: Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert Informações adicionais O que oferecemos para você? ✔Vale Refeição ou Alimentação; ✔Assistência médica e Odontológica; ✔Convênio Farmácia (descontos na compra de medicamentos); ✔Seguro de Vida; ✔Convênio Academia; ✔TIVIT Club (descontos e parcerias com as melhores lojas); ✔PAC - Programa de aceleração de carreira; ✔Reembolso para certificações; ✔MOBIFLIX – Nossa academia corporativa tem cursos presenciais e online, alinhados as novas tendências do mercado de tecnologia; ✔Plataforma online de crédito consignado, a TIVIT te ajuda a realizar os seus objetivos pessoais como reforma no seu apê/casa, financiar estudos e quitar dívidas, de acordo com as regras e políticas da cia; ✔Programa de Apoio Pessoal com orientação psicológica, financeira e jurídica em parceria com a Alelo.

Acreditamos que o presente é plural e a inclusão transforma, por isso, todas as pessoas são bem-vindas em nossas vagas, para promovermos um ambiente de trabalho inclusivo, de respeito, justiça e equidade.

Topa embarcar nesse desafio com a gente? #vemserTIVIT

title: iOS Developer
description:
We are looking for a iOS engineer to build discovery experiences that serve the Adoption mission within our native app on surfaces such as the feed, the community tab and the post page.

What you’ll Do ● Move fast while balancing quality. We can’t afford extensive processes, and we also can’t afford show-stopping bugs. We need people who can balance speed with quality while quickly building brand-new products. ● Contribute meaningfully to team strategy. We give everyone a seat at the table and encourage active participation in planning for the future. Don’t just come along for the ride. ● Communicate effectively, within the team and across disciplines. Work closely with product managers and designers to craft compelling user experiences. What we’re looking for ● 4+ years mobile development experience with multiple parts of the iOS stack. We develop with Swift. Experience with Combine or RxSwift is strongly preferred. Experience with Storekit framework, Texture, UIKit, or SwiftUI are nice to have, but not required. ● Ability to design and implement complex distributed systems operating under high load. ● Experience developing customer-facing public applications is preferred. ● Entrepreneurial spirit. On our team, everyone needs to act like a startup CEO. You must be self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You live to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

● Excellent communication skills. You must be able to collaborate effectively with teams in a fully-remote environment, and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: AI Platform Engineer
description:
We are looking for an

AI Platform Engineer

to lead the adoption, integration, and operationalization of AI tooling across our organization. This role will focus on enabling teams to work more efficiently by implementing AI-powered solutions, best practices, and MLOps strategies. The ideal candidate has

proven experience working with engineering and technology companies to drive AI adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing , ensuring AI initiatives deliver measurable impact and efficiency gains.

This role requires a combination of

technical expertise

in AI/ML infrastructure,

strategic thinking

to identify high-value AI opportunities, and

cross-functional collaboration

to help teams seamlessly integrate AI into their workflows. The AI Platform Engineer will play a key role in

automating processes, optimizing team operations, and ensuring AI solutions align with business goals .

Key Responsibilities:

AI Tooling & Infrastructure:

Design, implement, and scale AI/ML tooling that improves team efficiency, streamlines workflows, and enhances automation. MLOps Best Practices:

Help engineering teams implement effective MLOps processes, including model deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle management. Cross-Team Collaboration:

Work closely with software engineering, data science, and operations teams to integrate AI capabilities into their workflows. AI Adoption & Enablement:

Drive organization-wide adoption of AI by identifying key pain points, providing education, and ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions. Automation & Efficiency:

Develop AI-powered automation solutions to reduce manual work, improve productivity, and optimize team operations. Scalability & Performance:

Ensure AI infrastructure and workflows are scalable, resilient, and efficient to support company-wide initiatives. Security & Compliance:

Implement AI governance, security best practices, and compliance measures to align with organizational and regulatory standards. Monitoring & Evaluation:

Establish metrics and feedback loops to measure the impact of AI tooling on team efficiencies and continuously improve processes.

Qualifications:

Technical Expertise:

5+ years of experience in software engineering, MLOps, or AI infrastructure roles. Strong programming skills in Python, Go, or another relevant language. Experience with AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face. Proficiency in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and AI/ML services. Hands-on experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools. Familiarity with AI observability, monitoring, and governance tools. Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform, Pulumi), and automation best practices.

MLOps & AI Operations:

Experience implementing MLOps pipelines for model training, deployment, and monitoring. Familiarity with vector databases, feature stores, and AI-powered search. Knowledge of distributed computing and optimizing AI workloads for efficiency. Soft Skills & Adoption Focus: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify high-impact AI solutions. Ability to work cross-functionally and communicate effectively with non-technical stakeholders. Strong ability to drive change, facilitate AI adoption, and enable teams to succeed with AI-driven processes. Passion for AI automation, operational efficiency, and developer experience.

Success Metrics for This Role:

Adoption Rate:

Increase in AI tooling adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing teams. Efficiency Gains:

Measurable reductions in manual effort and time spent on repetitive tasks. MLOps Maturity:

Improved model deployment velocity and reliability through MLOps best practices. Developer Productivity:

Reduction in friction for AI-enabled engineering teams. Feedback & Iteration:

Continuous improvement based on team feedback and usage metrics.

title: UX/Product Design Lead
description:
Capgemini is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented UX/Product Design Lead for a top 10 US Insurance Carrier.

This role is responsible for designing engaging, intuitive, and effective digital experience. Provides a leadership role on projects to ensure project and user success by taking a broad view of the problem space that identifies root causes and actively works with business groups to resolve them. Collaborates with product owners, user research, and developers to problem solve through design exploration, ideation, and user validation

Our Client is one of the United States’ largest insurers, providing a wide range of insurance and financial services products with gross written premium well over US$25 Billion (P&C). They proudly serve more than 10 million U.S. households with more than 19 million individual policies across all 50 states through the efforts of over 48,000 exclusive and independent agents and nearly 18,500 employees. Finally, our Client is part of one the largest Insurance Groups in the world.

Responsibilities Understand desires of client and create attractive product Work closely with product managers and other teams (sales and marketing) to establish plan for product release Acknowledge budget and make plans in order to follow financial guidelines Create product prototypes prior to creating final product Adjust approach towards designs based on feedback provided

Requirements Work Experience in This Field: 7-9 years Experience with complex digital product design required Online portfolio showcasing recent work demonstrating a strong sense of design clarity is required in order to be considered English Proficiency: Fluent Required Education: Bachelor's degree preferred Online portfolio showcasing recent work required in order to be considered Required Branches of Study Design Human-Computer Interaction, or related Additional Preferred Branches of Study Cognitive Psychology Computer Science Other Critical Skills Product Design - Advanced User Research - Advanced Product Management - Advanced Software / Tool Skills Figma - Advanced UI/UX - Advanced Skills: Human Centered Design Problem-solving Proactive in seeking out problems Curiosity Collaboration Humility Encouraging team participation and contribution Focus on user outcomes Super communication Attention to detail

Benefits:

This position comes with competitive compensation and benefits package: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses Comprehensive benefits package Career development and training opportunities Flexible work arrangements (remote and/or office-based) Dynamic and inclusive work culture within a globally reknowned group Private Health Insurance Pension Plan Paid Time Off Training & Development

About Capgemini Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group €22.5 billion in revenues in 2023.

title: Salesforce Developer - Advanced English - Remote
description:
About HCLTech

HCLTech is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. We re powered by our people a global, diverse, multi-generational talent - representing 161 nationalities whose unique spark, perspective and boundless passion drive our culture of proactive value creation and problem-solving.

To learn more about how we can supercharge progress for you, visit

Developer

will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing standard configuration with design in mind. The developer will also develop customized solutions within the Salesforce platform when necessary. This position should have strong technical skills and be able to describe solution options to the technical leads and architects working on the project. This role involves collaborating with various departments to understand their needs and translating those requirements into technical solutions. The developer will also be responsible for maintaining and enhancing existing Salesforce applications and ensuring their seamless integration with other systems. Candidate will need to be fluent in Portuguese and English to support our global organization (Spanish is a plus).

Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, implement and maintain standard and customized Salesforce solutions using Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning components. Implement best practices for scalability, supportability, ease of maintenance, and system performance Define solution limitations and requirements and work with Architects to ensure all systems integrate into the solution’s technology stack Communicate the solution context and intent and align development stakeholders on the technical direction Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Develop and maintain integrations between Salesforce and other systems using APIs and middleware Perform data migrations and ensure data integrity within the Salesforce platform Work with business stakeholders and IT to transition from WordPress and other CMSs to Salesforce Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Salesforce applications and integrations Create and maintain technical documentation, including design specifications, processes, user guides, and release notes Stay up-to-date with Salesforce best practices, new features, and industry trends Develop and implement maintenance procedures, monitor systems health, gather system statistics, and troubleshoot reported errors and alarms

Qualifications: Fluent in English to cover global needs Associates degree required, Bachelor's degree preferred in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field Salesforce implementation for a large organization with specific focus on the Manufacturing, Sales, Experience, Marketing and Service cloud Experience working with information technologies and systems analysis WordPress Experience to adapt similar functionality to Salesforce sites Salesforce Developer certification (e.g., Platform Developer I, Platform Developer II) is preferred Proven experience in Salesforce development, including Apex, Visualforce, Lightning components, and Salesforce APIs Strong understanding of Salesforce architecture, data model, and security model Strong knowledge of business processes, and how data and software applications support those processes Experience with integration tools and middleware as it relates to Salesforce with other systems Proficiency in web development technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON) and frameworks (e.g., Angular, React) is a plus Strong understanding and knowledge of the principles and practices associated with packaged and/or SaaS applications Knowledge of agile methodologies and frameworks such as Kanban preferred Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail Strong proficiency in estimation and planning Strong communication and collaboration skills

Preferred Salesforce Developer certification (e.g., Platform Developer I, Platform Developer II) is preferred Bachelor's degree preferred in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field

description:

Sobre a BRQ Digital Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. title: Lead Data Architect
description:
Building a risk applications and tools for innovative international top-tier hedge fund from the ground up, comprising the systems for traders, pre-trade checks and analysis, risks and limits management, reports of trading activities, FIX connectivity, market data providers connectivity (e.g. Bloomberg B-pipe), etc The Team is focused on the development and maintenance of various database applications supporting Risk Management. The successful candidate will have considerable and proven experience in database design, PL/SQL development, a good working knowledge of end-user and server-side data processing techniques, a good understanding of SDLC and agile development methodologies.

Responsibilities: Developing business friendly data models. Migration from SQL Server -> Fabric and/or Azure

Mandatory Skills Description: - Strong understanding of data modelling and data quality principles - Experience across data architecture and data warehousing techniques and practices is essential. - Proven experience in designing and developing data models using industry best practices - Experience in using code management and CI/CD tools such as Github, Azure Devops, Jenkins, Bamboo etc. - Senior (10+ years) MS SQL Server developer/architect. - Azure fabric serviсe experience - 10+ years of experience working with ETL tools such as SSIS, ADF or similar. - Good understanding and demonstrated experience working with Power Query (M query language) and DAX. - Management of Power BI datasets, workspaces and the associated security requirements. - Familiarity with Power BI Premium capabilities, Power BI Rest APIs, Python and Databricks will be highly regarded. - Extensive experience designing and developing reports and performance metrics from complex and disparate platforms

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: - Experience with Azure - Risks trading system development experience. - Business knowledge in trading domain / capital

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

Fomentar a inovação por meio da experimentação com novas tecnologias, metodologias e práticas de design para melhorar continuamente nossos produtos e serviços, bem como propor melhorias para nosso Design System;Criar wireframes, protótipos e designs visuais intuitivos e eficazes que atendam às necessidades dos usuários e aos objetivos de negócios; Identificar problemas legados de design e definir soluções para eles.Conhecimentos Técnicos:Habilidade de comunicação em todos os níveis, em ambiente remoto, com os times de produto, desenvolvimento, dados, usuários finais e stakeholders, com capacidade para apresentar e justificar decisões de design de forma clara e com argumentação convincente; Manter-se atualizado com relação a tendências e técnicas de UX/UI e disseminar isso dentro do time.Proficiência em ferramentas de design como Figma e outras ferramentas relevantes; Conhecimento em design de interface e experiência do usuário, com uma forte compreensão dos princípios de usabilidade e design centrado no usuário;Formação acadêmica em Design, Design de Interface, Design de Interação ou áreas relacionadas;Experiência prévia comprovada UX/UI Designer ou em um papel semelhante, com um portfólio que demonstra suas habilidades em design de produtos e soluções criativas; title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Currently, we are looking for a Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer who will be a part of the general-purpose data science core team and work with tasks covering a wide variety of business needs with a soft focus on NLP or CV applications. In this position, you will work with multiple data sources (usually textual, numerical and time-related data), huge and small datasets to develop, validate and deploy machine learning models, tune their performance & integrate them into data processing pipelines. Responsibilities: Deal with both structured and unstructured data, collaborate with data engineers on defining data storage formats, state data collection requirements; Not only solve technical tasks but understand business needs and offer appropriate solutions, describe a chosen approach to non-technical people; Set up reproducible experiments: selection, training, validation and optimization of machine learning models, evaluation of their quality in business-related terms; Integrate data preprocessing and model inference into general data processing pipelines; Research new tools, papers, etc. in the machine learning area. Requirements: Strong knowledge and deep understanding of Сlassical machine learning (linear models, decision trees, ensembles for classification and regression tasks, clustering and dimensionality reduction) Main concepts and stages of the modelling process (validation scheme, regularization, overfitting and generalization, data leaks, feature selection, etc.) Experience with Python scientific, visualization and ML-related libraries (numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, etc.) Experience with different clustering techniques Experience with classic NLP tools and techniques (nltk, spacy, n-grams, skip-grams, TF-IDF, tokenizers, lemmatization, dependencies parsing, etc.) Experience with NN frameworks, NLP-related architectures and libraries (Pytorch / Tensorflow, HuggingFace, fasttext, flair, sentence transformersWord2Vec, ElMo, RNN, CNN, Transformer, BERT, etc.) Experience in tuning pre-trained models for different NLP tasks Good Python programming skills Good spoken and written English (at least B1) Ability and desire to convert raw business requests into strictly formulated machine learning tasks Ability to formulate data gathering (or data labelling) requirements Minimum 2-year experience in machine learning

title: Arquiteto de Dados
description:
Job Description A Genesis Consulting tem oportunidade imediata para

Arquiteto de Dados

experientes com verdadeira paixão por crescimento profissional e entrega de valor através da tecnologia. Nossos clientes são alguns dos principais líderes mundiais em diferentes indústrias e o candidato fará parte de projetos desafiadores para construir e apoiar soluções técnicas para suas necessidades.

Responsabilidades: Liderar a implantação de Data Lakes e Lakehouses, atuando tanto no desenho da arquitetura quanto no desenvolvimento

hands-on

da solução. Estabelecer critérios de governança e FINOPS no que tange os produtos de dados do cliente. Colaborar com os times de negócio na criação de novos produtos de dados, promovendo boas práticas e norteando discussões técnicas. Mapear e implantar conexão dos sistemas do cliente com os produtos de dados a serem desenvolvidos. Auxiliar na capacitação técnica do restante do time de dados.

Experiências e Qualificações: Experiência comprovada em desenho de arquitetura e implantação de Data Lakes e Lakehouses (preferencialmente em Oracle Cloud); Conhecimento avançado em Infrastructure as Code e CI/CD; Liderança prévia de projetos como arquiteto de soluções. Forte entendimento de práticas de governança e qualidade de dados.

Minimum Education: Bacharelado em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia, Estatística ou áreas correlatas.

Other: Certificações em OCI são um plus. Inglês fluente é um plus.

title: Diretor(a) de arte SR — Freelancer
description:
Sobre a Jüssi:

A Jüssi é uma agência de marketing digital fundada em 2010 e que faz parte do maior grupo de comunicação do mundo, a WPP. Somos guiados pelo posicionamento “The Experience Agency”, que materializa a nossa capacidade de impulsionar o crescimento dos nossos clientes por meio de experiências que contemplem o poder da inovação, da criatividade, dos dados e da tecnologia.

Conheça o time: Na Jüssi, o time de Criação atua com um pé na propaganda e outro nos dados. Aqui, criamos campanhas com racional criativo levando em consideração os objetivos de negócio dos clientes que atendemos! Prezamos pela inovação e resultado, explorando diferentes formatos e caminhos.

Como será o seu dia a dia: Criação de conteúdo para redes sociais Criação e desdobramento de campanhas Acompanhamento e direcionamento em produções de conteúdo nativo para redes sociais Apoio na liderança de projetos. Contato direto com cliente, inclusive em apresentações. Atuar como referência técnica.

O que buscamos: Experiência prévia em agência de propaganda, marketing ou design; Formação em Artes, Design Marketing ou Publicidade e Propaganda; Domínio técnico em criação de KVS, proposta de ideias e vídeos; Apoio técnico e pessoal de profissionais mais juniors; Domínio do Pacote Adobe (Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign); Senso estético e de composição avançados; Autonomia na criação de conceitos de campanha e desdobramentos estratégicos; Visão estratégica e analítica; Boa comunicação e oratória; Capacidade em lidar com trabalhos complexos e exigência dos clientes; Condições de conduzir reuniões e apresentações; Antecipação de demandas; Criatividade, senso de responsabilidade e trabalho em equipe; Atuar como referência técnica.

Informações adicionais

: Modelo de contração - Freelancer, temporário;

Para que possamos analisar seu perfil de forma completa, é essencial que o currículo anexado contenha o link para o seu portfólio online. Certifique-se de que o link esteja atualizado e que o portfólio apresente os trabalhos que mais te geram orgulho.

title: AI Project Manager
description:
We are seeking a Project Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, specifically in the AI domain.

This role involves overseeing ongoing AI projects, managing client relationships, coordinating with internal teams, and ensuring the successful delivery of projects. We are looking for individuals who are not only skilled in project management but also enthusiastic about AI and eager to drive new solutions.

While technical expertise is valuable, the primary focus is on project management and client satisfaction. This role sits in the Digital Transformation Center and will be close to delivery and research teams.

Role duration: long-term. Contract type: contractor / “PJ”. Availability to work according to European time-zone.

Job Mission :

To manage AI projects, ensuring successful delivery. To encourage a culture of excellence within the team. To advance AI initiatives through cross-functional collaboration. To engage across functions (SMEs, technical teams, leaderships) to guarantee delivery quality.

Key Responsibilities :

Project Management: Lead end-to-end project management for AI initiatives, from initiation to successful delivery. Develop project plans, allocate resources, track progress, and ensure timely completion of milestones and deliverables. Client Engagement: Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, maintaining strong relationships and ensuring clear communication. Understand client needs, manage expectations, and address concerns promptly to achieve customer satisfaction. Risk Management: Identify potential project risks and develop mitigation strategies. Proactively address issues that may impact project timelines, scope, or quality, ensuring smooth project execution. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate project documentation, including project plans, progress reports, and stakeholder communications. Ensure that project status and updates are communicated effectively to both internal teams and clients. Team Leadership: Provide leadership and direction to project teams, fostering a collaborative and results-driven environment. Mentor team members, promote knowledge sharing, and support professional growth. Global Approach: Interact with other regions, partners and ventures following a global approach to ensure consistency and alignment in AI project management across the organization.

Required experience : Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Project Management, or a related field. Around 5 years of experience as a project manager for IT. Experience in managing projects AI projects from conception to delivery. Familiarity with AI technologies and their applications. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to engage with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Proficiency in project management methodologies and tools. Problem-solving mindset with the ability to navigate challenges and adapt to changing project requirements. Critical thinking and problem solving to assess client situation and provide actionable outcome-based business/technical advice PMP, PMI-ACP, or other relevant project management certifications (preferred). Advanced proficiency in English is required. Proficiency in Portuguese is desirable.

Technical Knowledge: Familiarity with AI concepts, terminology, and industry trends. Understanding of project management methodologies specific to AI projects. Ability to evaluate technical feasibility and make informed project decisions based on technical considerations. Proficiency in using project management software and tools for AI project tracking and management. Knowledge and experience on conducting projects for IT and Service Desk solutions. A background in IT environments, including an understanding of how various IT components and systems operate, is highly beneficial. This knowledge helps in navigating technical aspects, ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions within existing IT infrastructures. Excellent communication skills Strong project management skills

What's next: It's best to apply today, because job postings can be taken down and we wouldn't want you to miss this opportunity. To apply, please submit your updated CV.

The preceding job description had been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees within this classification. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties and responsibilities required of employees assigned to this job.

Diversity & Inclusion Here at the Stefanini Group, we value plurality and equity, regardless of race, sexual orientation, disability, age, ancestry, religion, gender, and nationality. We understand and encourage the importance of being you!

About us We are a Brazilian company with over 35 years of experience in delivering IT services worldwide, ranging from IT outsourcing to application development or IT staffing. We have a direct presence in 41 countries, through our 70 offices located throughout the world. We have managed to become the preferred partner of many small-to-midsize local and regional companies as well. Most of our clients come from industries such as financial services, manufacturing, telecommunications, chemical, services, technology, public sector and utilities. Stefanini has career opportunities locally and around the world for professionals interested in a vibrant, passionate, team-oriented workplace. If you are a customer-centric person with a "get it done" attitude, come over for coffee and a talk on your future career with us! Learn more about us on

join us on

,

and

where we regularly post insights from our colleagues.

title: Profissional Back End – .NET Core SR
description:
Código da vaga: 44051

Sobre a BRQ Digital

Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

BRQ WAY

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!

É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos: equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.

Ei #fera em desenvolvimento, estamos ampliando nossa operação na América do Norte, precisamos de você!

- O que procuramos?

Buscamos um(a) #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

- O que você deve ter?

Experiência sólida com .NET Core, conhecimentos avançados em AWS (incluindo servidores, bancos de dados e serviços de rede). Experiência com bancos de dados relacionais e não relacionais (...).

- Diferenciais:

Experiência com Front End, usando ReactJS. Experiência com metodologias ágeis, como Scrum ou Kanban, certificações em AWS ou .NET. Familiaridade com ferramentas de CI/CD para automação de processos de desenvolvimento. Familiaridade com processamento em fila, container e ferramenta de cache.

- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira !

A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Carreira técnica:

Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança:

Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional:

Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo:

De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.

- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde; Plano Odontológico; Seguro de Vida; Vale Refeição; Vale Alimentação; Horário Flexível; Home Office; Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!

- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube: youtube.com/brqdigitalsolutions

Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Administrador de Banco de Dados DBA (Database Administrator)
description:
Responsabilidades do Trabalho: Liderar a arquitetura, engenharia, implementação e operações de todos os sistemas de dados para suportar escalabilidade, disponibilidade e desempenho. Colaborar com equipes de engenharia durante todo o ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento de software para resolver problemas complexos, mantendo padrões e melhores práticas de banco de dados. Responsável por garantir a estabilidade e funcionalidade de aplicativos/bancos de dados, incluindo todos os ambientes: desenvolvimento, teste e produção. Monitorar, investigar e solucionar problemas de banco de dados de produção, coordena a recuperação de incidentes e comunica-se com as respectivas equipes de suporte e líderes de engenharia. Habilidades Preferenciais: Abordagem agnóstica de banco de dados. Disposto a trabalhar com tecnologias novas e emergentes Conhecimento prático de alta disponibilidade e recuperação de desastres (HA/DR) da AWS Experiência em nível superior em Ciência de Dados e ferramentas de ciência de dados Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de MongoDB Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de Redis Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de Solr Experiência com sistemas operacionais como UNIX, LINUX, CentOS Exposição ao trabalho dentro de uma organização de desenvolvimento ágil

Atuação 100% remota.

title: Site Readiness Engineer
description:
Pathlock is a leader in application security, access governance, and compliance automation. Our cloud-based solutions help organizations secure critical applications, mitigate risk, and enforce policies across a diverse IT landscape.

We are looking for a skilled

Site Readiness Engineer (SRE)

with experGse in CI/CD automaGon and Azure cloud technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring deployment readiness across our infrastructure, automaGng deployment processes, and maintaining opGmal site performance within our cloud environment.

Key Responsibilities Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to support application deployment and infrastructure provisioning. Develop and enhance automation scripts to streamline deployment processes and minimize manual tasks. Configure, manage, and optimize cloud resources in alignment with security standards and best practices. Collaborate with development teams to troubleshoot and resolve deployment and site readiness issues. Monitor site performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement improvements to enhance system reliability and efficiency. Participate in on-call rotations to provide production deployment support and incident resolution. Create and maintain technical documentation for deployment processes, system configurations, and troubleshooting procedures. Conduct site readiness assessments and validation tests to ensure infrastructure and applications are production ready. Implement and enforce Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices using tools such as Terraform and ARM templates. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to deployment failures, infrastructure provisioning, and application performance. Qualifications 3-5 years of experience in site reliability engineering, DevOps, or similar roles Strong proficiency in CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, or similar Solid experience with Azure cloud services, including Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Database services and networking controls Hands-on experience automating deployment workflows and infrastructure provisioning Working knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, ARM templates, or similar tools Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Python, or similar Experience with GitOps tools like ArgoCD or Flux Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) Strong understanding of networking principles and Azure networking services Knowledge of security best practices for cloud environments Must be able to read and speak fluently in English Must be able to work at least some time in the US or EU time zone Preferred Qualifications Azure certifications (Azure Developer Associate, Azure DevOps Engineer Expert, or Azure Administrator) Experience with monitoring tools such as , Application Insights, ELK or Grafana Experience with log aggregation and analysis tools in particular Elastic and Prometheus Understanding of high availability and disaster recovery concepts Experience with containerized applications with a Windows OS Why Join Pathlock? Opportunity to lead a cutting-edge cloud security platform. Work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment. Competitive compensation, benefits, and equity options. Collaborative and inclusive company culture.

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
About Us

Marketing Ninjas is a cutting-edge marketing agency specializing in helping

restoration companies

gain more referral partners and secure exclusive leads. As a

faith-driven

and

ninja-themed

company, we operate with the highest standards, integrity, and a commitment to excellence. Our mission is to empower our clients with the tools and strategies they need to grow their businesses successfully.

Job Overview

We’re looking for a

Client Success Manager (CSM)

who is passionate about building relationships, ensuring client satisfaction, and driving results. The CSM will serve as the

primary point of contact

for our clients, ensuring they see maximum value from our services and continue to grow with us. This role requires

exceptional communication skills, a strong command of English with minimal accent , and a proactive approach to client engagement.

Key Responsibilities

Client Onboarding & Relationship Management:

Guide new clients through the onboarding process, ensuring a smooth and positive experience. Ongoing Support & Strategy:

Regularly check in with clients to review performance, provide strategic insights, and optimize their marketing campaigns. Retention & Growth:

Identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling additional services to help clients scale their businesses. Issue Resolution:

Address client concerns promptly and professionally, working with internal teams to resolve any challenges. Training & Education:

Educate clients on best practices for using our

Marketing Ninjas Lead Engine , powered by

GoHighLevel . Performance Monitoring:

Track client success metrics and proactively reach out to offer guidance and improvements. Collaboration:

Work closely with our sales, marketing, and fulfillment teams using

Slack, ClickUp, and GoHighLevel

to ensure a seamless client experience.

What We’re Looking For

Experience:

2+ years in a client success, account management, or customer service role (preferably in digital marketing, SaaS, or home services industries). Communication Skills:Fluent English speaker

with excellent written and verbal communication skills. Minimal accent

for clear and effective communication with U.S.-based clients. Tech-Savvy: Experience using

GoHighLevel, Slack, and ClickUp

(or similar CRM and project management tools). Comfortable with marketing automation and CRM tools. Problem-Solving:

Ability to think critically and proactively address client concerns. Results-Driven:

Passionate about helping clients succeed and achieving high retention rates. Organized & Detail-Oriented:

Ability to manage multiple clients and tasks efficiently. Faith & Integrity:

A commitment to conducting business with the highest ethical standards.

Why Join Marketing Ninjas?

Work with a mission-driven team

that operates with integrity and excellence. Remote work flexibility

– work from anywhere! Opportunities for growth

in a fast-paced, ninja-themed marketing agency. Competitive salary + performance-based incentives. Supportive team environment

with a strong focus on faith, values, and client success.

Ready to Join the Ninja Squad?

If you’re passionate about

helping businesses grow ,

building strong client relationships , and

delivering exceptional service , we’d love to hear from you! Apply today and become part of the

Marketing Ninjas

team.

Estamos com uma oportunidade para o nosso time corporativo para atuar como:

Analista DevSecOps Sênior

Responsabilidades:

- Implementar práticas de segurança no desenvolvimento de software (DevSecOps); - Automatizar verificações de segurança nos pipelines de CI/CD; - Monitorar e mitigar vulnerabilidades em aplicações e infraestrutura; - Realizar análise de código estática e dinâmica para identificação de falhas de segurança; - Implementar e configurar ferramentas de segurança para aplicações e infraestrutura; - Trabalhar em colaboração com times de desenvolvimento, infraestrutura e segurança; - Definir e manter políticas de segurança e compliance; - Promover treinamentos e conscientização sobre segurança para as equipes de tecnologia; - Responder a incidentes de segurança e propor medidas corretivas; - Participar das cerimônias ágeis (daily meetings, planning, review e retrospective).

Requisitos:

- Experiência sólida com práticas de DevSecOps; - Conhecimento em ferramentas de segurança como SonarQube, Checkmarx, Snyk, OWASP ZAP, etc.; - Experiência com pipelines de CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps, etc.); - Conhecimento em containers e orquestração (Docker, Kubernetes); - Experiência em segurança de APIs e aplicações Web; - Conhecimento em infraestrutura como código (Terraform, Ansible); - Familiaridade com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban); - Experiência com monitoramento e resposta a incidentes de segurança; - Boa comunicação e trabalho em equipe.

Diferencial: A vaga é com atuação home office, mas se a pessoa tiver disponibilidade de ir 1x presencial por semana em Alphaville seria um diferencial.

proven experience working with engineering and technology companies to drive AI adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing , ensuring AI initiatives deliver measurable impact and efficiency gains.

This role requires a combination of

technical expertise

in AI/ML infrastructure,

strategic thinking

to identify high-value AI opportunities, and

cross-functional collaboration

to help teams seamlessly integrate AI into their workflows. The AI Platform Engineer will play a key role in

automating processes, optimizing team operations, and ensuring AI solutions align with business goals .

Key Responsibilities:

AI Tooling & Infrastructure:

Design, implement, and scale AI/ML tooling that improves team efficiency, streamlines workflows, and enhances automation. MLOps Best Practices:

Help engineering teams implement effective MLOps processes, including model deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle management. Cross-Team Collaboration:

Work closely with software engineering, data science, and operations teams to integrate AI capabilities into their workflows. AI Adoption & Enablement:

Drive organization-wide adoption of AI by identifying key pain points, providing education, and ensuring seamless integration of AI solutions. Automation & Efficiency:

Develop AI-powered automation solutions to reduce manual work, improve productivity, and optimize team operations. Scalability & Performance:

Ensure AI infrastructure and workflows are scalable, resilient, and efficient to support company-wide initiatives. Security & Compliance:

Implement AI governance, security best practices, and compliance measures to align with organizational and regulatory standards. Monitoring & Evaluation:

Establish metrics and feedback loops to measure the impact of AI tooling on team efficiencies and continuously improve processes.

Qualifications:

Technical Expertise:

5+ years of experience in software engineering, MLOps, or AI infrastructure roles. Strong programming skills in Python, Go, or another relevant language. Experience with AI/ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face. Proficiency in cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and AI/ML services. Hands-on experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools. Familiarity with AI observability, monitoring, and governance tools. Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform, Pulumi), and automation best practices.

MLOps & AI Operations:

Experience implementing MLOps pipelines for model training, deployment, and monitoring. Familiarity with vector databases, feature stores, and AI-powered search. Knowledge of distributed computing and optimizing AI workloads for efficiency. Soft Skills & Adoption Focus: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify high-impact AI solutions. Ability to work cross-functionally and communicate effectively with non-technical stakeholders. Strong ability to drive change, facilitate AI adoption, and enable teams to succeed with AI-driven processes. Passion for AI automation, operational efficiency, and developer experience.

Success Metrics for This Role:

Adoption Rate:

Increase in AI tooling adoption across engineering, sales, and marketing teams. Efficiency Gains:

Measurable reductions in manual effort and time spent on repetitive tasks. MLOps Maturity:

Improved model deployment velocity and reliability through MLOps best practices. Developer Productivity:

Reduction in friction for AI-enabled engineering teams. Feedback & Iteration:

Continuous improvement based on team feedback and usage metrics.

title: Analista de Pricing
description:
Descrição da vaga: Planejar, analisar e executar as atividades do Pricing, trabalhando em estreita colaboração com a equipe de gestão de Supply Chain, analisando dados complexos, desenvolver estratégias de preços e garantir a lucratividade da cooperativa, sugerindo ações de melhorias, garantindo que as atividades aconteçam dentro das normas e políticas estabelecidas, visando assegurar o cumprimento das metas da Cooperativa.

Responsabilidades: Realizar análises abrangentes de preços e custos para produtos agrícolas, proporcionando informações críticas para tomada de decisões. Desenvolver estratégias de preços altamente competitivas e adaptadas a produtos específicos. Gerar relatórios de análise de preços altamente detalhados para a alta administração, facilitando uma compreensão aprofundada. Manter registros meticulosos de informações de mercado e histórico de preços para referência e análise. Participar ativamente de reuniões estratégicas para colaborar na formulação de estratégias de preços eficazes. Identificar e implementar proativamente oportunidades significativas de otimização de preços. Monitorar de forma contínua a concorrência e ajustar as estratégias de preços em tempo real. Desenvolver e aprimorar políticas de preços da cooperativa, alinhando-as com metas organizacionais. Comunicar e treinar outros departamentos sobre quaisquer mudanças relevantes nas estratégias de preços. Mitigar riscos relacionados às estratégias de preços, garantindo estabilidade financeira. Gerenciar sistemas de gerenciamento de preços para garantir sua precisão e eficácia. Realizar revisões detalhadas de contratos com fornecedores e clientes de maior complexidade, assegurando a conformidade contratual. Preparar apresentações altamente detalhadas de análise de preços para apoiar a tomada de decisões informadas. Colaborar de forma estreita com a equipe sênior na formulação de estratégias de longo prazo para o departamento de Pricing.

Requisitos: Ensino Superior Completo em Administração, Economia, ou áreas relacionadas. Conhecimento intermediário em Pacote Office. Vivência em Processos e Rotinas da área de Pricing.

Diferencial: Compreensão das tendências de mercado agrícola será um diferencial. Conhecimento em ferramentas de análise estatística. Conhecimento intermediário dos Processos e Rotinas da área de Pricing.

Benefícios: Vale Alimentação; Auxílio transporte; Plano de Assistência médica e odontológica; PPR (Programa de participação de resultados); Ginástica Laboral (presencial) 1x na semana; Seguro de Vida; Parcerias Educacionais com Faculdades e Escolas de Ensino.

title: Arquiteto de soluções
description:

**Requisitos:** - Experiência comprovada como Arquiteto de Software ou função similar; - Sólido conhecimento em padrões de arquitetura (Monolítica, Microsserviços, Event-Driven, Serverless, etc.); - Experiência em desenvolvimento com tecnologias .NET, Java, Node.js, ou equivalentes; - Conhecimento avançado em bancos de dados relacionais (Oracle) e NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis, etc.); - Experiência com Cloud Computing (Azure, AWS ou Google Cloud); - Conhecimento em DevOps, CI/CD, Docker e Kubernetes; - Habilidade na definição de estratégias de segurança e compliance; - Experiência com metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban); - Habilidades de comunicação e liderança técnica.

**Diferenciais:** - Certificações em arquitetura de software (TOGAF, AWS Certified Solutions Architect, etc.); - Experiência com mensageria e integração de sistemas (Kafka, RabbitMQ, etc.); - Conhecimento em frameworks de observabilidade e monitoramento (Prometheus, ELK Stack, etc.); - Experiência com engenharia de software para alta disponibilidade e resiliência.

title: Government Relations Manager
description:
As a highly-regarded high-tech unicorn company, inDrive has been making a positive global impact since 2013. Harnessing the power of innovative mobile technologies, our core product is redefining ride-hailing, while simultaneously introducing new business verticals that are propelling us toward becoming a super app. With our cutting-edge solutions and dynamic work environment, we provide a unique opportunity for individuals to contribute to our mission of combating injustice on a global scale.

About the opportunity: We are looking for a Government Relations Manager for Brazil with a solid experience in addressing complex regulatory issues and establishing sustainable relations with the regulators and key opinion leaders. This position is needed to represent and advance inDrive’s interests in Brazil with national and state authorities and key opinion leaders.

What you will do: Cultivate and maintain strategic relationships with government officials, policymakers, regulatory bodies, and key industry leaders in Brazil. Oversee platform licensing at the state level, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements across Ride-hailing, Couriers, Intercity, Cargo, and other business verticals operated by inDrive. Manage the full licensing process, from identification to execution. Develop and implement a national government relations (GR) strategy, including setting objectives, key results (OKRs), and detailed roadmaps and action plans. Foster partnerships with key policy stakeholders, including businesses, trade associations, and civil society organizations. Lead inDrive’s involvement with NGOs, industry unions, and associations. Identify and assess regulatory risks and opportunities, and develop strategies to address them effectively. Manage regulatory and political crises, formulating and executing action plans to mitigate impact. Strengthen inDrive’s brand and visibility among policymakers, governments, third parties, thought leaders, and academic institutions. Advocate for a regulatory environment in each market that supports and enables the growth of technology platforms like inDrive. Formulate and manage the country-level GR budget. Provide strategic guidance to internal stakeholders on policy, legislative, or reputational matters that may influence business performance and corporate reputation. Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Growth, Legal, Communications, Finance, and Product) to ensure regulatory compliance and proactively address potential regulatory challenges.

What we expect from you: 10+ years of experience in government relations, public policy, or a related field. At least 3 years of experience in a tier-one multinational organization, either in-house or as a consultant, is highly desirable. A degree in Law, Economics, Political Science, International Affairs, or a related field. Proven track record in designing and executing public policy strategies and managing complex advocacy initiatives at both national and regional levels. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Portuguese and English, with a demonstrated ability to engage with diverse partners on policy issues. Comfort in participating in challenging or controversial debates is essential. Demonstrated success in building and maintaining strong relationships, with a leadership role in policy implementation and public affairs. Deep understanding of legislative, regulatory, and political processes, particularly in highly regulated industries. Experience in shaping regulatory frameworks and addressing complex legal and political issues is essential. Prior experience in the ride-hailing or technology sectors is a plus. Strong research and analytical skills, with the ability to synthesize complex policy and regulatory issues and communicate them clearly. Exceptional ability to translate intricate regulatory matters into accessible language for diverse audiences. Proven skills in strategic alignment, with the ability to connect company strengths to government opportunities and challenges. Strong ownership and accountability for the areas of expertise under your responsibility. Ability to collaborate effectively across functions at all levels within inDrive. Self-motivated, adaptable, and calm under pressure. Strong action-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering results. A collaborative team player, comfortable navigating the ambiguity of cross-functional initiatives. Strong project management skills, with an ability to manage multiple priorities effectively.

We offer: Be part of a growing and innovative company with a unique approach to ride-hailing. Enjoy a collaborative and supportive work environment where new ideas and perspectives are encouraged and valued. Have the opportunity to make a significant impact on the company and the industry as a whole. Grow your skills and experience through challenging and rewarding work, with opportunities for advancement as the company expands. Competitive salary. Medical insurance. Dental Insurance. Food and transportation allowance. Opportunity for advancement and upward mobility within the organization, allowing for increased levels of responsibility and growth within the company. Boundless Global Exposure: A Catalyst for Multifaceted Growth. Partially or fully paid additional training courses, and regular external and internal training.

title: Vendedor Técnico Externo
description:
MODELO:

Efetivo CLT

Metal Work Pneumatica do Brasil, quem somos?

Empresa líder na produção e comercialização de equipamentos pneumáticos para automação industrial, presente em todos os continentes e representada em mais de 70 países. No Brasil, a Metal Work produz e desenvolve produtos customizados para a indústria brasileira e da América Latina. O Grupo Metal Work foi fundado em 1967, na cidade de Brescia, Itália, produzindo conexões para ar comprimido. Em meados dos anos 80, iniciou a produção de componentes para automação pneumática, desenvolvendo a linha de produtos que realizam movimentos usando ar comprimido como energia. Seu portfólio de produtos conta com mais de 15 mil referências. Entre as principais famílias de produtos, estão: cilindros pneumáticos, cilindros elétricos, lineares e rotativos; válvulas pneumáticas e eletroválvulas direcionais, de processo e áreas classificadas; válvulas para segurança em máquinas; elementos para manipulação, pinças, guias lineares; conexões de engate rápido; linha de filtros reguladores para tratamento do ar comprimido; sistemas montados em painéis e estruturas de máquinas em alumínio.

REQUISITOS PARA A FUNÇÃO:

Ensino Técnico ou graduação em Engenharia Mecânica, Elétrica, Automação ou Mecatrônica.

EXPERIENCIA OBRIGATÓRIA: Experiência comercial com foco em Automação Industrial.

DESEJÁVEL (NÃO OBRIGATÓRIO):

Cursos e treinamentos específicos na área de Vendas e Automação, conhecimento em línguas, inglês ou italiano.

ATIVIDADES/RESPONSABILIDADES:

· Administração da carteira de clientes (Elaboração de orçamentos, Follow up, negociação, Implantação dos pedidos, acompanhamento da carteira de pedidos para faturamento.

· Planejamento de visitas semanais (agendamento e apontamento das visitas).

· Prospecção de novos clientes e negócios;

· Suporte técnico a clientes;

· Desenvolvimento de soluções e aplicações em campo;

· Rotinas de preenchimento CRM e outros relatórios;

SALÁRIO:

FIXO + comissão + prêmio (fixo a combinar).

BENEFÍCIOS:

Plano de saúde Bradesco, plano odontológico da Bradesco, VR, comissão, prêmio, veículo da empresa, combustível, celular corporativo, auxilio educação até 60% após um ano de empresa.

title: Associada
description:
Quem somos?

Ao longo desses 20 anos nossa equipe traz entendimento, técnicas e postura estratégica impecáveis, fruto da paixão pelo direito e pelos seus impactos na vida das empresas que sempre estão diante de grandes desafios de gestão.

Sobre a Vaga

Estamos procurando um(a) advogado(a) que atue na fase de execução judicial ou extrajudicial

para se juntar ao nosso time. Trata-se de uma vaga para atuação, com clientes na fase de execução, cuja remuneração inicial é de R$3.000,00. Exigimos que esteja disponível durante o horário comercial, inclusive para realização de audiências. A atuação é majoritariamente no judicial (confecção de pecas, cumprimento de prazos).

Requisitos

- Dominar o direito material e processual na faze de execução; - Ser responsável, disciplinado e organizado; - Ter proatividade e postura ética; - Saber gerenciar o tempo com senso de urgência e lidar com pessoas; - Saber se comunicar adequadamente com todos em sua volta (advogados e cliente); - Ter vontade de aprender continuamente; - Saber respeitar o crescimento na carreira, de acordo com acúmulo de atribuições, dentro do escritório.

Principais atividades:

- Atendimento aos clientes, com elaboração de relatórios periódicos, focados nos resultados esperados pelo escritório; - Controlar prazos e acompanhar eventuais processos; - Realizar atendimentos presenciais, bem como por videoconferência; - Dominar as ferramentas de trabalho do escritório (rede interna; work flow; Sistema integrado de gestão; fluxo operacional; etc.); - Incorporar a utilização do sistema jurídico, zelando pela constante atualização e manutenção do mesmo; - Elaborar peças processuais (elaborando as teses, quando necessárias) e defesas administrativas; - Trabalhar de maneira colaboradora, auxiliando com qualquer coisa que precisar ser feita; - Seguir procedimentos e rotinas para atingir o cumprimento das atividades; - Realizar análise minunciosa dos documentos relacionados as demandas solicitadas; - Realizar análise minunciosa dos históricos relacionados as demandas solicitadas; - Manter a documentação suficientemente em ordem no DRIVE e sistema do escritório para que os demais tenham condições de examinar e reportar dados; - Informar continuamente como está procedendo quanto aos prazos e tarefas; - Solicitar assessoria/ajuda de colegas mais experientes caso uma situação fora de seu domínio possa surgir; - Solicitar e aceitar feedback sobre o próprio desempenho no trabalho; - Assumir e aprender novas habilidades; - Interagir com os demais de forma respeitosa, paciente, tolerante e compreensiva; - Ter total atenção com a escrita, formal e informal, principalmente para não cometer erros de português e gramaticais; - Produzir comunicação clara e articulada, tanto escrita, quanto falada, com foco em passar segurança ao cliente, superior e/ou sócio.

Preencher o forms abaixo:

title: Analista de Dados Sênior

title: Analista de contabilidade pleno
description:
Junte-se a Forvis MazarsSe você quer uma carreira repleta de oportunidades, desafios, crescimento contínuo e um ambiente de trabalho dinâmico e inovador, venha para a Forvis Mazars.Sobre NósSomos uma das

10 maiores empresas

em prestação de serviços, reconhecidos pela nossa excelência e capacidade de fornecer uma experiência única aos nossos clientes e equipes. Com foco em terceirização de processos administrativos e operacionais, o BPO oferece soluções personalizadas que permitem aos nossos clientes concentrarem seus esforços nas atividades core do negócio.Principais responsabilidadesConhecimento em contabilidade, realização de conciliações, lançamento dos compromissos financeiros (notas fiscais).Orientar fornecedores e prestadores de serviços sobre previsão de pagamentos.Validação de relatórios internos para faturamento e realização conciliações pertinentes ao processo com a cobrança.Gerar lista com o resultado de todos os clientes não faturados.Habilidade para trabalhar com multitarefas e cumprir datas de entrega.Competências Técnicas e Competências ComportamentaisRegistro na contabilidade das notas de fornecedores;Conciliação de contas contábeis em especial faturamento, clientes e fornecedores;Garantir que os lançamentos contábeis e aprovações estão de acordo com as políticas da Companhia;Garantir o cumprimento de prazos e qualidade nos fechamentos contábeis mensais.Qualificações PreferenciaisBacharel em ciências contábeis;Conhecimentos em excel avançado;Power BI (diferencial);Perfil organizado e pró-ativo;Inglês intermediário;Barueri - SP (modelo híbrido).BenefíciosForvis Mazars Cuida - Cuidados com o seu bem-estar;Serviço de telemedicina;Rede de academias;Canal de apoio psicológico;Convênio com o SESC;Vale Refeição/Alimentação – flexibilidade para o seu dia a dia;Vale Transporte;Assistência Médica;Assistência Odontológica;Seguro de vida.

title: Biólogo molecular
description:
Estamos em busca de um Biólogo(a) altamente qualificado e com experiência comprovada em Bio Mol, na venda e apresentação de equipamentos para laboratórios de pesquisa. Se você tem paixão por tecnologia, ciência e um perfil comercial, esta oportunidade é para você!

- Experiência prévia em vendas técnicas de equipamentos para laboratórios de pesquisa;
- Inglês avançado (imprescindível para comunicação com clientes e fornecedores internacionais);

Diferenciais:
- Experiência com prospecção de clientes e fechamento de negócios;

- Benefícios adicionais.

Ramo de atividade importação de equipamentos para laboratório principalmente acadêmico, centros de pesquisa e indústrias. No mercado há 23 anos com ampla aceitação e renome das empresas representadas.

Envie seu currículo atualizado e pretensão salarial para com o assunto: "Candidatura - Biólogo Vendas".
Estamos ansiosos para conhecer você e contar com seu talento em nossa equipe!

title: Business Development Manager (Brazil)
description:
To cater to our business expansions, we are now hiring high caliber talents to join our growing team, together with our current talent forces to support the business strategies, goals and initiatives. What are your responsibilities?

Identify and assess potential partnership and introducing brokers' opportunities for integration into the company. Effectively communicate the company's value, technology, procedures, and partnerships to external stakeholders. Support existing partnerships by consistently delivering excellent service to boost their performance. Stay updated on daily financial market developments and suggest growth strategies to management. Collaborate with internal teams to ensure top-notch customer service. Expand market reach through strategic partner collaborations with minimal supervision. Travel regularly to establish and maintain partner relationships and organize educational events. Ensure that business targets meet organizational expectations.

Who are we looking for?

Proven experience in business development or sales, with a strong preference for candidates with experience in the brokerage or financial industry. A strong track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and objectives, with quantifiable achievements preferred. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Analytical and strategic thinking skills to identify business opportunities and trends. Ability to build and maintain strong client relationships. Networking and relationship-building skills to expand the company's client base. Understanding of market dynamics and industry trends. Familiarity with relevant technologies or trading platforms is a plus.

Local Experts and/or companies Location:

Brazil

NTU International is a leading international consulting firm providing programme management and advisory services for development projects worldwide. For almost three decades, NTU has been delivering sustainable development projects and advisory services within engineering, policy, economics, and social fields. title: Pessoa Analista de Metodologias Ágeis Pleno
description:
#Nosso jeito de fazer história: Entre para a história de construção do maior Hub de Dados e Analytics do Brasil. Além de você contribuir diretamente neste objetivo, você estará se desenvolvendo constantemente, por meio de grandes desafios de negócio, junto a um time de alto impacto. Na Neoway, acreditamos em fazer as coisas de forma inovadora, colaborativa, responsável e com foco no cliente.

#Missão do Cargo: Como Analista de Agilidade, você fará parte da Unidade de Negócios de Capital Markets, atuando junto ao time de Tecnologia e será responsável por potencializar o trabalho da equipe, dar consistência no campo operacional e garantir que todos entendam e apliquem os princípios da agilidade, empoderando as pessoas e a empresa, visando primariamente o trabalho harmônico em equipe.

#Responsabilidades e principais atribuições em sua jornada: Promover a utilização de Metodologias Ágeis, garantindo que seja entendida e aplicada pelo time; Gerenciar o fluxo de trabalho e a organização do time; Conduzir as cerimônias ágeis adotadas pelo time; Ser guardião do quadro Kanban utilizado pelo time, garantindo a organização do backlog e sprints; Analisar regularmente as métricas do time, acompanhando os indicadores operacionais de eficiência do fluxo de trabalho, promovendo uma visão 360 da operação. Gerir as interferências externas de modo a assegurar foco no planejamento de trabalho; Remover impedimentos (técnicos, operacionais, contratuais, organizacionais, etc) que atrapalhem o andamento das atividades diárias do time; Estar sempre atualizado sobre metodologias ágeis e buscar formas alternativas de promover a melhoria contínua do time; Organização de documentações, políticas e acordos do time e promover a otimização de processos;

#Requisitos e qualificações: Apresentar boa comunicação, pois somos um time bastante pró ativo e com necessidade de articulação de ideias; Encarar as mudanças como oportunidades e aprender com seus erros; Facilidade em compartilhar conhecimento com seus pares; Habilidade em organização e planejamento; Apoiar no desenvolvimento da cultura de alta performance em equilíbrio com um clima leve; Saber como construir com outras pessoas e desfrutar do trabalho em equipe; Experiência atuando como Pessoa Agile Master ; Experiência em processos de desenvolvimento de software; Conhecimento em técnicas de facilitação; Conhecimento em métricas de times ágeis;

Alguns diferenciais que estamos de olho. Mas não se preocupe caso não tenha, ajudamos você nessa parte: Certificações Scrum (CSPO, CSM) ou Kanban (KMP I, KMP II) (desejável); Experiência com ferramentas de workflow como Jira, Trello, Pipefy, etc; Conhecimento em implementação e uso de OKRs.

#NeoJourney l Cardápio de Benefícios: Vale Alimentação/Refeição; Auxílio transporte; Plano de Assistência médica e odontológica; ‍‍ Licença Maternidade e paternidade estendida; PPR (Programa de participação de resultados); ️‍♀️Gympass - plataforma que te dá acesso a mais de 18 mil academias no Brasil. Nas academias conveniadas são oferecidas mais de 700 modalidades esportivas; Wellz - plataforma de saúde mental e bem estar, com terapia gratuita e muito mais; Ginástica Laboral (presencial) 1x na semana; Quick Massagem (presencial) 2x mês; Auxílio Creche; Day off no aniversário; Seguro de Vida; Parcerias Educacionais com Faculdades e Escolas de Ensino.

Mais sobre o Universo Neoway: Unimos forças com a B3, a maior potência de dados do país. Nossa meta é entrar para a história, e o capítulo deste ano é sobre acelerar. Todos e todas do time são essenciais para escrevermos este capítulo! Entendemos que as jornadas na Neoway são únicas, feitas pela soma do DNA Neoway + o potencial de cada colaborador(a).

#Somos Mudança: Acreditamos na potência da diversidade. Sabemos que temos um longo caminho pela frente, por isso estamos constantemente aprendendo e criando iniciativas para fortalecer a diversidade e inclusão. E essa jornada conta com o apoio dos nossos grupos de afinidade: #NeoLadies #NeoOba e #NeoPride, todos com o propósito de traduzir nossas mudanças internas em responsabilidade como cidadãos.

title: Criativo/a Digital Senior
