title: Chief Scientist (Polyurethane Foam）
description:
Midea is a leading Global Fortune 500 high technology company. Committed to bring innovation to life, Midea Group aims to develop solutions for our international customers that not only meet the requirements of the present, but also the challenges of tomorrow and the day after tomorrow. Midea develops, produces, and sells innovative products in five competence areas: Smart Home, Industrial Technologies, Building Technologies, Robotics & Automation, and Digital Innovation. We operate in more than 195 countries with over 150,000 employees. Midea embraces talents of characters of aiming high, customer first, transformation and innovation, inclusion and partnership to join the mission together to integrate with the world, and to inspire your future! To lead this effort, Midea has created this new position of Chief Scientist (Thermal Management & Refrigeration Technology. This position is preferred to be located in China.

Essential Job Duties: Lead the planning and development of insulation and thermal management technology platforms, working closely with R&D engineers specializing in foam materials, vacuum insulation materials, and system design to establish next-generation thermal insulation roadmaps and implementation plans. Drive cutting-edge research in insulation and thermal management technologies, with a strong focus on polyurethane foam insulation materials. Oversee the formulation development of polyurethane functional materials and pilot testing of new formulations to facilitate technology transfer from R&D to product applications. Improve and optimize polyurethane foam production processes to enhance product quality and manufacturing efficiency, collaborating with the R&D team to solve technical challenges in production. Promote technical collaboration with universities, research institutes, and leading upstream enterprises in the field of insulation and thermal management materials. Stay up to date with the latest advancements in insulation and thermal technologies, providing technical guidance and training to R&D engineers to enhance overall team expertise.

Qualifications: Ph.D. in Polymer Materials Processing, Polymer Chemistry & Physics, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, or Mechanical Engineering, with 10+ years of experience in relevant fields. Strong foundation in material formulation and applied research, with expertise in polyurethane foam processing and optimization. Familiarity with mold design and the ability to enhance material flowability and overall performance through process improvements. 5+ years of experience in polyurethane foam material R&D, with a deep understanding of insulation materials for refrigerators. Extensive knowledge of polyurethane foam production processes and equipment, with a proven ability to independently resolve technical challenges. Strong innovation skills and a collaborative team mindset. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and project management abilities.

This role could be based in China, with the possibility of a hybrid arrangement. Candidates should be open to either relocating to China or spending approximately half of their time working there while partially working remotely.

title: CS Specialist - Spanish & Portuguese
description:
Bitget are a top-tier digital assets exchange platform with over 50 countries' global footprints, and aim to be the portal that transcends Web2 and Web3, connects CeFi and DeFi, and bridges the vast web of crypto. Top 1 platform for copy trading globally Top 5 derivatives trading globally 8+ million registered users 1K+ employees in over 38 countries Provide stable security of A+ ranking for 12 SSL indicators Proof of Reserves - guarantees 100% of users' assets in reserves

About the Job

We are looking for a Customer Support Specialist (Spanish & Portuguese) to join our global support team. In this role, you will provide live chat and ticket support in both Spanish and Portuguese, assisting customers with account-related issues, cryptocurrency transactions, wallet management, and platform navigation. You will be part of a multilingual, fast-paced team, ensuring top-tier customer service and efficient issue resolution.

Job Responsibilities

Deliver real-time live chat and ticket support in Spanish, Portuguese, and English, providing a seamless customer experience. Assist users with account verification, deposits, withdrawals, security concerns, and technical troubleshooting. Stay informed on company policies, cryptocurrency trends, and industry regulations to provide accurate and relevant support. Work closely with internal teams to escalate and resolve complex customer issues efficiently. Document customer interactions, identify recurring issues, and suggest process improvements. Ensure compliance with data protection and security policies when handling sensitive customer information. Maintain high responsiveness and problem-solving efficiency in a 24/7 rotating shift environment, including night shifts, weekends, and holidays.

Job Requirements

Fluency in Spanish (C1/C2) and Portuguese (C1/C2) – Excellent written and spoken communication skills. Good command of English (B2 or higher) – Ability to communicate effectively in an international team. Customer Service Experience – Previous experience in live chat, ticket handling, or online support is preferred. Technical Aptitude – Basic understanding of cryptocurrency and blockchain is an advantage but not required. Problem-Solving Mindset – Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills to assist users efficiently. Team Collaboration – Ability to work in a multicultural, multilingual customer support team. Flexibility & Adaptability – Willing to work in rotational shifts, including nights, weekends, and public holidays. Risk & Security Awareness – Strong understanding of data security and customer protection best practices.

Nice to have Working knowledge of CRM tools, such as Sprinkler/Zendesk. Familiar with crypto/finance-technology industry Experience working with teams across offices and time zones.

Benefits & Perks Competitive remuneration package (Basic Salary + Yearly Bonuses). Quarterly Team Building Medical, Health & Learning allowance Career growth and promotion Employee engagement, recognition and appreciation program. Multinational working environment

title: Quality Assurance Engineer (Food delivery platform)
description:
We are looking for a

Test Engineer

at either the Middle or Senior level to join one of our teams and help us build great products for our clients.

Customer Our Customer offers a novel approach to office meals. Using their platform, clients receive automated and organized lunches, comprising individual and customizable meals to offices from restaurants. They deliver asymmetric advantages to their clients through vast domain expertise, simplicity, and a high level of service. The Customer is extremely receptive to the professional opinions of the team, so you will have an opportunity to initiate changes and improve the existing solution.

Requirements 3+ years of experience testing large and complex web and mobile applications Experience in API testing (GraphQL) Advanced knowledge of testing techniques and methodologies Strong experience in test planning and estimation Proven knowledge of databases and SQL (complex joins) Experience in automated testing Experience with version control systems (Git) Upper-Intermediate level of spoken and written English Ability to work extended hours once a week Personal Profile Strong analytical skills to troubleshoot issues with different teams, identify root cause, and find effective solutions Attention to detail (from data to pixels) Proactive approach to continuously improve and optimize your work and processes

Responsibilities Perform manual testing of web and mobile UI, APIs, and data Write and maintain test documentation Help the automation engineer to support and expand coverage by automated tests (using Playwright and GitHub) Participate in grooming sessions and work on specifications with the Product Manager

title: Data Analyst
description:
Onebridge is a Consulting firm with an HQ in Indianapolis, and clients dispersed throughout the United States and beyond. We have an exciting opportunity for a highly skilled Data Analyst to join an innovative and dynamic group of professionals at a company rated among the top “Best Places to Work” in Indianapolis since 2015.

Employment Type:

Full Time Location:

Remote - Brazil Industry:

IT & Services, Data & Analytics, Healthcare.

Data Analyst | About You As a Data Analyst, you focus on analyzing and interpreting data to provide insights that drive business decisions and improve system performance. You gather requirements from both internal teams and clients, identify data trends, and offer actionable recommendations. You are passionate about using data to solve business challenges, whether it’s identifying trends, troubleshooting data issues, or supporting decision-making processes. You bring strong analytical skills and attention to detail, ensuring data integrity and clarity in your reports.

Data Analyst | Day-to-Day Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, anomalies, and insights that impact business processes and system performance. Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, working closely with clients and internal teams to ensure data accuracy. Manage and resolve ServiceNow tickets related to data issues, ensuring timely resolution. Gather data requirements from stakeholders, documenting them to ensure accurate reporting and analysis. Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis, supporting better business decisions.

Data Analyst | Skills & Experience 5+ years of experience as a Data Analyst, with expertise in data analysis and problem-solving. Advanced proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis. Familiarity with ERP systems, ensuring smooth data flows between systems and business processes. Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills to work with international clients and technical teams. Experience with Tableau for creating reports and visualizations is a bonus.

A Best Place to Work in Indiana since 2015

title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Currently, we are looking for a Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer who will be a part of the general-purpose data science core team and work with tasks covering a wide variety of business needs with a soft focus on NLP or CV applications. In this position, you will work with multiple data sources (usually textual, numerical and time-related data), huge and small datasets to develop, validate and deploy machine learning models, tune their performance & integrate them into data processing pipelines. Responsibilities: Deal with both structured and unstructured data, collaborate with data engineers on defining data storage formats, state data collection requirements; Not only solve technical tasks but understand business needs and offer appropriate solutions, describe a chosen approach to non-technical people; Set up reproducible experiments: selection, training, validation and optimization of machine learning models, evaluation of their quality in business-related terms; Integrate data preprocessing and model inference into general data processing pipelines; Research new tools, papers, etc. in the machine learning area. Requirements: Strong knowledge and deep understanding of Сlassical machine learning (linear models, decision trees, ensembles for classification and regression tasks, clustering and dimensionality reduction) Main concepts and stages of the modelling process (validation scheme, regularization, overfitting and generalization, data leaks, feature selection, etc.) Experience with Python scientific, visualization and ML-related libraries (numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, etc.) Experience with different clustering techniques Experience with classic NLP tools and techniques (nltk, spacy, n-grams, skip-grams, TF-IDF, tokenizers, lemmatization, dependencies parsing, etc.) Experience with NN frameworks, NLP-related architectures and libraries (Pytorch / Tensorflow, HuggingFace, fasttext, flair, sentence transformersWord2Vec, ElMo, RNN, CNN, Transformer, BERT, etc.) Experience in tuning pre-trained models for different NLP tasks Good Python programming skills Good spoken and written English (at least B1) Ability and desire to convert raw business requests into strictly formulated machine learning tasks Ability to formulate data gathering (or data labelling) requirements Minimum 2-year experience in machine learning

title: DevOps - SRE (Site Reliability Engineering)
description:
Description

Important Information Location:

Brazil Job Mode:

Full-time Work Mode:

Work from home

Job Summary Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a discipline that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.

Responsibilities and Duties Utilize software tools and automated tasks for continuous monitoring and reliability of applications; Act swiftly in response to emergency situations impacting system reliability in production environments, performing root cause analysis for on-going incidents; Oversee and streamline change management processes to enhance system performance and reliability. Ownership of releases to production environments; Work closely with development teams throughout the software lifecycle, with a focus on contributing to solving system-related issues and eliminating toil - automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity; Focus on the reliability and scalability of systems, ensuring high performance and efficiency standards.

Essential Skills Proficiency in monitoring tools like Azure Monitoring, App Insights, Prometheus, Grafana. Project tracking and version management with tools like JIRA, SVN, GitHub; Expertise with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM/Bicep, Pulumi, etc.) and release management tooling (ArgoCD, Harness, Octopus, etc.); Experience in incident alert tools (PageDuty, Opsgenie), and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes, AKS and similar.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist
description:
About this Role

Location: Remote (Brazil)

United World Telecom (est. 1996) offers cloud communication solutions to help businesses around the world communicate with their customers. We have a global and diverse team and over 8,000 customers worldwide.

We’re growing our marketing team and are looking for a Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist with strong technical analytics skills to manage, run, and monitor ad campaigns. An ideal candidate must have proven experience in tracking and managing paid advertisement budgets, ensuring the best returns on the campaigns. They must reside in

Brazil

and work alongside the digital marketing team to create strategic PPC campaigns that drive performance and deliver results.

PPC Responsibilities

Manage and Optimize Campaigns

Manage, monitor, optimize, plan, and create PPC campaigns across channels such as Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media. Research and analyze data to identify the most effective keywords (add relevant keywords and negative keywords) and strategies for our PPC campaigns. Conduct competitors analysis to identify new opportunities and improve our PPC campaigns. Optimize bidding at keyword, placement, device, geographic, demographic, and other levels. With the help of our in-house content team, write engaging and concise copy to modify ads to boost click-through rates and landing pages to boost conversion rates.

Conversion Tracking Implementation and Troubleshooting

Audit, implement, and maintain accurate conversion tracking across all paid campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, , etc.). Set up custom conversion events and parameters to align with account goals and ensure accurate reporting.

Google Tag Manager Expertise

Build and manage GTM containers to deploy tags, triggers, and variables for tracking user interactions (e.g., form submissions, button clicks, scroll depth). Debug and troubleshoot tag firing issues using tools like Google Tag Assistant and GTM preview/debug mode. Optimize GTM setup for scalability and ensure proper data layer implementation.

GA4 Setup and Optimization

Configure GA4 properties, events, and goals in line with campaign KPIs. Troubleshoot discrepancies between GA4, Google Ads, and other platforms to ensure consistent data reporting. Implement enhanced measurement events and custom dimensions/metrics as needed.

Data Accuracy and Reporting

Conduct regular audits of conversion tracking, tags, and analytics accounts to ensure data integrity. Resolve tracking issues (e.g., broken tags, missing events, attribution gaps) swiftly and effectively.

Collaboration and Communication

Work closely with developers to ensure accurate data layer implementation and troubleshoot complex tracking issues. Provide actionable recommendations to improve the quality of conversion data and its alignment with business goals.

Monitoring & Reporting

Perform daily account monitoring and management of PPC campaigns: Review expensive under-performing keywords, ensure PPC campaign does not exceed weekly and monthly ad spend budget, and maintain Quality Score, impression share, and other important metrics. Document and update processes and changes in the internal document server. Send daily & weekly reports to the marketing team.

Requirements / Skills

:

Proven experience as a PPC Specialist or similar role, with a solid understanding of PPC advertising principles and best practices across various platforms. 5-10 years PPC experience in SaaS and telecom industries with B2B emphasis is preferred but not required. Proven experience with Google Ads and Bing Ads; Facebook ads and

ads experience would be an added bonus. Advanced Proficiency in Google Tag Manager: Experience setting up and managing complex GTM implementations, including custom HTML/JavaScript tags and data layer dependencies. Expertise in Google Analytics 4 (GA4): Proven track record of configuring GA4 properties, events, and reports for detailed campaign tracking and attribution analysis. Strong Knowledge of Conversion Tracking: Hands-on experience implementing and troubleshooting tracking setups for platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and

Ads. Debugging and Problem-Solving: Familiarity with debugging tools such as Google Tag Assistant, GTM Debug Mode, Chrome DevTools, and server-side tracking setups. Ability to integrate tracking systems with CRM platforms, marketing automation tools, or custom APIs is preferred but not required. Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and website architecture to collaborate effectively with developers and resolve tracking issues. Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with other team members. Google Ads and Bing Ads certifications within the last 6 to 12 months are a plus. Must be located in

Brazi .

Schedule

: 40 hours a week

Benefits

:

Paid time off Growth opportunities Work with a global team

Compensation

: Will be based on the candidate's experience, earnings in previous jobs, and the local job market.

To apply, email your resume and cover letter to

: Meryl D’Sa-Wilson, Digital Marketing Manager:

title: Lead Backend Engineer (Python)
description:
The company and our mission:

Zartis is a digital solutions provider working across technology strategy, software engineering and product development.

We partner with firms across financial services, MedTech, media, logistics technology, renewable energy, EdTech, e-commerce, and more. Our engineering hubs in EMEA and LATAM are full of talented professionals delivering business success and digital improvement across application development, software architecture, CI/CD, business intelligence, QA automation, and new technology integrations.

We are looking for a

Lead backend Engineer

to work on a project in the data analytics industry.

The project:

Our teammates are talented people that come from a variety of backgrounds. We’re committed to building an inclusive culture based on trust and innovation. You will be part of a distributed team developing new technologies to solve real business problems. Our client is seeking an energetic individual with experience building cloud-first software in AWS to join their team in developing cutting-edge, custom analytics and data socialization solutions. In this role, you will collaborate with other engineers and teams to build their data socialization and visualization application, Atlas.

What you will do:

Collaborate with the team to develop and maintain the backend functionalities of the Atlas platform. Collaborate with the team to develop and maintain AWS platform operations, ensuring robustness and scalability. Write comprehensive unit and integration tests, adhering to best practices in testing. Participate in Code Review and Peer Programming as needed. Collaborate with the Frontend, Data Engineering, and Product teams to align on project requirements and features. Produce Technical Requirements Documents for new features. Schedule and lead design meetings with cross-functional teams. Break down technical epics into manageable stories for estimation and execution. Ensure efficient and effective communication across teams via Slack, Zoom, and email. Understand business requirements and suggest engineering solutions to address business challenges. Engage in client interactions, providing technical insights and support as needed. Participate in an off-hours on-call rotation to provide platform support and address critical issues as they arise.

What you will bring:

Proficiency in Cloud technologies (AWS ideally). Experience with Git, CI/CD, Docker. Strong programming skills in high-level languages such as Python, Java, or Golang. Experience working with SQL and KeyStores. Experience in creating and managing Docker containers and using orchestration services like ECS and EKS. Experience building CI/CD pipelines. Advanced relational database design skills. Experience with software design patterns/design idioms in distributed and serverless architectures.

Nice to have:

Experience with statistical programming, ideally in R or Python. Development experience in a Linux or Mac environment. Experience with React, Angular, HTML, Javascript/Typescript or other web development tools. Experience with integrating Business Intelligence/Data Visualization tools like Tableau or PowerBI. Experience with Terraform, Snowflake, Databricks, Athena, GraphQL.

What we offer:

100%

Remote Work WFH allowance:

Monthly payment as financial support for remote working. Career Growth:

We have established a career development program accessible for all employees with a 360º feedback that will help us to guide you in your career progression. Training:

For Tech training at Zartis, you have time allocated during the week at your disposal. You can request from a variety of options, such as online courses (from Pluralsight and Educative.io, for example), English classes, books, conferences, and events. Mentoring Program:

You can become a mentor in Zartis or you can receive mentorship, or both. Zartis Wellbeing Hub (Kara Connect) : A platform that provides sessions with a range of specialists, including mental health professionals, nutritionists, physiotherapists, fitness coaches, and webinars with such professionals as well. Flexible Working schedule . Multicultural working environment:

We organize tech events, webinars, parties, and activities to do online team-building games and contests.

title: Senior Financial Business Partne
description:
We are seeking an experienced and results-driven

Senior Financial Business Partner

with a background in the IT services industry or other professional services industries to join our finance team. This role will act as a true partner to dedicated functions within the business, focusing on delivering critical financial insights and analysis to support business decision-making. Emphasis will be on budget vs. actual variance analysis, financial support, pricing and deal review, annual budgeting, and mid-year forecasting. The ideal candidate is a strategic thinker with exceptional analytical skills and the ability to communicate complex financial information effectively to various stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities 1. Budget vs. Actual Variance Analysis: Monitor and analyze monthly financial performance against budgets and forecasts. Identify and explain key variances, trends, and financial risks. Work with business leaders to create action plans to ensure financial targets are met. Work proactively to ensure future plans are achievable while reviewing historical performance. 2. Financial Support: Partner with Business Unit and Department leaders to provide financial insights and guidance. Assist in evaluating revenue growth opportunities and cost optimization strategies Review Realization and Utilization reports to optimize gross margin on client engagements Prepare financial reports and dashboards tailored to specific revenue centers. 3. Pricing and Deal Review: Collaborate with sales and business development teams to review and validate pricing structures. Conduct profitability and margin analysis on new and existing deals. Ensure compliance with internal policies and external regulations during deal structuring. 4. Annual Budgeting: Lead the preparation and consolidation of annual budgets, ensuring alignment with strategic goals. Work with department heads to create detailed financial plans. Present budget insights and recommendations to executive leadership.

5. Mid-Year Forecasting: Develop and update mid-year forecasts based on current performance trends and business changes. Provide variance analysis and assess the impact of forecast adjustments on long-term plans. Support scenario modeling and sensitivity analysis for key financial decisions.

Qualifications and Skills Required: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. MBA or CPA is a plus. Experience on financial analysis. Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel and experience with financial modeling. Hands-on experience with ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Netsuite) and financial planning tools (e.g., Hyperion, Adaptive Insights, NetSuite Planning & Budgeting). Strong English language speaking ability. Preferred: Proven track record of supporting revenue-generating functions and performing deal analysis. Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and influence stakeholders at various levels. Effective verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to present to senior leadership. Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines.

Why Join Us? Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and innovative IT services environment. Be a key player in shaping strategic financial decisions. Collaborative company culture focused on growth, innovation, and inclusivity.

title: Analista jurídico sênior
description:
Junte-se a Forvis MazarsSe você quer uma carreira repleta de oportunidades, desafios, crescimento contínuo e um ambiente de trabalho dinâmico e inovador, venha para a Forvis Mazars.Sobre NósSomos uma das

em prestação de serviços, reconhecidos pela nossa excelência e capacidade de fornecer uma experiência única aos nossos clientes e equipes. Acreditamos que o crescimento sustentável é alcançado através do investimento no desenvolvimento de nossos colaboradores e novas tecnologias.Como uma empresa global mantemos alto nível de excelência garantindo uma experiência única através de qualificação, trabalho integrado, tecnologia e desenvolvimento contínuo de nosso time.Sua Jornada ConoscoAqui, você terá a chance de trabalhar com um time de alto nível atendendo clientes globais, construindo conexões valiosas e evoluindo suas habilidades e competências. Oferecemos programas de treinamento focados no seu crescimento e qualificação, programas de desenvolvimento & performance e um ambiente que promove a excelência e aprendizado. Além do trabalho, cuidamos do seu bem-estar, garantindo um ambiente acolhedor, cultivando a riqueza das relações interpessoais.Sobre a áreaNo nosso Jurídico você terá oportunidades de desenvolvimento profissional com interações e responsabilidades junto às principais áreas da empresa. Aqui, você estará envolvido em diversas etapas dos processos legais, oferecendo suporte estratégico para as áreas de negócio, assegurando a conformidade com a legislação e contribuindo para a mitigação de riscos corporativos. Essa experiência proporcionará um contato direto com o time em questões jurídicas desde a análise inicial até a conclusão de cada caso.Responsabilidades e Atribuições:Análise e Elaboração de Contratos: Responsável por elaborar e revisar contratos, incluindo contratos internacionais, garantindo que estejam em conformidade com a legislação vigente e diretrizes internas da empresa;Avaliação de Riscos: Identificar e avaliar cláusulas contratuais, propondo soluções para mitigar riscos legais associados;Atendimento a Demandas Internas: Atender solicitações de diferentes departamentos, oferecendo consultoria jurídica sobre questões contratuais, societárias e contenciosas;Análise e Elaboração de Documentação Legal: Preparar notificações, pareceres e outros documentos legais necessários para a operação da empresa.Requisitos / QualificaçõesFormação Acadêmica: Graduação em Direito e inscrição na OAB;Experiência Prévia: Experiência anterior na área jurídica, especialmente em contratos, societário, contencioso e implantação de sistema de gestão de departamento jurídico;Habilidades: Boa comunicação, proatividade, capacidade de trabalhar em equipe e lidar com prazos;Idiomas: Inglês (avançado);Ferramentas: DocuSign e Pacote Office (Excel e Word).Benefícios:Forvis Mazars Cuida - Cuidados com o seu bem-estar;Serviço de telemedicina;Wellhub;Canal de apoio psicológico;Convênio com o SESC;Vale Refeição/Alimentação (Cartão Flash) – flexibilidade para o seu dia a dia;Vale Transporte;Assistência Médica (Amil);Assistência Odontológica;Seguro de vida (SulAmérica)Se você se identificou com o nosso jeito de ser, venha fazer parte do nosso time! Aqui teremos diversas oportunidades e desafios para que você possa contribuir e se desenvolver em conjunto conosco.Venha fazer parte do Time Forvis Mazars!Juntos podemos fazer a diferença!

title: Procurement/Sourcing Specialist
description:
Company Overview

GEP is a diverse, creative team of people passionate about procurement. We invest ourselves entirely in our client’s success, creating strong collaborative relationships that deliver extraordinary value year after year. Our clients include market global leaders with far-flung international operations, Fortune 500 and Global 2000 enterprises, leading government and public institutions.

We deliver practical, effective services and software that enable procurement leaders to maximise their impact on business operations, strategy and financial performance. That’s just some of the things that we do in our quest to build a beautiful company, enjoy the journey and make a difference. GEP is a place where individuality is prized, and talent respected. We’re focused on what is real and effective. GEP is where good ideas and great people are recognized, results matter, and ability and hard work drive achievements. We’re a learning organization, actively looking for people to help shape, grow and continually improve us.

Are you one of us?

GEP is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, color, national origin, religion, sex, disability status, or any other characteristics protected by law. We are committed to hiring and valuing a global diverse work team.

For more information please visit us on GEP.com or check us out on .com.

What You Will Do

Execute Complex and strategic sourcing projects of categories/sub-categories to include: translating business requirements into clear statements of Work, solicits bids, leads auctions. Should prepare negotiation scripts and negotiate with suppliers, makes recommendations, helps on-board, qualifies and contracts with new vendor and ensures compliance Demonstrated ability to apply and translate business expertise to breakthrough thinking that significantly impacts the clients long-term strategic position, thought leaders. Manage and optimize functional sourcing support activities while ensuring adherence to clients corporate standards. Provide necessary information input to enablement group Engage with internal & external business partners to ensure that decisions are based on the broad scope of the organization and achieve optimum daily execution Manage project allocation, support team members during kick off meeting and share best practices Monitoring performance satisfaction, ensuring all SLAs accountable for are met and drive continuous improvement initiatives , participate in recruitment

What You Should Bring

Excellent knowledge of project management and sourcing Strong Financial analysis and quantitative skills Business acumen: Understanding how markets work Change Mgmt. Skills: Effective influencer who can make persuasive arguments Negotiation skills Excellent communication – written and verbal

title: Engenheiro de Dados - Especialista
description:
Vem pra NÚCLEA Já imaginou se os meios de pagamento parassem de funcionar? Pois é, isso nem passa pela nossa cabeça, porque trabalhamos com inovação, confiabilidade e tecnologia de ponta para que você, pequenas ou grandes empresas possam fazer suas transações com total segurança e agilidade, a qualquer hora do dia ou da noite.

Nosso ambiente é feito de gente movida pela vontade de interagir de forma colaborativa e disposta a se desafiar todos os dias. Estamos cheios de energia para continuar transformando o mercado financeiro. Temos muito Orgulho de Ser NÚCLEA.

Sobre a NÚCLEA

todas as posições consideramos diversidade e inclusão. Na Núclea, valorizamos muito o respeito e a diversidade em nossas equipes, aqui, acreditamos que nossas diferenças são nossas maiores forças. De acordo com nossos valores, as pessoas estão no centro do nosso negócio e somente elas são capazes de movimentar a economia digital em benefício de toda a sociedade.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

Irá atuar com cientistas de dados, arquitetos de dados, engenheiros machine learning para criar produtos inovadores e novas tecnologias que facilitem, acelerem e permitam o desenvolvimento e implantação de soluções de Inteligência Artificial/Aprendizado de máquina com qualidade e escaláveis.

Trabalhar em estreita colaboração com o time técnico para produzir pipelines de dados, de ponta a ponta (extração, tratamento e delivery de dados) e na evolução da arquitetura de dados e DataOps.

Liderar o desenvolvimento em nuvem AWS e plataforma Databricks pipelines de processamento de dados de ponta a ponta para garantir que os dados estejam disponíveis para consumo no data lake e plataforma de produtos

Selecionar a melhor Stack tecnológica e usar as bibliotecas e serviços de nuvem adequados para cada tarefa, alinhado com arquitetura e aplicar as melhores práticas e padrões de engenharia. Produzir código de alta qualidade que nos permita colocar nossas soluções em produção de forma contínua.

Desempenhar um papel ativo nas reuniões de equipe e apresentações para os times de engenharia para difundir as melhores práticas no desenvolvimento de modelos do negócio.

Requisitos e qualificações

Liderar o projeto e implementação de soluções escaláveis de dados, otimizar pipelines de ETL e trabalhar com grandes volumes de dados; Conhecimento nas linguagens Python, PySpark e SQL; Experiência com desenvolvimento utilizando Databricks, AWS e Airflow; Forte conhecimento do fluxo de desenvolvimento de APIs e pilares de segurança envolvidos; Análise de dados.; Visualização de dados; Vivência em ambiente de dados e experiência com arquiteturas modernas de dados (data lake, data lakehouse); Deployment em nuvem; Capacidade de aprender novas linguagens de programação e frameworks de modelagem e análise é indispensável; Capacidade e hábito em ler documentações técnicas de pacotes de manipulação de dados é essencial; Forte habilidade na elaboração e confecção de programas e códigos; Machine Learning – conhecimentos dos fundamentos para poder trabalhar com os cientistas de dados de forma eficiente é um diferencial.

Informações adicionais Modelo de trabalho: Hibrido (no mínimo 2x no escritório por mês)

Salário compatível com o mercado - CLT

Benefícios:

Convênio Médico e Odontológico Vale Refeição - Caju Seguro de Vida Auxilio Home Office PLR Previdência Privada Auxílio creche Wellhub(Gympass)

title: Executivo de Vendas Sênior
description:
Na Bemobi valorizamos o espírito inovador e colaboramos para que pessoas potencializem o seu melhor e, juntos, identificamos afinidades e oportunidades. Se você procura desenvolvimento, desafios e um ótimo ambiente de trabalho, está no lugar certo!

Estamos em busca de um Executivo de Vendas Sênior que será responsável por realizar atendimento comercial aos canais de vendas e contas específicas no território brasileiro, desde reuniões presenciais, participação em feiras e eventos, além de desenvolver estratégias de vendas, oferecendo suporte aos canais e gerenciando os resultados de vendas.

#BeABemober

Responsabilidades e atribuições Atuar 100% como hunter; Elaborar propostas no CRM, negociando e fechando os contratos com o cliente/prospect; Gerir o funil de vendas, identificando e qualificando oportunidades de negócio, a fim de garantir o atingimento das metas estabelecidas pela empresa; Acompanhar e manter todos os dados relativos à trajetória dos clientes (empresas/oportunidades) atualizados no CRM, tais como: registro de visitas comerciais, follow up de atividades e fatos relevantes garantindo visibilidade do potencial de negócios; Antecipar e diagnosticar demandas de clientes e prospects, conhecendo as necessidades e tendências do mercado/segmento; Orientar Executivos mais juniores em visitas a clientes e/ou prospects, dominando e repassando conhecimentos sobre abordagens comerciais e formas de atuação de acordo com o perfil/segmento do cliente/prospect; Estar atualizado com as tendências do segmento de atuação, buscando novos modelos de negócios pautados em tecnologia; Cultivar relacionamentos com decisores C-Level para entender suas necessidades e desafios; Realizar ligações e entrevistas com leads Inbound; Identificar, qualificar e desenvolver oportunidades de vendas; Realizar diagnósticos e demonstrações/apresentações de propostas comerciais.

Requisitos e qualificações Experiência comprovada em vendas B2B para o setor Telecom ou Saúde, com histórico de sucesso em negociações complexas; Ter relacionamento em cases de sucessos com grandes instituições Telecom ou Saúde do mercado brasileiro; Graduação superior completa em áreas relacionadas à tecnologia, negócios ou administração; Irá atuar 80% do tempo externo e 20% interno.

DIFERENCIAL Vivência específica em negociação de soluções (SAAS).

Informações adicionais Benefícios Vale alimentação/refeição com cartão de crédito flash; Ajuda de custos Home Office; Equipamentos necessários para o desenvolvimento da função; Plano de Saúde.

Remuneração Fixo; Variável de comissão.

title: Consultor Projetista
description:
A Todeschini Genuinamente brasileira, a Todeschini se orgulha da sua sólida reputação na produção de móveis planejados nos segmentos residencial e corporativo. São mais de 85 anos fabricando produtos com precisão e projetando espaços para todos os estilos, sonhos e dimensões, no Brasil e no exterior. O cerne dessa história é a capacidade de unir habilidades, inovação industrial e visão de mercado, sempre buscando novas tecnologias e métodos construtivos para a produção de móveis cada vez mais personalizados.

title: Salesforce Enterprise Architect
description:
As a Salesforce Solutions/Enterprise Architect, you will work closely with the Portfolio Leader in the US healthcare industry, focusing on presales efforts, enterprise architecture, and technology selection for a large-scale Patient Support Program project. Your expertise in Salesforce, enterprise architecture principles, and industry-specific challenges will be pivotal in driving successful outcomes.

Responsibilities : Collaborate with the Portfolio Leader on presales activities, including developing enterprise-level architectural strategies, defining solution blueprints, and guiding technology selection. Define and maintain enterprise architecture standards, ensuring alignment with client business goals, scalability, and integration requirements. Conduct comprehensive business analysis to identify needs, evaluate vendor capabilities, and design end-to-end Salesforce-based solutions tailored to enterprise-scale operations. Serve as a trusted advisor on Salesforce architecture and its integration within broader IT ecosystems, ensuring alignment with enterprise-wide technology strategies. Lead the development of architectural artifacts such as solution blueprints, data flow diagrams, integration strategies, and implementation roadmaps. Provide guidance on governance, security, and compliance within the Salesforce ecosystem, addressing enterprise-specific challenges. Conduct high-level evaluations of technology stacks, ensuring solutions adhere to enterprise principles such as scalability, performance, and maintainability. Facilitate stakeholder workshops and present architectural designs, balancing technical depth with business priorities to ensure alignment. Engage directly with clients to understand their strategic goals, translating them into actionable enterprise architecture strategies.

Requirements: Proven experience in enterprise architecture roles, with expertise in designing and implementing scalable solutions for large organizations. Extensive knowledge of Salesforce products (e.g., Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud). Strong understanding of enterprise architecture frameworks (e.g., TOGAF, Zachman) and principles, including governance, scalability, and security. Demonstrated experience in leading large-scale Salesforce implementation projects, including system integration and multi-cloud deployments. Ability to design and manage architectural artifacts, such as solution roadmaps, integration patterns, and data architecture. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to translate complex technical concepts into business language for diverse audiences. Experience working in cross-functional enterprise teams, collaborating with technical, business, and executive stakeholders. Strong knowledge of IT governance, compliance, and best practices in large-scale enterprise environments. Familiarity with Salesforce, Mulesoft, data realization, Databricks integration, Five9 Call Center, and SF Service Cloud Voice - telephony. Willingness to travel 15-20% of the time for client engagements.

Preferred Qualifications Salesforce certifications (e.g., Application Architect, System Architect, Technical Architect) or equivalent experience. Familiarity with API-driven architectures, microservices, and middleware platforms for seamless integrations. Experience in enterprise-scale data migration, master data management (MDM), and business intelligence integration within Salesforce projects. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to manage ambiguity in fast-paced, complex projects.

What We Offer: Paid Time Off:

20 days of vacation, 15 paid sick days with a doctor’s note, and 5 paid sick days without a doctor’s note. Health Coverage:

Medical insurance for employees, with options for family coverage at corporate rates (location-dependent). Professional Development:

Support for attending webinars, conferences, and training sessions. Team Engagement:

Regular team-building activities and bi-annual company-wide events. Flexible Work Options:

Choose between in-office, remote, or hybrid arrangements, based on your preference and manager approval.

title: Analista Sr Folha de Pagamento
description: Você deseja fazer parte da equipe responsável pela área de Folha de Pagamento da Hyundai?Responsabilidades:Processar e gerenciar a folha de pagamento da empresa (CLT, Pro-Labore e Expatriados).Garantir a conformidade com as leis trabalhistas e tributárias.Preparar e executar ordens de pagamento via sistema integrado ERP.Resolver questões relacionadas à folha de pagamento dos funcionários.Preparar relatórios para a alta gerência e o departamento financeiro.Requisitos:Formação superior em Recursos Humanos, Administração, Economia ou áreas correlatas.Experiência em cálculos e legislação trabalhista, incluindo eSocial, DCTFWeb e FGTS Digital. Competência em Análise de Dados, KPIs, Melhoria de Processos e Auditorias Internas e Externas.Proficiência na interpretação e aplicação das Leis Trabalhistas, Acordos Coletivos e Convenções Coletivas.Conhecimento sólido de princípios contábeis e melhores práticas de folha de pagamento.Familiaridade com software de folha de pagamento e MS Office, sistema SAP é o desejado.Habilidades de comunicação e capacidade de lidar com informações confidenciais.Inglês AvançadoA Hyundai Motor Company, sediada na Coreia do Sul, está passando por uma transição significativa de ser fabricante de automóveis para se tornar provedora de soluções de mobilidade inteligente. Para acelerar a concretização dessa mudança, estamos investindo em tecnologias inovadoras que transformarão a maneira como as pessoas interagem com suas soluções de mobilidade e melhorarão sua qualidade de vida.Comprometida com a sustentabilidade, a Hyundai iniciou medidas para liderar uma era de mobilidade mais sustentável eletrificando sua linha de produtos e expandindo seus negócios de hidrogênio para veículos comerciais e dispositivos de utilidade. Além da mobilidade, confiaremos na economia circular para moldar um futuro mais sustentável que beneficiará não apenas a Hyundai como empresa, mas a sociedade como um todo.A Hyundai Motor Brasil começou suas operações em 2012, introduzindo o modelo único HB20 no mercado local, projetado e desenvolvido especificamente para o país. Atualmente, a empresa atua como sede regional para a América Central e do Sul, exportando do Brasil para Uruguai, Paraguai, Colômbia e México. Com perspectivas promissoras para a região, a Hyundai Motor Brasil, também conhecida como Hyundai Motor Central & South América, está introduzindo tecnologia de ponta de modelos premiados mundialmente, como o IONIQ 5, e avançando para implementar soluções movidas a hidrogênio junto com ações sociais e ambientais para contribuir com as sociedades onde opera na região. Se você aspira fazer parte de uma equipe líder em inovação na indústria automotiva, venha se juntar a nós na Hyundai e faça parte desta jornada rumo ao sucesso.Movimento audacioso, energia positiva e trabalho de qualidade; este é o nosso DNA Hyundai; este foi o poder que nos permitiu ser líder global na indústria automotiva e será o poder para criar um novo mundo. Estamos em busca de talentos que escreverão uma nova página de nossa história com o DNA Hyundai.Venha crescer conosco!!!

title: Supervisor de Padaria / Hortifruti
description: Supervisor de Padaria ou Hortifruti - Região de CampinasEstamos em busca de profissionais experientes para integrar nosso time. Se você tem conhecimento técnico em manipulação de alimentos, layout de exposição, normas sanitárias e estratégias comerciais, essa pode ser a sua chance.Principais responsabilidades:Visitar diferentes lojas para garantir a padronização dos processos;Analisar e orientar sobre manipulação, exposição e boas práticas sanitárias;Realizar mini treinamentos com as equipes para melhoria contínua;Monitorar e corrigir possíveis falhas nos processos operacionais e comerciais;Garantir a qualidade e segurança dos produtos expostos.Requisitos:Experiência como supervisor ou líder, na área de padaria ou hortifruti;Ensino superior será um diferencial;CNH ativa e disponibilidade para atuar presencialmente em diferentes cidades da RMC (Região Metropolitana de Campinas);Disponibilidade de viagens.

title: Desenvolvedor Pleno de Software
description:
Estamos em busca de um Desenvolvedor Pleno de Software para atuar no backoffice de aplicativos baseados em Inteligência Artificial. Se você é apaixonado por tecnologia, tem experiência em banco de dados, integração via APIs e desenvolvimento back-end, essa pode ser a oportunidade ideal para você! Responsabilidades: •Desenvolver e manter o backoffice de aplicações que utilizam Inteligência Artificial. •Projetar e otimizar bancos de dados, garantindo eficiência e escalabilidade. •Criar e manter integrações com APIs de terceiros, assegurando comunicação fluida com outras plataformas. •Trabalhar em conjunto com a equipe de front-end para garantir a melhor experiência do usuário. •Realizar testes e otimizações contínuas para melhorar desempenho e segurança.

Requisitos: •Experiência comprovada em desenvolvimento back-end. •Conhecimento sólido em bancos de dados relacionais e não relacionais. •Experiência com integração de APIs REST •Conhecimento em linguagens como Python, preferencialmente utilizando Framework FastAPI. •Experiência com arquitetura de microsserviços é um diferencial. •Capacidade de trabalhar em equipe e se comunicar de forma clara com times multidisciplinares. •Conhecimento em estruturação de prompts para IA é um plus, mas não é essencial.

O que oferecemos: •Ambiente dinâmico e inovador, com projetos de alto impacto. •Oportunidade de trabalhar com tecnologias de ponta e soluções baseadas em Inteligência Artificial. •Trabalho em equipe colaborativa e crescimento profissional. •Modelo de trabalho presencial, com escritório em São Paulo.

Se você se identifica com essa oportunidade e quer fazer parte de um time que está revolucionando o uso da Inteligência Artificial no mercado, candidate-se agora!

#Vaga #Desenvolvimento #Software #IA #InteligênciaArtificial #APIs #Backend #OportunidadeSP #VagaPresencial

title: COORDENADOR DE TESOURARIA
description: A força motriz por trás de nós é o grupo diversificado e talentoso em todo o mundo que traz sua paixão e experiência para o trabalho todos os dias. E embora sejamos uma organização verdadeiramente global, permanecemos profundamente enraizados nas comunidades em que operamos e em que nosso pessoal vive e trabalha.Valorizamos ser inclusivos. Abraçamos e celebramos a diversidade de cada um de nossos funcionários. E com cada novo membro de nossa equipe, ficamos ainda mais fortes. Nossas estrelas estão se alinhando. Então junte-se a nossa equipe e aspire pela grandeza.PRINCIPAIS DESAFIOS:Negociar contratos de cash management (meios de pagamento e recebimento, acordos gerais, conectividade bancária, entre outros);Trabalhar em novas soluções de gestão de caixa;Acompanhamento e projeção de dívidas, fianças bancárias e aplicações financeiras;Controle de documentação e registro de operações financeiras nos respectivos sistemas;Controle SOX, circularização bancária e suporte de auditoria interna e externa;Elaboração e acompanhamento de indicadores de relatórios financeiros;Elaboração de relatórios e execução de rotinas mensais de fechamento contábil e gerencial;Relacionamento com instituições financeiras e áreas internas para busca de oportunidades e soluções para o negócio;Supervisionar equipe de cash management.REQUISITOS NECESSÁRIOSSuperior completo em Administração, Economia, Contabilidade, Ciências Atuariais ou áreas correlacionadas;Desejável Pós-graduação em Finanças, Contabilidade ou Controladoria;Experiência com serviços e convênios bancários, meios de pagamentos, rotinas de back-office de tesouraria e modelagem financeira;Vivência com gestão de equipe;Excel avançado;Inglês avançado;Conhecimento em BI e VBA (Diferenciais);Habilidade nos sistemas SAP e XTPG/XRT (Diferenciais).Na Stellantis, avaliamos os candidatos com base em qualificações, mérito e necessidades do negócio. Acolhemos candidaturas de pessoas de todas as identidades de gênero, idade, etnia, nacionalidade, religião, orientação sexual e deficiência. Equipes diversas nos permitirão responder melhor às necessidades emergentes dos nossos clientes e cuidar do nosso futuro.Venha fazer parte!

title: Senior Financial Business Partne
description:
We are seeking an experienced and results-driven

Senior Financial Business Partner

with a background in the IT services industry or other professional services industries to join our finance team. This role will act as a true partner to dedicated functions within the business, focusing on delivering critical financial insights and analysis to support business decision-making. Emphasis will be on budget vs. actual variance analysis, financial support, pricing and deal review, annual budgeting, and mid-year forecasting. The ideal candidate is a strategic thinker with exceptional analytical skills and the ability to communicate complex financial information effectively to various stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities 1. Budget vs. Actual Variance Analysis: Monitor and analyze monthly financial performance against budgets and forecasts. Identify and explain key variances, trends, and financial risks. Work with business leaders to create action plans to ensure financial targets are met. Work proactively to ensure future plans are achievable while reviewing historical performance. 2. Financial Support: Partner with Business Unit and Department leaders to provide financial insights and guidance. Assist in evaluating revenue growth opportunities and cost optimization strategies Review Realization and Utilization reports to optimize gross margin on client engagements Prepare financial reports and dashboards tailored to specific revenue centers. 3. Pricing and Deal Review: Collaborate with sales and business development teams to review and validate pricing structures. Conduct profitability and margin analysis on new and existing deals. Ensure compliance with internal policies and external regulations during deal structuring. 4. Annual Budgeting: Lead the preparation and consolidation of annual budgets, ensuring alignment with strategic goals. Work with department heads to create detailed financial plans. Present budget insights and recommendations to executive leadership.

5. Mid-Year Forecasting: Develop and update mid-year forecasts based on current performance trends and business changes. Provide variance analysis and assess the impact of forecast adjustments on long-term plans. Support scenario modeling and sensitivity analysis for key financial decisions.

Qualifications and Skills Required: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. MBA or CPA is a plus. Experience on financial analysis. Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel and experience with financial modeling. Hands-on experience with ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Netsuite) and financial planning tools (e.g., Hyperion, Adaptive Insights, NetSuite Planning & Budgeting). Strong English language speaking ability. Preferred: Proven track record of supporting revenue-generating functions and performing deal analysis. Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and influence stakeholders at various levels. Effective verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to present to senior leadership. Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines.

Why Join Us? Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and innovative IT services environment. Be a key player in shaping strategic financial decisions. Collaborative company culture focused on growth, innovation, and inclusivity.

title: Data Analyst
description:
Onebridge is a Consulting firm with an HQ in Indianapolis, and clients dispersed throughout the United States and beyond. We have an exciting opportunity for a highly skilled Data Analyst to join an innovative and dynamic group of professionals at a company rated among the top “Best Places to Work” in Indianapolis since 2015.

Employment Type:

Full Time Location:

Remote - Brazil Industry:

IT & Services, Data & Analytics, Healthcare.

Data Analyst | About You As a Data Analyst, you focus on analyzing and interpreting data to provide insights that drive business decisions and improve system performance. You gather requirements from both internal teams and clients, identify data trends, and offer actionable recommendations. You are passionate about using data to solve business challenges, whether it’s identifying trends, troubleshooting data issues, or supporting decision-making processes. You bring strong analytical skills and attention to detail, ensuring data integrity and clarity in your reports.

Data Analyst | Day-to-Day Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, anomalies, and insights that impact business processes and system performance. Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, working closely with clients and internal teams to ensure data accuracy. Manage and resolve ServiceNow tickets related to data issues, ensuring timely resolution. Gather data requirements from stakeholders, documenting them to ensure accurate reporting and analysis. Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis, supporting better business decisions.

Data Analyst | Skills & Experience 5+ years of experience as a Data Analyst, with expertise in data analysis and problem-solving. Advanced proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis. Familiarity with ERP systems, ensuring smooth data flows between systems and business processes. Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills to work with international clients and technical teams. Experience with Tableau for creating reports and visualizations is a bonus.

A Best Place to Work in Indiana since 2015

description:

Vivência de sucesso no desenvolvimento e implementação de soluções técnicas complexas em SAP. Experiencia no processo de pré-vendas de serviços em projetos SAP. Capacidade de construir relacionamentos eficazes com clientes e stakeholders internos e externos

Desenvolvimento profissional

É claro que cuidaríamos do seu desenvolvimento aqui na Deloitte! title: DevOps - SRE (Site Reliability Engineering)
description:
Description

Important Information Location:

Brazil Job Mode:

Full-time Work Mode:

Work from home

Job Summary Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a discipline that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.

Responsibilities and Duties Utilize software tools and automated tasks for continuous monitoring and reliability of applications; Act swiftly in response to emergency situations impacting system reliability in production environments, performing root cause analysis for on-going incidents; Oversee and streamline change management processes to enhance system performance and reliability. Ownership of releases to production environments; Work closely with development teams throughout the software lifecycle, with a focus on contributing to solving system-related issues and eliminating toil - automating routine tasks for enhanced productivity; Focus on the reliability and scalability of systems, ensuring high performance and efficiency standards.

Essential Skills Proficiency in monitoring tools like Azure Monitoring, App Insights, Prometheus, Grafana. Project tracking and version management with tools like JIRA, SVN, GitHub; Expertise with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM/Bicep, Pulumi, etc.) and release management tooling (ArgoCD, Harness, Octopus, etc.); Experience in incident alert tools (PageDuty, Opsgenie), and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes, AKS and similar.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: UX Designer
description:
Se você é uma pessoa que é gente boa, gosta de aprender e é apaixonada por resultados, você está no lugar certo! Como maior empresa de tecnologia do Brasil, queremos construir um ecossistema cada vez mais forte, com pessoas que gostem de inovar e acreditem na colaboração para fazer a diferença!

Aqui temos um ambiente dinâmico, que celebra a diversidade, promove a inclusão e está sempre em busca dos melhores resultados! Acreditamos no poder transformador da tecnologia e na sua capacidade de contribuir para a construção de uma sociedade mais diversa e inclusiva. Por isso, temos compromisso com nossa política e programa de diversidade e inclusão para garantirmos um ecossistema cada vez mais representativo, respeitoso e acolhedor.

#ouseetransforme #sejaTOTVER

Missão do cargo Liderar a governança de premissas e boas práticas de pesquisa de processo, serviços e produtos corporativos e Design Thinking, por meio da criação de ferramentas e conteúdo que auxiliem os designers realizar a descoberta de necessidades e problemas dos usuários destas soluções com o objetivo de assegurar a promoção e manutenção da cultura de design focada na experiência do usuário de produtos TOTVS e garantir que as soluções sejam escaláveis e melhorem o dia dia das pessoas usuárias.

O QUE VOCÊ VAI FAZER: Liderar a criação de

ferramentas, conteúdos e dinâmicas

para aprimorar as pesquisas de design aplicadas a processos, serviços e produtos corporativos. Conduzir

pesquisas de necessidades e problemas dos usuários

de soluções corporativas, formulando hipóteses e testando soluções eficazes. Desenvolver e documentar pesquisas para o

Design System , garantindo consistência e escalabilidade no design. Criar

protótipos de baixa fidelidade, jornadas e blueprints

da experiência do usuário em processos, serviços e produtos corporativos. Trabalhar em colaboração com

Designers, Desenvolvedores, Agilistas, POs, PMs e Tribes

para transformar requisitos de negócio em experiências interativas inovadoras. Disseminar a cultura de

UX Design

dentro da organização, promovendo boas práticas e referências do mercado. Participar das

decisões estratégicas da equipe , mentorando e desenvolvendo designers menos experientes. Fomentar a comunicação e a experiência digital entre

diversas squads de produtos , garantindo um alto padrão de trabalho em UX Design.

O QUE ESPERAMOS DE VOCÊ: Formação Acadêmica Ensino superior completo em Design, Publicidade, Comunicação, Tecnologia ou áreas correlatas. Conhecimentos Específicos Domínio em Research OPS, entrega de conteúdo e ferramentas de UX Design. Conhecimento avançado em pesquisa qualitativa e quantitativa, incluindo: Criação de roteiros de pesquisa e insights para ideação. Desenvolvimento de user flow e blueprints para processos, serviços e produtos. Estruturação de roteiros para validação de conceito. Habilidade em facilitação de times para workshops, entrevistas, testes e dinâmicas de priorização. Domínio na criação de conteúdo e gravação de vídeos sobre UX Design. Experiência com projetos complexos em processos, serviços e produtos digitais, utilizando Design Thinking. Domínio sobre Future Thinking e sua aplicação estratégica. Capacidade de construir propostas de projetos e cronogramas de Research. Conhecimento avançado em: Técnicas de pesquisa, entrevistas e testes de conceito. Ferramentas e métodos de priorização. Prototipação de baixa fidelidade. Documentação e disponibilização de pesquisas. Metodologias como Design Sprint e Design Thinking. Enviar candidatura

Disponibilidade para atuar no modelo híbrido na matriz da TOTVS, localizada na região de Santana/SP.

title: Senior CRM analyst
description:
About the role

This is a 100% remote position for people located in Brazil

We are looking for a

Senior CRM Analyst

to development and execution of advanced CRM strategies, focusing on

customer lifecycle management, retention, and revenue growth . In this role, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams in a

fast-paced, multicultural environment , leveraging data-driven insights to optimize campaigns and drive business impact.

What you will be doing: Lead the design and implementation of multichannel CRM strategies, including automated and ad-hoc journeys; Develop and optimize communication flows to enhance customer engagement and retention; Conduct advanced A/B tests and experiments to optimize campaign performance; Analyze CRM metrics and business results, providing actionable insights to stakeholders and leadership; Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align CRM strategies with business goals; Manage relationships with external partners and vendors; Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering a culture of learning and growth; Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to drive innovation in CRM strategies.

What you´ll need to succeed in this role: Advanced knowledge of CRM platforms (e.g., Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Insider, or similar); Expertise in customer lifecycle management and multichannel strategies; Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Google Sheets, Metabase, or similar); Strong experience with A/B testing and campaign optimization techniques; Familiarity with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g., Looker Studio) is a plus. Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field; Advanced degree or certifications in CRM, digital marketing, or data analysis are a plus.

Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field; Advanced degree or certifications in CRM, digital marketing, or data analysis are a plus. 3+ years of experience in CRM, digital marketing, or a related field; Proven track record of designing and implementing successful CRM strategies; Experience working in a multicultural, multiproduct, and multiplatform environment. Fluent in Portuguese (both written and spoken); Advanced English (both written and spoken).

Why choose SandBox

Engage. Entertain. Educate . Sandbox Group is set to redefine learning through its portfolio of award-winning digital & physical products and services for kids, parents, and teachers. The business is focused on bringing families and educators the best experiences in a safe and fun environment, and hopes to create a world where everyone is empowered to learn! The team at Sandbox understands the time, discipline, and expertise needed to develop brilliant learning experiences. Over the next few years, their aim is to reach more kids, parents, and teachers across the world. They intend to build and diversify their current offering by bringing additional products and services into the Sandbox family, covering the core audiences; Pre-K, K-8 Kids, Parents, and Teachers.

✊ Our compromise with DE&I At our company, we firmly believe that diversity is the key to success. We are dedicated to fostering an inclusive atmosphere and actively seeking team members from a wide range of professional and cultural backgrounds. If you're eager to take on your next significant career opportunity, we eagerly await your application! Benefits Package (Brazil only)

At Sandbox, we highly value your work journey with us! That’s why we offer a complete benefits package to make your day-to-day easier, which includes: Meal/Food Voucher : R$924/month, so you can enjoy a good meal every day! Health and Dental Insurance : 100% covered for employees and 50% covered for dependents, with no co-pay. Home Office Allowance : R$250/month to help cover your electricity, internet, and other expenses. Furniture Allowance : In your first month of work, we’ll provide a one-time payment of R$800 for you to set up your workspace as you like. Childcare Allowance : We reimburse part of the cost for daycare or a nanny until your child turns 5 years old. Gympass : To help you stay physically fit. Life Insurance : So you’re always protected. ‍‍

Extended Maternity and Paternity Leave : So you can make the most of this special moment!

title: Associate Manager
description:
Introduction of Clearstate Clearstate specializes in healthcare-focused market intelligence and strategic advisory services, assisting MedTech companies, biotechnology firms and healthcare service providers in identifying and leveraging market growth opportunities. We are committed to delivering actionable strategies rooted in robust data analytics, built on the basis of market realities, empowering our clients to make informed decisions. Our mission is to provide credible, actionable and granular market insights globally, and provide value-adding advisory tailored to the needs of the MedTech sector. We are seeking highly motivated Associate Manager/ Manager to lead the development and delivery of market data solutions and custom research projects aligned with our business objectives.

Responsibilities

Project Management Lead a team of analysts in developing global market tracker solutions and custom research projects focused on healthcare market insights Define project requirements, including analytical models, research methodologies, timeline and budgets Ensure project setup, design, and delivery are aligned with client needs, providing actionable, customer-centric insights Innovate and enhance data solutions by conceptualizing new product ideas, additional analyses, and improvements Apply advanced analytical and quantitative tools to extract meaningful business insights

Content Development and Project Delivery Deliver high quality data insights with deep domain knowledge expertise in assigned sectors and regions Develop clear, actionable recommendations based on research and analysis Confidently lead client presentations, ensuring clarity and impact Serve as the client engagement lead, communicating project updates and presenting key milestones

Client and Stakeholder Engagement Collaborate with client to align on deliverables, ensuring insights meet their needs Engage effectively with various client stakeholders during project delivery and presentations Support business development and marketing initiatives by contributing content and domain expertise For Managers:

Lead, appraise and develop team members, fostering skill development and ensuring team success

Experience 5+ years in market analysis, market intelligence, or business consulting, with proven project and client management experience (preferably in healthcare or consulting)

Qualifications Bachelor’s or Masters’ degree in Science, Business or related fields MBA preferred
