title: SAP Data Migration Associate Consultant
description:
ABOUT US

Syniti

is

the

enterprise data partner, empowering anyone who relies on data to make business-critical decisions by delivering data they can trust through a unique combination of intelligent software and experts who deeply understand the role of data in enterprise growth.Trusted by the Fortune 2000, Syniti helps leading businesses reconfigure the role of enterprise data from afterthought to foundational first step; enabling them to unlock valuable insights that ignite growth, reduce risk, and expand their competitive advantage.Syniti’s

Data First

philosophy and enterprise data management platform supports data migration, data quality, data replication, data matching, master data management, analytics, data governance, and data strategy in a single, unified solution.As an innovative, global leader in Enterprise Data Management, the combination of our award-winning software platform and premier consultants creates a unique advantage for leading enterprises. Syniti is also a preferred data solution used by the

world’s top system integrators

. Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices in 25 countries around the world, Syniti operates in all global regions and industry verticals, and maintains a 100% client success rate across thousands of complex data projects and initiatives.The ROLEWe predominantly deliver data migration projects to global clients, while also working in data quality and data governance.All our consultants use software created on our proprietary ‘DSP’ platform to perform all aspects of the data migration project lifecycle.We are recruiting talented and motivated individuals to join our team delivering data projects for clients, and offer training, mentoring and project focused development opportunities for candidates passionate about pursuing a career in data.WHAT YOU WILL DOAfter an initial training period, a Data Migration Consultant will be expected to:Demonstrate a strong understanding of our own Data Migration / Data Governance methodologyDemonstrate strong proficiency in our tools, working to prescribed development standardsGood understanding of business processes for assigned functional areaDemonstrate a strong knowledge of underlying technical data structures and definitions of assigned functional process areaDevelop data migration / governance rules in our tools as per supplied specificationContribute to integrated data migration design for assigned process area through data analysis, reporting and collaboration with on-site BOA and client colleaguesDesign, create and execute reports in alignment to project deliverablesCreate and maintain data load programsMaintain related documentationExecution of end-to-end data loads and reconciliationsWHAT IT TAKESDegree level qualification in Computer Science (or other technology related field)Experience in ETL / Data Migration / Data Quality / Data AnalysisFunctional ERP (SAP / Infor etc.) experienceProject experience across ERP implementationsExperience with T-SQLDatabase experience - SQL Server, Oracle etc.Excellent English written and verbal communication skillsProficient in MS OfficeWHAT WE OFFERTrust

that you are good at what you’re doing. At Syniti you will find a supportive environment and access to learning tools, but micromanagement is not our thing.Growth

. We are growing rapidly and steadily solving the biggest challenges enterprise companies are faced with today. There was never a better time to join and grow with us. Most importantly you will have the chance to shape our journey and share in our success story.Support

. We all rely on each other and enable each other to be successful. You won’t stand alone.Curiosity and genuine interest in you

. We all have our different stories, all equally fascinating with each depicting a different journey and we want to hear them all.Recognition

. We are the sum of individual achievements and we always take the time to celebrate them.An open organisation

. Hierarchies are not our thing and access is something we make sure of across the board. We are a family where everyone is just as important, everyone’s work is seen and ideas valued.

title: Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist
description:
About this Role

Location: Remote (Brazil)

United World Telecom (est. 1996) offers cloud communication solutions to help businesses around the world communicate with their customers. We have a global and diverse team and over 8,000 customers worldwide.

We’re growing our marketing team and are looking for a Digital Advertising - PPC Specialist with strong technical analytics skills to manage, run, and monitor ad campaigns. An ideal candidate must have proven experience in tracking and managing paid advertisement budgets, ensuring the best returns on the campaigns. They must reside in

Brazil

and work alongside the digital marketing team to create strategic PPC campaigns that drive performance and deliver results.

PPC Responsibilities

Manage and Optimize Campaigns

Manage, monitor, optimize, plan, and create PPC campaigns across channels such as Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media. Research and analyze data to identify the most effective keywords (add relevant keywords and negative keywords) and strategies for our PPC campaigns. Conduct competitors analysis to identify new opportunities and improve our PPC campaigns. Optimize bidding at keyword, placement, device, geographic, demographic, and other levels. With the help of our in-house content team, write engaging and concise copy to modify ads to boost click-through rates and landing pages to boost conversion rates.

Conversion Tracking Implementation and Troubleshooting

Audit, implement, and maintain accurate conversion tracking across all paid campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook, , etc.). Set up custom conversion events and parameters to align with account goals and ensure accurate reporting.

Google Tag Manager Expertise

Build and manage GTM containers to deploy tags, triggers, and variables for tracking user interactions (e.g., form submissions, button clicks, scroll depth). Debug and troubleshoot tag firing issues using tools like Google Tag Assistant and GTM preview/debug mode. Optimize GTM setup for scalability and ensure proper data layer implementation.

GA4 Setup and Optimization

Configure GA4 properties, events, and goals in line with campaign KPIs. Troubleshoot discrepancies between GA4, Google Ads, and other platforms to ensure consistent data reporting. Implement enhanced measurement events and custom dimensions/metrics as needed.

Data Accuracy and Reporting

Conduct regular audits of conversion tracking, tags, and analytics accounts to ensure data integrity. Resolve tracking issues (e.g., broken tags, missing events, attribution gaps) swiftly and effectively.

Collaboration and Communication

Work closely with developers to ensure accurate data layer implementation and troubleshoot complex tracking issues. Provide actionable recommendations to improve the quality of conversion data and its alignment with business goals.

Monitoring & Reporting

Perform daily account monitoring and management of PPC campaigns: Review expensive under-performing keywords, ensure PPC campaign does not exceed weekly and monthly ad spend budget, and maintain Quality Score, impression share, and other important metrics. Document and update processes and changes in the internal document server. Send daily & weekly reports to the marketing team.

Requirements / Skills

:

Proven experience as a PPC Specialist or similar role, with a solid understanding of PPC advertising principles and best practices across various platforms. 5-10 years PPC experience in SaaS and telecom industries with B2B emphasis is preferred but not required. Proven experience with Google Ads and Bing Ads; Facebook ads and

ads experience would be an added bonus. Advanced Proficiency in Google Tag Manager: Experience setting up and managing complex GTM implementations, including custom HTML/JavaScript tags and data layer dependencies. Expertise in Google Analytics 4 (GA4): Proven track record of configuring GA4 properties, events, and reports for detailed campaign tracking and attribution analysis. Strong Knowledge of Conversion Tracking: Hands-on experience implementing and troubleshooting tracking setups for platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and

Ads. Debugging and Problem-Solving: Familiarity with debugging tools such as Google Tag Assistant, GTM Debug Mode, Chrome DevTools, and server-side tracking setups. Ability to integrate tracking systems with CRM platforms, marketing automation tools, or custom APIs is preferred but not required. Basic understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and website architecture to collaborate effectively with developers and resolve tracking issues. Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with other team members. Google Ads and Bing Ads certifications within the last 6 to 12 months are a plus. Must be located in

Brazi .

Schedule

: 40 hours a week

Benefits

:

Paid time off Growth opportunities Work with a global team

Compensation

: Will be based on the candidate's experience, earnings in previous jobs, and the local job market.

To apply, email your resume and cover letter to

: Meryl D’Sa-Wilson, Digital Marketing Manager:

title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
Job Title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER (REMOTE)

About: Flatiron is a global remote software development company with engineers located around the world. We unite experts from diverse backgrounds and experiences in a collaborative culture to deliver exceptional products and services for our clients. As a forward-thinking software engineering company, we provide industry-leading solutions to complex problems in both the US and the UK. Operating in a fast-paced, agile environment, we specialize in software consulting for our clients. We offer a stimulating and rewarding environment for our team members. We value innovation, continuous learning, and professional growth, and we strive to create a workplace where everyone can thrive. Join us at Flatiron and be a part of a team that is shaping the future of software development.

Job Summary This is a full-time, fully remote working opportunity where you will be working as part of a Scrum team, collaborating closely with other software engineers, stakeholders, and contributors on the project. The role requires working within the US timezone. Actively participating in meetings, engaging in decision-making processes, and working cross-functionally with internal and external teams are essential responsibilities.

Responsibilities Develop high-quality software design and architecture using JavaScript. Implement and manage tracking solutions using

Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and Google Pixel

to optimize data collection and reporting. Identify, prioritize, and execute tasks in the software development life cycle. Review and debug JavaScript code to ensure optimal performance. Integrate and configure event tracking, conversion tracking, and custom analytics solutions. Collaborate with internal teams and vendors to fix and improve products. Document development phases, maintain tracking configurations, and monitor system performance. Attend Scrum meetings and actively contribute to project decisions.

Minimum Qualifications Advanced level of written and oral English proficiency. 4+ years of software development experience with a strong focus on

JavaScript . Hands-on experience with

Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and Google Pixel . Proficiency with other server-side languages such as

Python, Ruby, Java, or PHP . Familiarity with database technologies such as

MySQL, Oracle, or MongoDB . Strong understanding of

Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles . Experience working in

Agile development environments .

Benefits Yearly Office Allowance Budget Macbook Purchase Support Wellbeing Support

If you are a good fit for the position, please apply through . We only accept CVs that are in English.

title: Administrador de Banco de Dados DBA (Database Administrator)
description:
Responsabilidades do Trabalho: Liderar a arquitetura, engenharia, implementação e operações de todos os sistemas de dados para suportar escalabilidade, disponibilidade e desempenho. Colaborar com equipes de engenharia durante todo o ciclo de vida do desenvolvimento de software para resolver problemas complexos, mantendo padrões e melhores práticas de banco de dados. Responsável por garantir a estabilidade e funcionalidade de aplicativos/bancos de dados, incluindo todos os ambientes: desenvolvimento, teste e produção. Monitorar, investigar e solucionar problemas de banco de dados de produção, coordena a recuperação de incidentes e comunica-se com as respectivas equipes de suporte e líderes de engenharia. Ajuda a manter todos os armazenamentos de dados na infraestrutura de nuvem AWS. Trabalhar com equipes estratégicas de relatórios e análise de dados para ajudar a construir/atualizar data warehouses. Suporte fora do horário de expediente conforme necessário (A posição requer que o candidato trabalhe no Horário Padrão do Leste (EST), que está 2 horas atrás do Horário de Brasília (BRT))

Requisitos: Mais de 5 anos de experiência como Administrador/Engenheiro de Dados Experiência no gerenciamento de bancos de dados na plataforma de nuvem Amazon Web Services (AWS) (EC2 e RDS) Experiência em Microsoft SQL Server 2016 ou mais recente Experiência com Microsoft SQL AlwaysOn HA e ambientes SAN Experiência com Redshift e PostgreSQL Projeto e implementação de soluções de recuperação de desastres, incluindo cenários de geo-replicação Fortes habilidades em TSQL, Powershell e Python Experiência sólida com melhorias de desempenho de consultas Conhecimento sólido das melhores práticas de design relacional Conhecimento sólido de design de data warehouse (esquema em estrela, floco de neve, etc.) Inglês avançado e boas habilidades de comunicação escrita e verbal para interagir com engenheiros e gerentes Experiência com implantação contínua

Habilidades Preferenciais: Abordagem agnóstica de banco de dados. Disposto a trabalhar com tecnologias novas e emergentes Conhecimento prático de alta disponibilidade e recuperação de desastres (HA/DR) da AWS Experiência em nível superior em Ciência de Dados e ferramentas de ciência de dados Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de MongoDB Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de Redis Experiência no desenvolvimento e administração de Solr Experiência com sistemas operacionais como UNIX, LINUX, CentOS Exposição ao trabalho dentro de uma organização de desenvolvimento ágil

Atuação 100% remota.

description:

Participação em publicações, eventos, workshops ou dissertação/tese relacionados a RAG, LLMs ou AI Generativa. Experiência: Essencial:

Transformers

e

e ajuste fino de arquiteturas LLMs; Capacidade de transformar POCs em soluções robustas e escaláveis; Habilidades Técnicas: Experiência com frameworks de RAG; Domínio de ferramentas de AI Generativa como OpenAI, Azure ML, ou GCP Vertex AI; Conhecimento prático em pipelines de dados e deploy em ambientes de produção; Familiaridade com ferramentas como SQL, Airflow e soluções em nuvem; Familiaridade com frameworks como TensorFlow, PyTorch ou JAX para prototipagem e desenvolvimento de modelos; Soft Skills: Raciocínio lógico e capacidade analítica; Boa Comunicação; Espírito de equipe e capacidade de resolução de conflitos; Ter capacidade de comunicação com diversos perfis de stakeholders; Habilidade de trabalhar em equipes ágeis e multidisciplinares; Criatividade e Proatividade para imaginar diferentes cenários de uso das aplicações; Organização. title: Site Readiness Engineer
description:
Pathlock is a leader in application security, access governance, and compliance automation. Our cloud-based solutions help organizations secure critical applications, mitigate risk, and enforce policies across a diverse IT landscape.

We are looking for a skilled

Site Readiness Engineer (SRE)

with experGse in CI/CD automaGon and Azure cloud technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring deployment readiness across our infrastructure, automaGng deployment processes, and maintaining opGmal site performance within our cloud environment.

Key Responsibilities Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to support application deployment and infrastructure provisioning. Develop and enhance automation scripts to streamline deployment processes and minimize manual tasks. Configure, manage, and optimize cloud resources in alignment with security standards and best practices. Collaborate with development teams to troubleshoot and resolve deployment and site readiness issues. Monitor site performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement improvements to enhance system reliability and efficiency. Participate in on-call rotations to provide production deployment support and incident resolution. Create and maintain technical documentation for deployment processes, system configurations, and troubleshooting procedures. Conduct site readiness assessments and validation tests to ensure infrastructure and applications are production ready. Implement and enforce Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices using tools such as Terraform and ARM templates. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to deployment failures, infrastructure provisioning, and application performance. Qualifications 3-5 years of experience in site reliability engineering, DevOps, or similar roles Strong proficiency in CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, or similar Solid experience with Azure cloud services, including Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Database services and networking controls Hands-on experience automating deployment workflows and infrastructure provisioning Working knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, ARM templates, or similar tools Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash, Python, or similar Experience with GitOps tools like ArgoCD or Flux Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) Strong understanding of networking principles and Azure networking services Knowledge of security best practices for cloud environments Must be able to read and speak fluently in English Must be able to work at least some time in the US or EU time zone Preferred Qualifications Azure certifications (Azure Developer Associate, Azure DevOps Engineer Expert, or Azure Administrator) Experience with monitoring tools such as , Application Insights, ELK or Grafana Experience with log aggregation and analysis tools in particular Elastic and Prometheus Understanding of high availability and disaster recovery concepts Experience with containerized applications with a Windows OS Why Join Pathlock? Opportunity to lead a cutting-edge cloud security platform. Work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment. Competitive compensation, benefits, and equity options. Collaborative and inclusive company culture.

title: Arquiteto(a) SAP Basis (Hana DB)
description:
Arquiteto SAP Basis Somos a HCLTech, uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia e DSA que mais crescem no mundo, com mais de 224.000 profissionais espalhados em 60 países, impulsionando o progresso através de recursos líderes do segmento e centrados nas áreas de Digital, Engenharia e Nuvem.

A força motriz por trás desse trabalho, nosso pessoal, é um público diversificado, criativo e apaixonado, o que nos possibilita estar sempre elevando o padrão de excelência de nossos serviços. De nosso lado, trabalhamos para que cada um de nossos profissionais possa atingir seu melhor, ao mesmo tempo em que nos esforçamos para ajudá-los a encontrar sua inspiração diária e, assim, se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmos.

Estamos à procura de um

altamente talentoso e automotivado para se juntar a nós em nossa jornada para avançar no mundo tecnológico por meio da inovação e criatividade.

Somos uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia que mais crescem no mundo, com escritórios em mais de 60 países e 224.000 colaboradores. Nossa empresa é extremamente diversificada com 165 nacionalidades representadas.

• Oferecemos a oportunidade de trabalhar com colegas espalhados ao redor do mundo. • Oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho virtual em primeiro lugar, promovendo uma boa integração entre seu trabalho e vida pessoal, em uma flexibilidade real. • Estamos comprometidos com seu crescimento, oferecendo oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento de carreira em todos os níveis para ajudá-lo a encontrar seu brilho único. • Oferecemos benefícios abrangentes para todos os funcionários. • Somos certificados como "Great Place to Work" e "Top Employer" em 17 países, e reconhecidos como “Top Employer” no Brasil especificamente, oferecendo um ambiente de trabalho positivo que valoriza o reconhecimento e o respeito dos funcionários.

Igualdade & Oportunidade para Todos

Representando 165 nacionalidades em todo o mundo, nos orgulhamos de ser um empregador que oferece igualdade de oportunidades, comprometido em fornecer oportunidades iguais de emprego a todos os candidatos e funcionários, independentemente de raça, religião, sexo, cor, idade, nacionalidade, gravidez, orientação sexual, deficiência física ou informações genéticas, ou qualquer outra classificação protegida, de acordo com as leis federais, estaduais e/ou locais.

title: Lead Data Architect
description:
Building a risk applications and tools for innovative international top-tier hedge fund from the ground up, comprising the systems for traders, pre-trade checks and analysis, risks and limits management, reports of trading activities, FIX connectivity, market data providers connectivity (e.g. Bloomberg B-pipe), etc The Team is focused on the development and maintenance of various database applications supporting Risk Management. The successful candidate will have considerable and proven experience in database design, PL/SQL development, a good working knowledge of end-user and server-side data processing techniques, a good understanding of SDLC and agile development methodologies.

Responsibilities: Developing business friendly data models. Migration from SQL Server -> Fabric and/or Azure

Mandatory Skills Description: - Strong understanding of data modelling and data quality principles - Experience across data architecture and data warehousing techniques and practices is essential. - Proven experience in designing and developing data models using industry best practices - Experience in using code management and CI/CD tools such as Github, Azure Devops, Jenkins, Bamboo etc. - Senior (10+ years) MS SQL Server developer/architect. - Azure fabric serviсe experience - 10+ years of experience working with ETL tools such as SSIS, ADF or similar. - Good understanding and demonstrated experience working with Power Query (M query language) and DAX. - Management of Power BI datasets, workspaces and the associated security requirements. - Familiarity with Power BI Premium capabilities, Power BI Rest APIs, Python and Databricks will be highly regarded. - Extensive experience designing and developing reports and performance metrics from complex and disparate platforms

Nice-to-Have Skills Description: - Experience with Azure - Risks trading system development experience. - Business knowledge in trading domain / capital

Languages: English: B2 Upper Intermediate

title: iOS Developer
description:
We are looking for a iOS engineer to build discovery experiences that serve the Adoption mission within our native app on surfaces such as the feed, the community tab and the post page.

What you’ll Do ● Move fast while balancing quality. We can’t afford extensive processes, and we also can’t afford show-stopping bugs. We need people who can balance speed with quality while quickly building brand-new products. ● Contribute meaningfully to team strategy. We give everyone a seat at the table and encourage active participation in planning for the future. Don’t just come along for the ride. ● Communicate effectively, within the team and across disciplines. Work closely with product managers and designers to craft compelling user experiences. What we’re looking for ● 4+ years mobile development experience with multiple parts of the iOS stack. We develop with Swift. Experience with Combine or RxSwift is strongly preferred. Experience with Storekit framework, Texture, UIKit, or SwiftUI are nice to have, but not required. ● Ability to design and implement complex distributed systems operating under high load. ● Experience developing customer-facing public applications is preferred. ● Entrepreneurial spirit. On our team, everyone needs to act like a startup CEO. You must be self-directed, innovative, and biased towards action in fast-paced environments. You live to build new things and thrive in ambiguity and even failure.

● Excellent communication skills. You must be able to collaborate effectively with teams in a fully-remote environment, and discuss complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.

title: Consultor comercial
description:
Junte-se a Forvis Mazars

Se você quer uma carreira repleta de oportunidades, desafios, crescimento contínuo e um ambiente de trabalho dinâmico e inovador, venha para a Forvis Mazars.

Sobre Nós

Somos uma das

10 maiores empresas

em prestação de serviços, reconhecidos pela nossa excelência e capacidade de fornecer uma experiência única aos nossos clientes e equipes. Acreditamos que o crescimento sustentável é alcançado através do investimento no desenvolvimento de nossos colaboradores e novas tecnologias. Como uma empresa global mantemos alto nível de excelência garantindo uma experiência única através de qualificação, trabalho integrado, tecnologia e desenvolvimento contínuo de nosso time.

Sua Jornada Conosco

Aqui, você terá a chance de trabalhar com um time de alto nível atendendo clientes globais, construindo conexões valiosas e evoluindo suas habilidades e competências. Oferecemos programas de treinamento focados no seu crescimento e qualificação, programas de desenvolvimento & performance e um ambiente que promove a excelência e aprendizado. Além do trabalho, cuidamos do seu bem-estar, garantindo um ambiente acolhedor, cultivando a riqueza das relações interpessoais.

Sobre a área

A área comercial é responsável por conectar as necessidades dos serviços oferecidos, guiando cada um deles pela jornada de compra ideal. Mais do que vender, a área comercial deve influenciar a decisão de compra do cliente, garantir sua satisfação e criar um relacionamento sólido.

Responsabilidades e Atribuições

Identificar, atrair e captar potenciais clientes alinhados com os objetivos estratégicos da empresa; Planejar e organizar encontros com prospects e clientes para apresentar os serviços oferecidos; Desenvolver e personalizar propostas de valor que atendam às necessidades específicas de cada cliente; Realizar análise de mercado e coletar informações sobre potenciais clientes para segmentação estratégica; Conduzir negociações de forma assertiva, visando o fechamento de acordos que sejam vantajosos para ambas as partes; Colaborar na criação e implementação de ações para ampliar a base de clientes e aumentar a receita; Explorar oportunidades de negócios adicionais dentro da carteira atual, visando a expansão dos serviços oferecidos; Inserir e manter informações atualizadas no sistema CRM, incluindo dados de clientes e histórico de interações; Trabalhar com foco no cumprimento de metas estabelecidas, como abertura de novas oportunidades e geração de receita; Monitorar e avaliar o desempenho de vendas para ajustes nas estratégias e práticas comerciais; Assegurar a satisfação do cliente após a venda e identificar novas demandas que possam surgir; Elaborar relatórios sobre atividades comerciais, resultados e oportunidades, reportando-se aos gestores;

Requisitos / Qualificações

Ensino superior completo em Administração de Empresas, Economia, Comunicação Social, Gestão Empresarial, Marketing ou cursos relacionados; Experiência na área comercial com vendas e relacionamento com clientes; Inglês (desejável); Experiência em empresas de consultoria e, serviços terceirizados (desejável);

Benefícios

Serviço de telemedicina; Gympass; Canal de apoio psicológico; Convênio com o SESC; Vale Refeição/Alimentação (Cartão Flash) – flexibilidade para o seu dia a dia; Vale Transporte; Assistência Médica (Amil); Assistência Odontológica; Seguro de vida (SulAmérica) Descontos e, incentivos educacionais em diversas instituições.

Se você se identificou com o nosso jeito de ser, venha fazer parte do nosso time! Aqui teremos diversas oportunidades e desafios para que você possa contribuir e se desenvolver em conjunto conosco.

Venha fazer parte do Time Forvis Mazars! Juntos podemos fazer a diferença!

Desenvolvimento Técnico da Unidade Cruz Alta.

Quais as responsabilidades? Desenvolver e acompanhar os KPIs do setor; Organizar a Gestão da Rotina junto à liderança operacional; Planejar a execução das atividades operacionais; Gerir e acompanhar as recomendações técnicas de fertilizantes, corretivos, inseticidas, fungicidas, bioestimulante e maturadores; Consolidar as informações e garantir o cumprimento do Plano de Aplicação de Vinhaça; Desejável experiência com Excel, PowerPoint, PowerBi, QGis e InCeres; Auxiliar no planejamento de colheita, tratos culturais, preparo de solo e plantio; Acompanhamento dos mapas de pós aplicação de fertilizantes e corretivos; Gerir e acompanhar o orçamento do setor.

Quais os requisitos? Desejável Superior Completo e/ou cursando; Experiência em planejamento de colheita, tratos culturais, preparo de solo e plantio; Vivência em gestão da rotina; Pacote Office Avançado; Residir em São José do Rio Preto ou Olímpia/SP.

Qual localidade? Olímpia/SP.

O que buscamos num profissional? Neste cenário de crescimento sustentável, buscamos talentos para enfrentar os desafios do setor, que tenham atitude, sejam engajados e saibam estabelecer parcerias na busca pela excelência. A Tereos acredita que todos os profissionais podem contribuir com o crescimento do grupo. Por isso, pessoas com deficiência são bem-vindas a nossa empresa.

Sobre a Tereos Com visão de longo prazo no processamento de matérias-primas agrícolas e desenvolvimento de produtos alimentícios de qualidade, a Tereos é uma das líderes nos mercados de açúcar, álcool/etanol e amidos. Os compromissos do Grupo com a sociedade e com o meio ambiente têm contribuído com a performance da companhia no longo prazo, enquanto reforça nossa atuação responsável. O Grupo cooperativo Tereos reúne 12.000 agricultores e possui expertise reconhecida no processamento de beterraba, cana-de-açúcar, cereais e batata. Com operação em 15 países, 43 unidades industriais e o compromisso de 15.800 colaboradores, a Tereos atende seus clientes em seus mercados locais, com uma oferta ampla de produtos. Em 2022/23, o Grupo obteve um faturamento de € 6,6 bilhões.

Tereos no Brasil A Tereos no Brasil é composta pela Tereos Açúcar & Energia Brasil, Tereos Amido & Adoçantes Brasil e Tereos Commodities Brasil. No noroeste do Estado de São Paulo, a Tereos Açúcar & Energia Brasil concentra suas sete unidades de processamento e duas refinarias. A Tereos Amido & Adoçantes Brasil, com operação em Palmital (SP), diversifica o portfólio da Tereos Brasil com a fabricação de produtos derivados de milho. A Tereos Commodities opera como trading e possui escritórios em diversos países.

title: Especialista de FP&A
description:
Descrição das Atividades: • Suportar Presidência e Diretorias com informações e análises visando busca de oportunidades para melhora de resultado; • Elaborar e analisar o Forecast semanal do DRE de Vendas e Produção, com foco nos desvios comparados ao PO e ao S&OP e com objetivo de direcionar a companhia para as melhores decisões; • Acompanhar as variações de cenários de Preço, Câmbio, Custo, Mercado e inserir as possíveis oscilações em previsões de resultado; • Elaborar visões de resultado com diversas aberturas visando acompanhar e comparar os resultados individuais por canal, cliente, mercado, marca, regional e sinalizar oportunidades e desvios para potencializar resultado; • Direcionar através de valoração de impactos nos indicadores operacionais (Indústria e Agro) as tendências e desvios que impactam diretamente no resultado; • Atuar junto ao Planejamento, Comercial e Produção para definir melhores estratégias de Mix de produção e venda; • Avaliar viabilidade de Projetos de Investimento e acompanhar sua efetividade e retorno financeiro; • Elaborar o Material de Report Mensal e Trimestral para a Presidência; • Centralizar, acompanhar e validar o Orçamento anual do Resultado do Negócio; • Elaborar análises históricas e comparativas de cenários e indicadores;

Pré-requisitos: • Superior Completo; • Conhecimento de Fábricas, Agropecuária ou Comercial (conhecimento de ambos será diferencial); • Capacidade analítica e raciocínio lógico; • Excel Avançado;

title: Bio-Economy Experts - EIB Framework Contract EIBAS LOT 6
description:
NTU International A/S, leading a strong international consortium, is proud to have been awarded the next 4 years of EIBAS FWC Lot 6!

We are building up a pool of experts who will be interested in short term assignments on the various EIB priorities under this framework contract.

Keep updated and follow us at

for more information on our projects.

Position : Bio-economy Expert Location : Inside and outside EU-27 Assignment duration:

48 months Project budget:

10M EUR

Qualifications and skills: · At least 10 years professional experience in the field. · Experience working with EU, EIB, WB etc. financed projects. · A Master’s Degree or Bachelor's Degree relevant to the topic

Specific professional experience within at least one of the following sectors: Natural resources and natural capital management: · Management and reclamation of land, water, and biosphere resources, including projects addressing land degradation, natural ecosystems and forests, nature-based solutions, natural capital and ecosystem restoration, soil salinity, nonpoint source pollution or promoting sustainable land and/or water management practices or sustainable forest management, including afforestation and reforestation.

Rural infrastructure, equipment, machinery, and input supply: · Rural roads, rural markets, irrigation, drainage, water storage, field machinery and equipment as well as projects related to input supply including seeds and fertilisers.

Primary production and biomass: · Primary production and biomass from agriculture, forestry, fisheries, and aquaculture. This includes sub-sectors such as perennial crops, annual crops, livestock rearing, forestry production including for feeding biomass for related industries.

Food and biomass material manufacturing: · Agro-processing (e.g., nuts or vegetable processing and packing), biomass transformation (e.g., dairy processing), and biomass utilisation for energy or materials production (e.g. use of wood residues as biofuel or to produce plywood) and the pulp and paper and other forest industries.

Transport and storage: · Storages facilities such as warehouses and silos including port silos to improve transport facilities, food/grain conservation and reduce losses. In addition, services will also be related to systems designed around this infrastructure, like warehouse receipt systems to improve access to finance for agricultural producers.

Improve access to rural finance: · Support to counterparty banks and financial intermediaries to improve their knowledge and capacity to design products better suited to clients in the primary agriculture, forestry, fisheries and associated agro-processing sub-sectors through institutional and capacity building activities, enhancement of risk management systems or support in the appraisal and monitoring of loans. · Lastly, it may also include value chain analysis and market studies to tailor financial products.

Language skills: · Excellent command of English (CEFR C1) (Minimum requirement

If you are interested in this position, please apply, and upload your CV. Please also make sure that you include one or more telephone numbers.

The work location is Remote.

Only selected candidates will be contacted.

title: Analista de Segurança da Informação - Blue Team
description: Aqui na Nelogica, desenvolvemos tecnologias e pessoas de alta performance com o propósito de transformar o futuro do mercado financeiro!Você tem sede de desafios e está a fim de fazer parte de um time que busca a excelência, impactando diretamente milhares de usuários?No nosso Blue Team, sua missão será atuar na proteção da nossa infraestrutura e na manutenção da nossa segurança operacional, visando o aumento de nossa maturidade em relação à segurança e, a melhoria contínua dos nossos processosOs principais desafios são:Gestão de vulnerabilidades e resposta a incidentes;Administração e tratamento de logs de ferramentas EDR;Realizar investigações utilizando metodologias forensics;Realização de ações voltadas à proteção dos nossos sistemas, serviços e processos;Identificação de falhas de segurança e aplicação de controles de correção;Verificação da eficácia de cada medida de segurança;Monitoramento dos controles e melhoria dos mesmosO que é essencial que você apresente:Ensino superior completo ou em andamento na área de Tecnologia da Informação;Interesse em se manter atualizado em relação às principais ameaças e vulnerabilidades que atingem as organizações;Conhecimento em Endpoint Protection;Conhecimento em Firewalls, VPNs, IDS/IPS (host e rede), Antivírus, DLP, SIEM e WAF, além de SOs Windows e Linux;Boa capacidade de comunicação e organização.O que é um diferencial:Conhecimento equivalente a CCNA Security ou CompTIA Security+Conhecimento em desenvolvimento seguro;Conhecimento com arquiteturas em nuvem Azure, GCP e AWS;Conhecimento em Firewall, Crowdstrike/SIEM-SPLUNK.

title: Concept Artist - Free Fire
description:
About Garena:

Established in 2009 and headquartered in Singapore , Garena is a leading online games developer and publisher with a global footprint across more than 130 markets.

Garena provides global users access to popular and engaging mobile and PC online games that it develops, curates, and localizes. It champions games as a social and entertainment platform on which its communities can engage and interact.

In addition, Garena is a leading esports organizer. It hosts esports events around the world that range from grassroots local tournaments to some of the most viewed professional esports competitions globally. The Free Fire World Series 2021 Singapore, which was watched by 5.4 million concurrent viewers at its peak, holds the record for the highest concurrent viewership of any esports match in history.

About the position: We are looking for a

Concept Artist

who will be responsible for creating a variety of high-quality skins and assets for in-game use, conveying the artistic direction of the assigned art lead and aligning with the product's objectives.

If you are a driven person who wants to contribute to the gaming industry, we’d love to work with you!

Make sure to share your CV and attach the link to your *portfolio* in it.

Responsibilities: Follow the Art Director's visual direction to create and refine unique, high-quality designs within the production schedule. Create characters, skins, assets, environments, or any other concepts needed during game development Provide reference material for 3D artists and animators to execute their processes more efficiently and effectively, considering technical and product constraints. Collaborate with the art team to ensure the art direction remains consistent across all assets produced Participate in team discussions, promoting and encouraging the generation of new ideas and concepts to creatively develop the projects. Foster collaboration across diverse teams to help achieve the product's goals

Main job requirements: Completed superior's degree in Graphic Design, Game Design, Animation or related fields; Solid experience in creating assets for games or a similar field; Specific Tool Skills

: Adobe Photoshop; Full professional competency in both written and spoken Portuguese; Intermediate/Advanced english skills; Passionate about the gaming universe; Available to work in person at our office in São Paulo, SP.

Desirable knowledges | experience: Knowledge of 3D software Deep understanding of fundamental art principles (color, composition, value/lighting, form) Strong communication skills and the ability to provide and accept constructive criticism. Strong understanding of the design process Familiarity with pop culture, including movies, series and multimedia content.

title: Analista de Controles Operacionais Pleno
description:
Criada em 2011, a Zurich Santander Insurance America é uma joint venture entre os grupos Zurich e Banco Santander, dois dos maiores conglomerados do mundo nos setores de seguros e financeiro. Com um dos portfólios mais amplos de seguros do mercado, comercializamos nossos produtos através do canal de vendas do banco Santander Brasil, México, Chile, Argentina e Uruguai.

Na ZS nos preocupamos em manter um ambiente que contemple a diversidade. São oferecidas oportunidades iguais e todos os candidatos são considerados qualificados para as vagas, sem discriminação por motivos de deficiência, sexo ou orientação sexual, gravidez ou licença-maternidade, raça ou origem nacional ou étnica, idade, religião ou crença, identidade de gênero, estado civil, status de veterano protegido (se aplicável) ou qualquer outra característica protegida por lei.

Se você é uma pessoa inovadora, dinâmica, proativa, gosta de desafios e trabalha bem em equipe, aqui é o seu lugar!

Desafio: Especificar, desenvolver e realizar a modelagem de controle operacionais da seguradora em conjunto com o time operacional para servir de apoio à construção de dashboards de monitoramento, análises e melhoria de processo para tomada de decisão.

Principais responsabilidades: Analisar dados operacionais para identificar, avaliar e mitigar riscos com base nos controles estabelecidos; Estruturar informações e KPIs, assim como dar suporte na tomada de decisão; Interface com as áreas de emissão, produtos, projetos, TI, contábeis e atuarial para implantação de correções sistêmicas; Estruturar e desenvolver controles utilizando databricks e linguagem de programação juntamente com as equipes operacionais a fim de criar indicadores chave para monitoramento da atividade; Identificar oportunidades de automação de processos operacionais e trabalhar para implementar a solução definida junto com o time de tecnologia e operações.

Requisitos técnicos: Formação em Business Intelligence, Análise de Dados ou áreas correlatas; Pacote MS Office avançado; Experiência com Databricks; Conhecimento em programação em Python ou SQL; Experiência com criação de dashboards em Power BI.

Habilidades e competências: Capacidade Analítica e visão estratégica; Proatividade; Senso de urgência; Comprometimento com prazos e entregas; Trabalho em equipe; Bom relacionamento interpessoal com áreas parceiras.

O(A) CANDIDATO(A) reconhece que, ao enviar o Currículo e/ou preencher a candidatura para vaga de emprego, com fornecimento das informações nela constante, concorda que os dados pessoais serão usados pela ZURICH SANTANDER para avaliação decorrente do processo seletivo, sendo esta a única finalidade, análise para avaliação do candidato, referidas informações poderão ser compartilhadas com empresas que nos apoia na avaliação do processo seletivo. Os dados do(a) CANDIDATO(A) serão guardados com todo zelo e cuidado, e mantidos pelo prazo previsto na legislação.

title: Auditor externo
description:
O grupo líder mundial em Teste, Inspeção e Certificação, está com vagas de emprego abertas para o Projeto 2025 em Carazinho e região.

A vaga é para autuar como auditor agrícola em um dos maiores projetos da empresa à nível nacional, uma oportunidade para contribuir com o desenvolvimento da qualidade no agronegócio nacional.

Não é necessário experiência prévia.

Os selecionados passarão por imersão no Projeto, recebendo treinamento sobre as atividades e uso dos sistemas de inspeção, a primeira fase de seleção é realizada integralmente online.

Buscamos profissionais que incorporem nossos valores, não têm medo de desafios, busquem inovar, experimentar e se aprimorar rapidamente. Nosso objetivo é contratar e reter os indivíduos mais brilhantes, oferecendo crescimento profissional e oportunidades de desenvolvimento em toda a carreira.

Sobre a oportunidade: Estamos buscando Auditores Agrícolas que contribuirão com atividades de coleta de dados através do acompanhamento de testes transgênicos em pontos de recebimento de soja (PDR's) em silos, armazéns e cooperativas.

Atividades: Visitar PDRs (armazéns); Garantir execução das metodologias; Revisão das informações coletadas em campo; Comunicação tempestiva com os líderes alinhamento das divergências encontradas; Verificação de formulários e validação dos dados coletados em campo.

O que buscamos: Disponibilidade total de horários (inclusive aos finais de semana); Disponibilidade para viagens por até 60 dias pelo estado; CNH B ativa; Ensino médio completo; Possibilidade de atuar na sua cidade e em regiões do Sul (caso necessário); Facilidade em manuseio de tecnologias (tablets e smartphone); Ética, responsabilidade, comprometimento, organização

Remuneração: valor R$ 1.750,00 + ajuda de custo de R$ 1.780,00 + bonificação mensal de R$ 200,00 -

Contratação CLT (temporário de até 60 dias)

Candidatos contratados que se destacarem em suas funções poderão ser efetivados em diferentes cargos e setores dentro da empresa, além de terem prioridade de contratação em outros projetos pontuais da divisão de Agronegócios.

Em caso de viagens a empresa custeia todas as despesas: deslocamento entre as cidades de origem e de atuação, hospedagem, transporte, aluguel de veículo, alimentação, lavanderia, internet.

A empresa desempenha papel fundamental para o fortalecimento do setor, inspecionando anualmente, mais de 30% dos grãos produzidos no país e mais de 50% do volume exportado nos principais portos brasileiros.

title: Agente de Negócios - Representante Comercial PJ - Presidente Venceslau, São Paulo, Brasil
description:
Nosso Modo de Fazer no Time Somos uma empresa brasileira de tecnologia, referência na América Latina. Com soluções inovadoras, conectamos milhares de restaurantes a milhões de consumidores diariamente, com uma média de 100 milhões de pedidos mensais. Além do delivery de comida, também somos Mercado, Farmácia e Pet. Contamos com o iFood Pago, nossa Fintech, que engloba o iFood Benefícios e o iFood Pago, o banco do restaurante. Junte-se a nós e faça parte de uma equipe que está sempre na vanguarda, com tecnologia de ponta e inovação constante.

Seu Cardápio Diário Nesta posição, você será o ponto de conexão entre o iFood e novos parceiros de negócios. Seu dia a dia será guiado por estratégias de expansão, conquistando novos clientes em áreas com grande potencial de crescimento. Entre as principais responsabilidades, você irá: Prospecção de novos parceiros: Identificar oportunidades de mercado e atrair restaurantes e estabelecimentos para o ecossistema iFood. Gestão de funil de vendas: Realizar acompanhamento detalhado do pipeline, assegurando a conversão em cada etapa. Acompanhamento contínuo: Manter contatos regulares e estruturados com potenciais clientes para estreitar relacionamentos. Gestão de relacionamento: Ser referência no atendimento às demandas dos parceiros, garantindo uma experiência incrível desde o início. Colaboração estratégica: Trabalhar de forma integrada com o time para maximizar resultados e impulsionar a presença do iFood em novas regiões. Ingredientes que Buscamos Experiência em vendas: Um diferencial será ter atuado com vendas externas, prospecção ou gestão de carteira. Comunicação excepcional: Habilidade oral e escrita para interações via telefone, WhatsApp e e-mail. Perfil organizado e resiliente: Energia, senso de dono e capacidade de se adaptar a um ambiente dinâmico. Habilidade de negociação e persuasão: Capacidade de argumentar e buscar resultados acima da média, sempre com foco no cliente. Relacionamento interpessoal: Facilidade em criar conexões significativas e construir parcerias de longo prazo. Morar na cidade e ter como se locomover: Ser residente da cidade e possuir mobilidade para realizar deslocamentos com facilidade.

Sobre Nós No iFood, acreditamos na força da diversidade para gerar #Inovação e alcançar #Resultados incríveis. Por isso, valorizamos candidatos independentemente de deficiência, gênero, orientação sexual, raça/etnia, idade, origem, constituição familiar ou estética. Temos grupos compostos por foodlovers voluntários, onde falamos sobre Raça, Gênero, LGBTQI+ e PcD. Queremos ser a empresa onde as pessoas escolham se desenvolver e realizar seus sonhos. #AllTogether. Conheça nossas iniciativas → Tem Fome de Quê? Temos fome de inovação e resultados. Sempre buscamos fazer o nosso melhor, pensando "fora da caixa" e agindo com agilidade e responsabilidade. Valorizamos a diversidade, o conhecimento e o compartilhamento em um ambiente dinâmico e versátil. O ingrediente especial da nossa receita? As pessoas. Vem fazer parte disso!

title: Desenvolvedor(a) Backend Java Sênior
description:
Sobre nós

O Magalu é uma das maiores empresas de varejo do Brasil, reconhecida por sua inovação e presença digital. O time de tecnologia do Magalu é formado por profissionais inovadores e apaixonados por transformar o varejo digital. Com foco em soluções ágeis e escaláveis, desenvolvem projetos que impactam milhões de clientes. Em um ambiente colaborativo, buscam constantemente a excelência em tecnologia e inovação.

#vemserfeliz #OrgulhodeSerMagalu

Descrição do Cargo:

Trabalhar em time ágil participando das cerimônias, contribuindo para manter o ambiente saudável entre os membros da equipe e promover entregas constantes com qualidade e segurança; Desenvolver o produto com qualidade por meio da criação de testes e revisão de código, prover melhorias e corrigir eventuais problemas nos produtos por meio de priorização do Product Owner a fim de garantir a satisfação do cliente com a empresa; Atualizar o produto em ambiente de produção por meio de integração contínua, garantindo sua estabilidade;

Para atuar nessa função é essencial que você tenha experiência com:

- Desenvolvimento Orientado a objetos; - Desenvolvimento de testes unitários; - Programação na linguagem Java, preferencialmente a partir da versão 8; - Conhecimento em Spring Framework, trabalhamos bastante com Spring-Boot; - Criação de APIs HTTP seguindo o padrão REST; - Versionamento usando Git; - Arquiteturas baseadas em micro serviços; - Modelagem e uso de Banco de Dados NoSQL como MongoDB; Se você conhece a respeito do Cassandra, excelente! - Uso de cache, com Redis, por exemplo; - Mensagerias com Kafka; - Desenvolvimento baseado em TDD e BDD.

Se você conhecer ou tiver experiência com algum dos itens abaixo é melhor ainda:

- Métodos ágeis; - Criação de testes de integração e testes de carga; - Uso de containers com Docker; - Kubernetes; - Experiência em alguma ferramenta de observability (NewRelic, DataDog, Elastic APM, etc) e/ou agregador de logs (Graylog, Logstash, etc) - Quarkus - PostgreSQL

Benefícios que oferecemos:

VR/VA, Vale Transporte, Assistência Médica e Odontológica e Auxílio Creche. Gympass para bem-estar e saúde. Bolsa de estudo com até 50% de desconto. Descontos especiais nas empresas do Grupo Magalu (Magalu, Netshoes, Época Cosméticos, Estante Virtual, Kabum entre outras). Auxílio Creche

Modelo de Trabalho

title: Business Development and Account Manager
description:
We are looking for an Business Development and Account Manager (Brazil)

Description of work: We are looking for a Sales and Account Manager, responsible for Brazil, to create long-term, trusting relationships with our customers. The role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, develop new business from existing clients and actively seek new sales opportunities. This position may require travel up to 30%.

Position Responsibilities · Serve as the lead point of contact for all customer account management matters, · Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships, · Develop new business opportunities with present and new customers in dedicated region and create new opportunities based on an in-depth understanding of market potential, specific customer requirements and company capabilities, · Generate sales revenue with existing customers in line with the organization objectives and goals, · Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits, · Develop trusted advisor relationships with key accounts, customer stakeholders and partners, · Clearly communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders, · Present the business case for pursuing specific opportunities including profit potential, strategic advantage, competitive analysis and win probability, · Meet commitments within cost, schedule and performance parameters, · Adapt to changing business environment and priorities by complex problem solving and conflict resolution, · Undertake other duties/projects assigned.

Desired Skills and Experience · Relevant Work Experience: 5+ years either in Technical or Account/Sales related position where constant communication with external customers has been required · Business Understanding: Knowledge of the Airport/Ground Handler/Airline Industry · Ability to grasp the technology and product concepts to refer their value to customers · Demonstrable ability to communicate, present and influence key stakeholders at all levels of an organization, including executive and C-level

title: Project Cost Controller
description:
Project Cost Controller with extensive project experience required to join our team based at our facility in Rio de Janeiro. This role will be offered on a full time permanent basis.

PURPOSE OF POSITION

This role is responsible for the overall financial/cost control, accounting and reporting of all commercial projects. This person should ensure the project is managed to the contractual commercial terms stipulated and ensure correct project accounting is applied at month end. This role is pivotal in working as a business partner with the project teams with the ultimate goal of maximizing the company’s contracts, cost control, project profitability and cash generation through successful commercial management of contracts through identification of opportunities and mitigation of any risks.

MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES Health & Safety

All our employees have a duty to take care for their own health and safety and that of others who may be affected by their actions at work. They must also co-operate with management and co-workers to help everyone meet their legal obligations. We ask you carry out assigned tasks and duties in a safe manner, in accordance with instructions, and to comply with all Safety & Environmental rules / procedures, regulations and codes of practice. Ensure that you follow any instructions or health, safety & environmental training CRCE provide and report any hazards, injuries or ill health that present a serious and imminent risk and inform our QHSE department about any shortcomings you identify within your health and safety arrangements. To ensure you comply with CRCE Quality, Health, Safety and Environmental procedures, policies and objectives.

The below is not an exhaustive list of duties and you will be expected to perform different tasks as necessitated by your changing role within the organisation and the overall business objectives of the organisation.

Contract Management Commercially manage multiple projects from receipt of award until final account stage and in conjunction with Project Delivery Manager, assume responsibility for delivery of the expected Project margin. Review and interpret contracts ensuring compliance and with the aim to ensure maximum potential is realised. Review commercial documents, prepare applications & invoices, raise and submit CORs for the client in agreement in accordance with the contract. Monitor and review weekly site report, to ensure final forecasts keep up to date, to ensure billing will be accurate and for timely identification of Change orders. Build positive relationships with customers to improve opportunities of repeat business and additional scopes. Commercial Forecasting Preparation of weekly & monthly forecasting of projects profitability and cashflow in line with business requirements. Prepare & populate revenue, revenue accruals, reserves to the project cost account on a monthly basis ensuring Revenue Recognition policy & Project accounting is followed, with support from Finance if any clarification is required. Ensure a summary of the position of each contract is prepared at month end providing explanation of any variances to forecast for revenue during the month end close process. Undertake detailed formal project reviews monthly to understand and explain profitability compared to bid and forecast Seek out opportunities/ risks, but also provide feedback to project delivery and proposals teams to take decisive action to mitigate any overspend/ provide accurate pricing. Present project profitability to Senior Management Team monthly.

Debt Collection and Cashflow Forecasting Liaise with credit controller with regards to updating on a weekly basis timing of receipts for debt, latest billings on projects & retentions. Support in the preparation of a weekly 13-week cashflow for receipts for Trade Receivables, Retentions and unbilled. Support with ad hoc analysis of projects as and when required. Support in the provision of financial evidence for internal or external audits as and when required.

REQUIREMENTS Education Required: Graduate/Degree in Accounting & Finance or equivalent preferred. Part Qualified Accountant and/or recently qualified accountant 2PQE Work Experience Required: Background in contracts/project accounting is essential Experience in commercial project management Previous experience of managing a multi-million-dollar project P&Ls Project accounting experience Cashflow & Project Profitability forecasting experience Administration background

Skills & Knowledge Required: Strong Leadership skills Strong influencing & negotiation skills Excellent written, verbal, interpersonal and analytical skills Able to work in a team environment and work in matrix structure. Able to consistently meet competing deadlines. Detail oriented and excellent organization skills. Able to interpret data and turn that data into information to be used in making business decisions.

COMMUNICATIONS REQUIREMENT Internal Communications: (who, how) Operations Sales, Tendering, Finance Procurement,

description:

altamente talentoso e automotivado para se juntar a nós em nossa jornada para avançar no mundo tecnológico por meio da inovação e criatividade.

• Continuous delivery and configuration management of the SAP Ariba Cloud products using variety of deployment tools • Continuous delivery and configuration management of the SAP Ariba Cloud products using variety of deployment tools. • Effectively and quickly respond to deployment requests, and provide overall technical support for the SAP Ariba product suite. • Work closely with subject matter experts within various Engineering teams. • Ensure user tickets and change requests are handled according to pre-defined SLA's for response time, updates, and closure. • Develop and automate manual tasks to improve day-to-day activities and scalability of timeconsuming operations. • Manage complex deployment projects – such as setting up new sites, business continuity (DR), provide guidance and recommendations to technical teams, and clearly communicate progress and issues encountered to management teams. • Certificate management, certs renewal and debugging issues. • Document standard operating procedures to effectively utilize ITIL best practices. Qualifications

•

Advanced English • Experience working in a Unix environment • Experience working in a 24 x 7 enterprise environment • Experience in provisioning and managing public cloud Environment, preferably GCP and AWS • Experience in Cloud provisioning tools, preferably Terraform • Experience in CI/CD and devops tools like Jenkins, Artifactory, Docker, Vault • Development experience with Python/Go/Groovy • Triage and support system applications including but not limited to Apache, DNS, mail solutions, SSH, TCP/IP, NFS and common Internet protocols. • Excellent knowledge of operating system internals, file system structures and machine architectures in a Linux operating environment. • Experience and excellent knowledge of certificate management • Ability to write and maintain Perl/Python and Shell scripts to automate processes and enhance productivity. • Basic knowledge of Hana database administration • Experienced working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment with well-developed practices and procedures. • Outstanding interpersonal, analytical, and communication skills • Must be reliable and dependable with ability to multi-task across various functions • BA/BS degree in MIS/CS or equivalent experience • Linux/Unix • Cloud provisioning tools, preferably Terraform • CI/CD and devops tools like Jenkins, Artifactory, Docker, Vault • Development experience with Python/Go/Groovy • Triage and support system applications including but not limited to Apache, DNS, mail solutions, SSH, TCP/IP, NFS and common Internet protocols.

Por que nos escolher?

Somos uma das maiores empresas de tecnologia que mais crescem no mundo, com escritórios em mais de 60 países e 224.000 colaboradores Nossa empresa é extremamente diversificada com 165 nacionalidades representadas Oferecemos a oportunidade de trabalhar com colegas espalhados ao redor do mundo Oferecemos um ambiente de trabalho virtual em primeiro lugar, promovendo uma boa integração entre seu trabalho e vida pessoal, em uma flexibilidade real Estamos comprometidos com seu crescimento, oferecendo oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento de carreira em todos os níveis para ajudá-lo a encontrar seu brilho único. Oferecemos benefícios abrangentes para todos os funcionários Somos certificados como "Great Place to Work" e "Top Employer" em 17 países, e reconhecidos como “Top Employer” no Brasil especificamente, oferecendo um ambiente de trabalho positivo que valoriza o reconhecimento e o respeito dos funcionários

Igualdade & Oportunidade para Todos

Representando 165 nacionalidades em todo o mundo, nos orgulhamos de ser um empregador que oferece igualdade de oportunidades, comprometido em fornecer oportunidades iguais de emprego a todos os candidatos e funcionários, independentemente de raça, religião, sexo, cor, idade, nacionalidade, gravidez, orientação sexual, deficiência física ou informações genéticas, ou qualquer outra classificação protegida, de acordo com as leis federais, estaduais e/ou locais.

You gather requirements from both internal teams and clients, identify data trends, and offer actionable recommendations. You are passionate about using data to solve business challenges, whether it’s identifying trends, troubleshooting data issues, or supporting decision-making processes. You bring strong analytical skills and attention to detail, ensuring data integrity and clarity in your reports.

Data Analyst | Day-to-Day Analyze and interpret data to identify trends, anomalies, and insights that impact business processes and system performance. Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues, working closely with clients and internal teams to ensure data accuracy. Manage and resolve ServiceNow tickets related to data issues, ensuring timely resolution. Gather data requirements from stakeholders, documenting them to ensure accurate reporting and analysis. Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis, supporting better business decisions.

Data Analyst | Skills & Experience 5+ years of experience as a Data Analyst, with expertise in data analysis and problem-solving. Advanced proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis. Familiarity with ERP systems, ensuring smooth data flows between systems and business processes. Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills to work with international clients and technical teams. Experience with Tableau for creating reports and visualizations is a bonus.

A Best Place to Work in Indiana since 2015

title: Chief Scientist (Polyurethane Foam）
description:
Midea is a leading Global Fortune 500 high technology company. Committed to bring innovation to life, Midea Group aims to develop solutions for our international customers that not only meet the requirements of the present, but also the challenges of tomorrow and the day after tomorrow. Midea develops, produces, and sells innovative products in five competence areas: Smart Home, Industrial Technologies, Building Technologies, Robotics & Automation, and Digital Innovation. We operate in more than 195 countries with over 150,000 employees. Midea embraces talents of characters of aiming high, customer first, transformation and innovation, inclusion and partnership to join the mission together to integrate with the world, and to inspire your future! To lead this effort, Midea has created this new position of Chief Scientist (Thermal Management & Refrigeration Technology. This position is preferred to be located in China.

Essential Job Duties: Lead the planning and development of insulation and thermal management technology platforms, working closely with R&D engineers specializing in foam materials, vacuum insulation materials, and system design to establish next-generation thermal insulation roadmaps and implementation plans. Drive cutting-edge research in insulation and thermal management technologies, with a strong focus on polyurethane foam insulation materials. Oversee the formulation development of polyurethane functional materials and pilot testing of new formulations to facilitate technology transfer from R&D to product applications. Improve and optimize polyurethane foam production processes to enhance product quality and manufacturing efficiency, collaborating with the R&D team to solve technical challenges in production. Promote technical collaboration with universities, research institutes, and leading upstream enterprises in the field of insulation and thermal management materials. Stay up to date with the latest advancements in insulation and thermal technologies, providing technical guidance and training to R&D engineers to enhance overall team expertise.

Qualifications: Ph.D. in Polymer Materials Processing, Polymer Chemistry & Physics, Materials Science, Chemical Engineering, or Mechanical Engineering, with 10+ years of experience in relevant fields. Strong foundation in material formulation and applied research, with expertise in polyurethane foam processing and optimization. Familiarity with mold design and the ability to enhance material flowability and overall performance through process improvements. 5+ years of experience in polyurethane foam material R&D, with a deep understanding of insulation materials for refrigerators. Extensive knowledge of polyurethane foam production processes and equipment, with a proven ability to independently resolve technical challenges. Strong innovation skills and a collaborative team mindset. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and project management abilities.

This role could be based in China, with the possibility of a hybrid arrangement. Candidates should be open to either relocating to China or spending approximately half of their time working there while partially working remotely.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Job Summary We are seeking a highly skilled Staff Engineer or AWS Devops to join our team. This role is Fully Infrastructure focused***** As part of this role, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing infrastructure, pipelines, and processes in AWS to enable efficient development and deployment workflows. You will work closely with nearshore DevOps engineers and the broader engineering team to support our rapidly scaling FinTech-focused systems. This is a senior-level role requiring in-depth knowledge of AWS infrastructure, networking, and modern DevOps practices. Location : Mexico or Brazil Contract : 12 months Remote

from Mexico or Brazil

Key Responsibilities AWS Infrastructure Management: Architect, deploy, and maintain AWS services including VPCs, EC2 instances, RDS, DynamoDB, S3, and EKS. Networking & Security: Configure and secure VPCs, manage API gateways using service mesh technologies (e.g., Istio), and implement Cloudflare for API security. Infrastructure as Code: Use Terraform and Helm charts to manage infrastructure at scale. Kubernetes Operations: Deploy, maintain, and scale Kubernetes clusters (EKS) and integrate with supporting services like AWS ECR. Observability: Implement and maintain monitoring solutions with Datadog to ensure optimal system performance and uptime. Messaging Systems: Work with SQS, Kafka, and other AWS-based or third-party messaging solutions. Containerization & CI/CD: Leverage GitHub for CI pipelines and utilize ArgoCD for robust deployment workflows. Database Scaling: Support and scale RDS or MySQL systems and implement application-level or database-level sharding strategies. Software Support: Collaborate with engineering teams using Go for service-level development.

Preferred Qualifications Education & Experience: Minimum of 5+ years in a senior or staff-level DevOps or infrastructure role. Technical Expertise: Proficiency in AWS, Linux environments, Kubernetes, Terraform, and service meshes. Programming Skills: Experience with one or more development languages (Go preferred). FinTech: Previous experience in the FinTech domain is a plus but not required.

Nice-to-Have Skills Strong experience scaling RDS or MySQL for growing systems. Experience with API gateways, Istio service mesh, and scaling Kubernetes environments. Hands-on experience with ARGOCD for continuous delivery.

Why Join Us? Opportunity to work on cutting-edge FinTech systems. Collaborate with a high-caliber engineering team driving rapid growth. Play a critical role in scaling the company's infrastructure and database systems. Long-term project with a 12-month contract and potential extensions.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description: Currently, we are looking for a Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer who will be a part of the general-purpose data science core team and work with tasks covering a wide variety of business needs with a soft focus on NLP or CV applications. In this position, you will work with multiple data sources (usually textual, numerical and time-related data), huge and small datasets to develop, validate and deploy machine learning models, tune their performance & integrate them into data processing pipelines. Responsibilities: Deal with both structured and unstructured data, collaborate with data engineers on defining data storage formats, state data collection requirements; Not only solve technical tasks but understand business needs and offer appropriate solutions, describe a chosen approach to non-technical people; Set up reproducible experiments: selection, training, validation and optimization of machine learning models, evaluation of their quality in business-related terms; Integrate data preprocessing and model inference into general data processing pipelines; Research new tools, papers, etc. in the machine learning area. Requirements: Strong knowledge and deep understanding of Сlassical machine learning (linear models, decision trees, ensembles for classification and regression tasks, clustering and dimensionality reduction) Main concepts and stages of the modelling process (validation scheme, regularization, overfitting and generalization, data leaks, feature selection, etc.) Experience with Python scientific, visualization and ML-related libraries (numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, etc.) Experience with different clustering techniques Experience with classic NLP tools and techniques (nltk, spacy, n-grams, skip-grams, TF-IDF, tokenizers, lemmatization, dependencies parsing, etc.) Experience with NN frameworks, NLP-related architectures and libraries (Pytorch / Tensorflow, HuggingFace, fasttext, flair, sentence transformersWord2Vec, ElMo, RNN, CNN, Transformer, BERT, etc.) Experience in tuning pre-trained models for different NLP tasks Good Python programming skills Good spoken and written English (at least B1) Ability and desire to convert raw business requests into strictly formulated machine learning tasks Ability to formulate data gathering (or data labelling) requirements Minimum 2-year experience in machine learning

title: Lead Data Scientist
description:

Remote (Ability to support US Central Time Zone) Duration:

6-12+ months Experience Level:

Job Overview: The Lead Data Scientist will play a key role in designing, developing, and deploying advanced analytics solutions to support the client’s transformation and rapid growth. This role requires a deep understanding of statistical and machine learning methodologies to extract insights and enable business partners to make data-driven decisions.

Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy machine learning and statistical models for predictive analytics, classification, clustering, regression, time series analysis, and other advanced analytics solutions. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, SQL, and R. Hands-on experience with data science tools (e.g., Databricks), distributed computing, and cloud analytics (e.g., Azure). Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present complex insights to stakeholders.

If you are passionate about leveraging data science to drive business transformation and innovation, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity!

description:

Top 1 platform for copy trading globally Top 5 derivatives trading globally 8+ million registered users 1K+ employees in over 38 countries Provide stable security of A+ ranking for 12 SSL indicators Proof of Reserves - guarantees 100% of users' assets in reserves
